traytour lowe lucifer suche one shall fall pthat wylleth kynges peeres hygher emperour poore freers nowe wollen waxe warryour god nat gouernour holdeth noman permagall whyle couetyse counsaylour suche falshed mote nede fall pthat hye horse wylleth ryde glytterande golde great araye paynted portred pryde comen knyght maye go gaye chaunge clothyng euery daye golden gyrdles great small boystous bere baye suche falshed mote nede fall pwith pryde punyshed poore sustayne sale holy churche maketh hore fylleth wombe wyne ale money fylleth many male chaffren church fall telleth people leude tale suche false faytours foule befall pwith chaunge many maner meates songe solace syttynge longe fylleth wombe fast fretes meate gonge meat harpe songe eche man mote hem lordes call hote spyces euer amonge suche false faytours foule hem fall pand myters mo one two perled quenes heed staffe golde pyrrey lo heuy made lead cloth golde newe redde glytterande golde grene gall dome wyll dampne men deed suche faytours foule hem fall pand chrystes people proudly curse brode bokes braying bell putte pennyes purse woll sell heuen hel sentence thou wylt dwell wyllen gesse gaye hall though soth thou hem tell great cursynge shalt thou fall pthat blessed blesse cursed curse woll thus people oppresse haue theyr lordshyppes full many marchauntes woll purse penyes woll come thrall poore people pull suche false faytours foule hem fall plordes mote hem loute obeysaunt brode blessyng ryden royall route courser kynge saddle golde glyttryng curyous harneys quayntly crallyt styroppes gaye golde mastlyng suche falshed foule befall pchrystes minysters clepen bene rulen robberye antichrist seruen clene attyred tyrannye wytnesse iohns prophecye antichriste admirall tyffelers attyred trecherye suche faytours foule hem fall pwho sayth hem may synne shalbe done deed hem woll gladly wynne ayenst whiche god forbed holyest clepen heed rule regall ala euer eten breed suche falshed woll foule fall pher heed loueth honour worshypped worde dede kynges mote hem knele coure apostle chryst forbede pope hestes suche taketh hede kepe chrystes comaundement gold syluer mote ben wede holdeth hym hole omnipotent phe ordayneth ordynaunce parysh preestes powere another greater auaunce greater poynt mystere hyghest erth hym reserueth many poynt chryst hath pere reserueth neyther opyn ne ioynt pso semeth aboue chryst abouen hym nothyng whan sytteth stall dampneth saueth hym thynke suche pryde tofore god doth stynke angell bad iohn hym nat knele god bowynge wyllers worship must nede euyll fele pthey ne clepen chryst tus deus clepen heed sanctissimus suche sect sewys trowe taken hem amysse erth haue blysse hye master belyal chrystes people hem wysse suche false wyll foule tall pthey mowe bynde lose holy lyfe saue dampne mowe betwene hem great stryfe many man kylled knyfe wete hem haue lordshyp shall suche chryst suffred woundes fyue suche falshed wyll foule fall pchryst sayd qui gladio percutit swerde shall dye bad preestes peace gryth bade hem drede dye bad symple slye carke cattall trusteth god sytteth hye false shull foule fall pthese wollen make men swere ayenst chrystes comaundement chrystes membres tere roode wer newe yrent suche lawes make comen assent echeon choweth ball thus poore fully shent euer falshed foule befall pthey vsen symonye sellen church prioryes ne vsen enuye cursen hem contraryes hyreth men dayes yeres strength holde hem stall culleth aduersaryes therfore falshed foule thou fall pwith purse purchase personage purse paynen hem plede men warre woll wage brynge enemyes dede lordes lyues woll lede moche take gyue small get shall shede make suche false ryght foule fal pthey halowe nothyng hyre churche font ne vestement make order euery shyre preestes paye parchement ryatours taken rent therwith smere shyppes skall many church ben ofte suspent suche falshed yet foule fall lyueth nat lecherye haunten wench widdowes wyues punysheth poore putrye selfe vseth theyr lyues man shryues heuen come neuer shall shalbe cursed caytyues hell sayne shall fall pthere mercy maximyen nero neuer good nowe whan hath furred hoode folowe christ shedde blode heuen buckette wall suche wreches ben worse wode suche faytours foule hem fall pthey gyue almesse ryche maynteynours men lawe lordes woll lyche harlottes sonne nat worthe hawe sothfastnesse suche han slawe kembe crokettes christall drede god haue downe drawe suche faytours foule hem fall pthey maken parson penny canon cardynals vnnethes amongest hem ne hath glosed gospell fals christ made neuer cathedral ne wyth hym cardynall wyth redde hatte vsyn mynstrals falshed foule mote befall ptheyr tythyng offryng clemeth possessyon therof nyll none forgo robben men raunsome tythyng turpe lucrum maisters meynall tythyng bribry larson wyll make falshed full foule fall pthey taken ferme sompnours harme people may pardoner false faytours sell seales dare well say holden great array multiply hem metall drede full lytell dome day whan suche shall foule fall psuche harlottes shull men dysclaunder shullen make gree ben proude alexaunder sayne poore wo ye yere eche preeste shall paye hys fee encrease hys lemmans call suche heerdes shull well yuell suche false shull foule fall pand yf man falsely famed wolde make purgacioun woll offycers agramed assigne hym fro towne towne nede must paye raunsome though clene christall haue absolutioun suche false shull foule fall pthough gyltie dede maye money pay whyle purse woll blede maye vse fro day day byshoppes offycers gone full gay thys game vsen ouer poore pyll theyr pray suche false shull foule fall palas god ordayned neuer suche lawe ne suche crafte couetyse forbade hys sawe suche gouernours mowen god agryse rule ryghtwyse newe poyntes ben pure papall goddes lawe dispyce suche faytours shul foule fall pthey sayne peter key heuyn hell haue holde trowe peter toke money synnes solde suche successours ben bolde wynnyng theyr wytte wrall conscience waxen colde suche faytours foule hem fall ppeter neuer great fole leaue hys key suche lorell take suche cursed suche tole aduysed nothyng well trowe haue key hell theyr maister place marshall dressen hem dwell false lucifere fall pthey ben proude lucifarre angry enuyous good faythe ben full farre couetyse ben curyous catche catell couytous houde hungre woll yall vngoodly vngratious nedely suche falshed shal foule fall pthe pope peter heyre thynke erreth case whan choyse byshoppes dispeyre chosen hem dyuers place lorde shall write hym grace hys clerke anone pray shall shall spede hys purchase suche false foule hem fall pthough good lordes prayer shalbe spedde though wylde wyll wood nat vnderstandyng men han redde leude boster god forbede good byshoppe horse ball suche pope foule stedde last woll foule fall phe maketh byshoppes erthly thanke nothyng christes sake suche ben full fatte ranke soule heale none hede take al well done euer make shal answere one fors worldes thanke suche worch wake suche false shall foule fall psuche canne nat crede wyth prayer shull made prelate nother canne gospell rede suche shull nowe welde hye estate hye goodes frendshyp hem make toteth somme totall suche bere keyes hell yates suche false shall foule fall pthey forsake christes loue traueyle hungre thurst colde ben ordred euer aboue youthe tyl ben olde dore go nat folde helpe theyr shepe nought trauall hyred men suche holde suche false foule hem fall pfor chryst kyng woll forsake knowe hym nought hys pouerte christes loue woll wake drynke pyement ale aparte god seme nothyng ferde lusty lyueth dyd lamuall dryuen shepe deserte suche faytours shull foule fall pchrist hath xij apostels nowe say may one may nat erre manere leueth nat ben lost echone peter erred dyde nat iohn cleped principall christ cleped hym peter self ye stone false faytours foule hem fall pwhy cursen croysery christes christen creature bytwene hem nowe enuy enhaunsed honour christen lyuers labour fyr leuyn man mortall dethe dishonour suche false foule hem fall pwhat knoweth tyllour plowe pope name hate hys crede suffyseth hym ynowe knoweth cardynall hys hatte rough poore vnrightly latte knoweth christ hys god royall suche mater nat worth gnatte suche false faytours foule hem fall pa kyng shall knele kysse hys showe chryst suffred synfull kysse fete thynketh holdeth hym hye ynowe lucifer dyd hye sette suche one thynketh hym selfe foryete eyther trouth nat call chryst suffred woundes wete shall make suche falshed foule fall pthey layeth large nettes take syluer golde fyllen coffer sackes fettes soules catche sholde seruauntes vnholde doublyn theyr rentall bygge hem castels bygge hem holde suche false foule hem fall phere endeth fyrst parte thys tale herafter foloweth seconde parte accorde worde fal english fynde shewe another nowe shall haue moche saye behynde howe preestes han people pynde curteys christ hath kende putte thys matter mynde make thys maner men amende pshortly shende hem shewe nowe howe wrongfully worche walke hye god nothyng tell ne howe goddes worde telleth many balke hernes holde hem halke prechyn tythes offrende vntruely gospell talke hys mercy god amende pwhat antichrist saye euyn christes aduersary suche hathe nowe ben many day christes byddyng full contrary trouthe clene varry waye ben wende christes people vntruely cary god hys pytie amende pthat lyuen contrary christes lyfe hye pride agaynst mekenesse agaynst sufferaunce vsen stryfe angre ayenst sobrenesse agaynst wysedome wylfulnesse christes tale lytell tende agaynst measure outragyousnesse whan god woll maye amende plordly lyfe ayenst lowlynesse demyn without mercy couetyse ayenst largesse agaynst trewth trechery agaynst almesse enuy agaynst christ comprehende chastyte maynteyne lechery god hys grace thys amende payenst penaunce vse delyghtes ayenst suffraunce stronge defence ayenst god vsen yuel rightes agaynste pytie punishementes open yuell ayenst contynence wycked wynnyng worse dispende sobrenesse sette dispence god hys goodnesse amende pwhy cleymen holy hys powere wranglen ayenst hys hestes hys lyuyng folowen nothyng lyuen worse wytlesse beestes fyshe fleshe louen feestes lordes ben brode ykende goddes poore haten gestes god hys mercy thys amende pwith dyuers suche shall haue dome sayne christes frendes nothyng shulde done suche ben falser ben fendes people ley suche bendes god erthe han offende surour suche christ nowe sende v hys mercy thys amende pa token antichrist hys careckes ben nowe wyde yknowe receyued preche shall man wythout token hym trowe eche christen preest prechyn owe god aboue ben sende goddes worde folke showe synfull man amende pchrist sente poore preche royall ryche dyd nat nowe dare poore people teche antichrist ouer foe amonge people mote go hath bydden suche suspende hath hente thynketh yet mo thys god may well amende pall tho han worlde forsake lyuen loly god badde prison shullen take betyn bounden forthe ladde herof rede man dradde christ sayd hys shulde shende eche man ought herof gladde god full well woll amende pthey take hem royall powere saye haue swerdes two one curse hell one flee men hys takyng christ mo yet peter one tho christ peter smyte gan defende sheth badde putte tho suche myscheues god amende pchrist badde peter kepe shepe swerde forbade hym smyte swerde tole shepe kepe sheperdes shepe woll byte thynketh suche sheperdes ben wyte ayen shepe swerde contende driue shepe great dispyte thys god may well amende pso successours peter nought christ made chefe pastoure aswerde sheperde vsen ought wold slee bochoure peter successour shulde bere hys shepe tyll hys backe bende shadowe hem euery shoure thys god maye wel amende psuccessours peter ben peter christ forsoke leuer loue god lese sheperde lese hoke culleth shepe dothe coke hem taken woll vntrende falsely glose gospell boke god mercy amende pafter christ take peter kay chryst sayd muste dye man peter christ gan withsay christ badde hym go behynde sathan suche cousaylours many men han worldes wele god offende peter successours ben suche god may well amende pfor sathan say contrary christ thys lerne peter lore sewen hym whan dyd mysse folowe peter forsothe thys al christ wolde peter reprehende nat longeth heuyn blysse god hys mercy hem amende psome apostels sewen case ought vnderstonde hym betrayed christ iudas bare purse euery londe al myght sette honde hydde stale myspende rule traytours han honde almighty god hem amende pand last hys lorde gan tray cursedly hys false couetyse wolde trayen hym money wysten wyse seker selfe ensyse sothnesse ben frende couetyse chaungen queyneyse almighty god suche amende pwere christ erthe efte sone wolde dampne hym dye hys hestes han fordone sayne sawes ben heresy ayenst commaundementes crye dampne hys brende lyketh nat hem suche losengery god almighty hem amende pthese han moremyght englande hert hath kynge hys lawe han purchased hem suche powere taken hem lyste nat knawe say heresy sawe prysone woll hem sende nat elder dawe god hys mercy amende pthe kynges lawe wol man deme angerlyche withouten answere yf man mysqueme shalbe bayghted bere yet wel worse woll hym tere prysone woll hem pende gyues gere whan god woll maye mende pthe kyng taxeth nat hys men assente commynalte eche yere woll raunsom hem maysterfully doth seales yere better kynges extende offycers han gretter fee thys mischefe god amende pfor woll proue testament natt worthe tenne pounde shall paye parchement thyrde parte money rounde thus people raunsounde saye suche parte hem shulde apende grypen gothe grounde god hys mercy amende pa symple fornycatioun twenty shyllynges shall paye haue absolution yere vsen forthe maye thus letten hem go stray recke nat though soule brende kepyn yuell peter key suche sheperdes god amende pwonder parlyament lordes thys londe taken lytell entent helpe people honde ben harder theyr bonde worse beate bytter brende kyng vnderstande god hym helpe thys amende pwhat bysshoppes relygions han thys lande moche laye fee lorshyppes possessyons lordes semeth maketh hem lese charyte mowe nat god attende erthe haue hyghe degree god hys mercy amende pthe emperour yaf pope somtyme hyghe lordshyp hym aboute laste sely kyme proude pope putte hym thys realme doute lordes ware defende nowe folke wonder stoute kynge lordes nowe thys amende pthus endeth seconde parte tale foloweth thyrde moyses lawe forbode tho preestes shulde lordshyppes welde christes gospel byddeth also shulde lordshyppe helde ne christes apostels neuer bolde suche lordeshyppes enbrace smeren shepe kepe folde god amende hem hys grace pfor ne ben countrefete men may knowe hem fruite gretnesse maketh hem god foryete take hys mekenesse dispyte poore lyte nolde nat demen face noryshe shepe hem nat byte god amende hem hys grace pgyfon pwhat canst thou preche ayenst chanons men clepen seculere pely ben curate many town erthe haue great powere han great prebendes dere two thre mo personage ben playeng fere yet serue kynge also pand lette ferme fare woll gyue therfore woll spende woll spa woll laye vp store cure soule care nat fore mowe money take whether soules wonne lore profytes woll nat forsake pthey haue gederyng procuratour poore people enplede robben hem rauynour hys lorde money lede catche quicke eke dede riche hym hys lorde eke robbe poore gyue good rede olde yonge hole syke ptherwith purchase hem lay fee londe hem lyketh best buylde also brode cyte bothe est eke west purchase thus ben ful prest poore woll nought spende ne good gyue goddes gest ne sende hym hath sende pby seruyce suche woll lyue trusse treasour though paryshe dye vnshriue woll nat gyue rose floure lyfe shulde myrrour bothe lered leude also teche people lele labour suche myster men ben mysgo psome hem ben harde nygges hem ben proude gay spende good vpon gygges fynden hem great aray ala thynke men say thus dispenden goddis good dredefull dome daye suche wretch shulbe worse wood psome churces neuer ne sye ne neuer peny thyder ne sende though poore parishens hungre dye peny hem wyl nat spende haue receyuynge rente recke neuer remenant ala deuyll hath clene hem blent suche one sathanas soiournant pand vsen horedome harlotry couetyse pomp pride slouthe wrathe eke enuy sewen synne euery syde ala thynke suche tabyde howe woll accomptes yelde hye god mowe hem nat hyde suche wyllers wytte nat worth nelde pthey ben roted richesse christes pouert foryet serued wyth many messe hem thynketh manna mete good mowe gete wene lyue euermore whan god dome sette suche treasour feble store pvnneth mote matyns saye countyng court holdynge yet iangleth iaye vnderstont hym selfe nothynge woll serue bothe erle kynge hys fyndyng hys fee hyde hys tythynge hys offrynge feble charite pother ben proude coueytous ben harde hungry ben lyberall lecherous el medlers wyth marchandry maynteyners men wyth maistry stewardes countours pledours serue god hypocrisy preestes ben christes false traytours pthey ben false ben vengeable begylen men christes name ben vnstedfast vnstable tray lorde hem thynketh shame serue god ben full lame goddes theues falsly stele falsely goddes worde defame wynnyng worldes wele pantichryst seruen pray may say nay wyth antichryst suche shull fall folowen hym dede fay seruyn hym ryche array serue chryst suche falsely fayne dredeful dome day shull folowe hym payne pthat knowen hem selfe done yll ayenst christes commaundement amende hem neuer ne wyll serue sathan one assent sayth sothe shalbe shent speketh ayenst false lyuyng well lyueth shalbe brent suche ben gretter kyng ppope byshoppes cardynals chanons person vycaire goddes seruyce trowe ben false sacramentes sellen ben proude lucifere eche man loke whether lye speketh ayenst powere shall holden heresy ploke howe many order take onely christe hys seruyce worldes goodes forsake taketh order wyse trowe shall sore agryse glose conne sewen thys assyse yuell tyme thus begonne ploke howe many amonge hem holden thys hye waye wyth antichrist shullen fall wolden god betraye god amende hem best maye many men maken shende weten well sothe saye dyuell hath foule hem blende psome church dwell apparaylled poorely proude porte seuen sacramentes done sell cattel catchynge comforte eche matter wollen mell done hem wronge dysporte afray people ben fell holde hem lower doth lorde pfor tythynge ducke apple aye make men sweare vpon boke thus foulen christes say suche bearen yuell heauen kay mowen assoyle mowe shryue wyth mennes wyues strongly play wyth true tyllers sturte stryue pat wrestlynge wake chefe chauntours nale markette beater medlynge make hoppen houten wyth heue hale fayre freshe wyne stale dyne drynke make debate seuen sacramentes set sayle howe kepe suche kayes heuen gate pmennes wyues wollen holde though ben ryght sory speake shull bolde sompnynge consystory make hem saye mouth lye though sawe wyth eye hys lemman holden openly man hardy axe phe woll haue tythynge offrynge maugre euer gruche twyse daye woll synge goddes prestes nere none suche mote huntyng wyth dogge byche blowen hys horne cryen hey sorcery vsen wytche suche kepen yuell peter key pyet mote haue stocke stone gayly paynted proudly dyght maken men lyuen vpon saye full myght aboute suche men sette vp great lyght suche stockes shull stande therby darke mydnyght maye make mastry pthat leude people se mowe thou mary thou worchest woder thynges aboute men offren nowe hongen broches ouches rynges preest purchaseth offrynges nyll offre none ymage wo soule synge precheth suche pylgrimage pto men woman ben poore ben christes owne lykenesse men shullen offre dore suffren honger dystresse suche ymages offre lesse mowe fele thurst ne colde poore sprete gan christe blesse therfore offreth feble olde pbuckelers brode sweardes longe baudryke wyth baselardes kene suche tole necke honge wyth antichrist suche preestes bene vpon dedes well sene whome seruen whome honoren antichristes bene clene goddes goodes fasly deuouren pof scarlet grene gay gownes mote shape newe clyppen kyssen counten townes damoseles daunce sewe cutted clothes sewe hewe wyth longe pykes shone goddes gospell trewe eyther seruen dyuell none pnowe ben prestes poke wyde men must enlarge vestement holy gospell done hyde contraryen rayment suche preestes lucifer ben sent lyke conquetours ben arayde proude pendauntes ar ypent falsely truthe han betrayde pshryfte syluer suche wollen aske woll men crepe crouche none sacramentes saue askes wythout mede shall man touche byshoppe theyr warant vouche lawe decre wyth mede money thus mouche thus sayne charite pin myddes masse nyll haue man hyre full shortly let forth passe suche shull men fynde eche shyre personage profyte desyre lyue lykynge lustes dare sayne sans ose ieo dyre suche ben antichristes preestes por yes byshoppes mote ben hys seruyce holden forth harlotry suche prelate ben feble empryse goddes grame suche men agryse suche matter taken mede howe excuse hem wyse thynketh ought greatly drede pthey sayne man longeth reproue though erre falsely goddes goodesse fongeth therwyth maynteyne wo werre dedes shulde bryght sterre lyuynge leude mannes lyght saye pope maye erre nede muste passe mannes myght pthough prest lye wt leman al nyght tellen hys felowe hym goth masse anone ryght sayeth syngeth synne hys byrde abydeth hym hys ynne dyghteth hys dyner meane whyle syngeth hys masse wolde wynne weneth god begyle phem thynketh longe tyll mette vsen forth yere amonge folke sette holdeth man halfe hys pere byshoppe hath powere soyle men el ben lore hys absolution maye make skere wo soule syngeth fore pthe gryffon began threte sayd monkes canst thou ought pellycan sayd ben full grete thys world moch wo hath wrought saynt benet order brought ne made hem neuer suche manere trowe came neuer hys thought shulde vse great power pthat man shulde monke lorde cal ne serue knee kynge proude prynce pall meate drynke thynge wearen myter rynge wyth double worsted well ydyght wyth royall meate ryche drynke rydeth courser knyght pwyth hauke wyth houndes eke wyth broches ouches hys hode saye masse weke deynties moste foode wyth lordshyppes wyth bondman thys royall religion saynt benet made neuer none hem haue lordshyppe man ne towne pnowe ben queynte curious wyth fyne clothe cladde serued clene proude angry enuyous malyce moche meane catchynge crafty couetous lordly lyuen great lykynge thys lyuynge religious accordynge benette hys lyuynge pthey ben clerkes courtes ouer se poore tenaunce fully slyte hyre man amerced gladlyer woll wryte thys farre christes pouerte wyth couetyse endyte poore haue pyte ne neuer hem cheryshe euer hem byte pand comenly suche ben comen poore people hem begete thys perfection han ynomen father ryden fete trauaylen sore ete pouert lyueth yonge olde father suffreth drought wete many hongry meles thurst colde pand thys monkes han forsake christes loue saynt benette pryde ease haue hem take thys religion yuell besette ben religioun must haue honged plowe threshynge dykynge fro towne towne wyth sory mete halfe ynowe ptherfore han thys forsake taken ryches pryde ease full fewe god woll monkes hem make lytell suche order prayse saynt benet ordayned badde hem cherelyche churlyche maner lyue go boystous earth lor lych pthey dysclaunder saynt benette therfore haue hys holy curse saynt benet wyth hem neuer mette yf thought robbe hys purse herof tell ben lyke tho clene serue dyuell hell ben hys treasoure hys store pand suche counterfaytours chanons canon suche dysgysed ben goddes enemyes traytours hys true religion han foule dyspysed freres haue tolde makynge crede yet coulde tell worse men wolde weryen rede pa goddes goodnesse man tell myght wryte ne speake ne thynke thought falshed vnryght may man tell euer god wrought gryffon sayd thou canst good thou came neuer gentyll kynde trowe thou waxest wood el thou hast loste thy mynde pshulde holy churche haue heed shulde gouernayle shulde rule shulde reed shulde forthren shulde auayle eche man shall lyue hys trauayle best doth shall haue moste mede wyth strength yf men churche assayle wyth strength men must defende nede pand pope purely poore nedy nothynge ne hadde shulde dryuen dore dore wycked hym nolde dradde suche heed men wolde sadde synfully lyuen hem lust wyth strength amendes suche made wyth wepen wolues shepe wust pyf pope prelate wolde begge bydde bowe borowe holy churche shulde stande full colde seruauntes sytte soupe sorowe noughty foule horowe worshyppe god men wolde wlate bothe euen morowe suche harlotry men wolde hate ptherfore men holy churche shulde ben honest thynge worshypfully goddes workes werche semeth serue christ kynge honest clene clothynge wyth vessel golde clothes ryche god honestly make offrynge hys lordshypppe none lyche pthe pellican caste houge crye sayd ala sayest thou christ heed sytteth hye heddes ne ought haue mo ben hys membres also father taught v cal hym al maysters called defended tho maysters ben wycked fals pthat taketh maystry hys name goostly earthly good kynges lordes shulde lordshyp hane rule people wyth mylde mode christ v shedde hys blode badde hys preestes maystershyp haue ne carke nat cloth ne fode euery myschefe wyll hem saue pher ryche clothynge shalbe ryghtwysnesse treasoure trewe lyfe shalbe charite shalbe rychesse lordshyppe shalbe vnite hope god honeste vessell clene conscience poore spirite humilite shalbe holy church defence pwhat sayd gryffon may greue folkes faren wele haste thou done wyth lyue thy falsheed eche man may fele thou canst catell gete lyuest londe lorell wyth glosynge gettest thou thy mete fareth deuell wonneth hell phe wolde eche shulde dwell lyueth clene enuye wyth tale thou doest tell thou woldest people dystry wyth glose heresy ye lyue better lyfe clene hypocrisy bryngest wo stryfe pand therwyth haue done ye ne haue cure ye serue dyuell neyther god ne man shall paye hyre ye woll fare well feestes warme clothed colde therfore ye glose goddes hestes begyle people yonge olde pand seuen sacramentes ye speake ayenst ye slye ayenst tythynges offringes wt entetes lordes body falsly lye thys ye done lyue case sayeth ben none suche sayne pope worth pea make people ayen hym gruche pand thys cometh fendes brynge christen dystaunce wolde man frendes leaue thy chattrynge wyth myschaunce yf thou lyue well wylt thou let men lyue hem lyst spende good kepe store mennes conscience neuer thou nyst pye han cure answere fore meddell ye han done let men lyue han done yore thou shalte answere man pellican sayd syr nay dispysed pope ne sacramente soth say speake charite good hope pbut dyspyse hye pryde rychesse shulde poore spirite wyckednesse knowe wyde serue god false habyte turnen mekenesse pryde lowlynesse hye degre goddes wordes turne hyde moued charite pto lette men lyue wyth connynge al myght warne men wo tell hem trouth ryght sacramentes soule hele yf ben vsed good vse ayenst speake neuer dele nothynge wyse pbut vsen hem mysse manere sette hem vp sale trowe shall abye hem dere thys reason thys tale taketh hem vnryghtfullyche ayenst ten comaundementes glose wreched lyche selleth sacramentes pi trowe deuell homage weten wronge therto dare well wage seruen satan al songe tythen offren holsome lyfe done dewe manere man houselyn shryue weddynge fere pso nother solde ne bought ne take ne gyue couetyse taken nought selleth hem maye sore agryse lordes body lye saye soth thorowe trewe rede hys fleshe blode hys mystrye forme brede phowe nedeth stryue whether subgette accydent christ lyue verament yf pope cardynall lyue good lyue christ commaunded hys gospell ayenst woll stryue thynketh lyue well pfor yf pope lyued god bede pryde hyghnesse shulde dyspyse rychesse couetyse crowne hede mekenesse pouerte shulde vse gryffon sayd shulde abye thou shalbe brent balefull fyre thy secte shall dystrye ye shalbe hanged swyre pye shullen hanged drawe gyueth leaue preache speake agaynst goddes lawe people thus falsely teache thou shalt cursed wyth boke bell dysseuered holy churche clene ydampned hell otherwyse ye woll worche pthe pellycan sayd ne drede cursynge lytell value god hope haue mede falshede ye shewe ye ben charite wylneth vengeaunce dyd nero suffren woll redy drede thou canst pchrist badde one suffre hys loue taught hys seruauntes thou amende hys sake aboue drede thy mayntenaunce yf drede worldes hate thynketh lytell prayse drede nothynge hye estate ne drede dysease pwolde ye turne leaue pryde hye porte rychesse cursynge shulde go wyde god brynge ryghtwysnesse drede tyranny nothynge ye done suffre redy syker recke neuer howe soone pthe gryffon grynned wode loked louely owle swore cockes herte bloode wolde hym tere euery doule holy churche thou dysclaundrest foule thy reason woll race make thy fleshe rote moule losell thou shalte haue harde grace pthe gryffon flewe forth hys waye pellycane dyd sytte wepe hym selfe gan saye god wolde christes shepe herde yeake kepe eche worde sayd wolde wrytte well kepe god wolde hys grace plowman pi answerde sayd wolde yf trauayle man wolde pay pelyca sayd yes yt god han solde han store money plowma sayd tell thou may tellest thou mennes trespace pelycan said amede hem good fay yf god woll gyue grace pfor christ hym selfe lykened hys people dyed rode fare ryght fareth fedeth hys byrdes wyth hys blode done yuell ayenst gode ben hys fone vnder frendes face tolde hem howe lyuynge stode god amende hem hys grace plowma ayleth ye gryffon tell holdeth syde two ben lykely wyth kyndes robben wyde pellica foule betokeneth pryde lucifer hygh flewe syth dyd hym euell hyde agylted goddes grace pa byrde flyeth vp ayre lyueth byrdes ben meke flowe vp dyspayre shenden sely soules eke soules ben synnes seke culleth hem knele therfore ala brybry goddes forbode breke god amende hys grace pthe hynder parte lyoun robber rauynere robbeth people earth downe erth holdeth none hys pere fareth thys foule ferre nere wyth teporel strength people chase lyon proude earth god amende hem hys grace pellican phe slewe forth wyth hys wynges twayne droupynge dased dull soone gryffon came agayne hys foules earth full pellican cast pull great nombre neuer sene maner foules tellen woll yf god woll gyue hys grace pwyth gryffon comen foules fele rauyns rokes crowes pye grayfoules agadred wele igurde aboue wolde hye gledes bosardes hem whyte molle puttockes token place lapwynges well coneth lye thys felowshyp han gerde grace plonge pellican laste cometh agayne brought wyth hym phenix stoute gryffon wolde haue flowe ful faynt hys foules flewen thycke rayne phenix tho began hem chace flye hym vayne dyd vengeaunce grace phe slewe hem downe wythout mercy astarte neyther free ne thrall hym cast rufull crye gryffon downe fall bete hem slewe hem whyther hem droue man may trace vnder erthe thought yall ala feble grace pthe pellican axed ryght wrytynge yf haue blame woll fyght flyght shall shelde shame mayde dame lambe slayne shall shelde gostly blame erthely harme goddes grace ptherfore praye euery man wrytynge haue excused thys wrytynge wryteth pellican thus people hath dyspysed freshe fully aduysed nyll maynteyne hys manace deuell often dysguysed brynge man yuell grace pwyteth pellican herof nyl auowe hye ne lowe ne degre fable take ye mowe holy churche wyll bowe eche man amende hym christ sende space wrytynge alowe almyghty hys grace finis pthus endeth boke caunterbury tale foloweth romaunt rose pthe romaut rose manye man sayen sweuenynges ny fable lesynges men may sweuen sene hardlye false ne bene aftewarde ben apparaunt maye drawe warraunt author hyght macrobes halte nat dreames false ne lee vndoth v auysyoun whylom mette kyng cipioun whoso sayth weneth ape el nycetie wene dremes fall lette whoso lyst foole call trowe saye dremes signifiaunce good harme many wightes dremen slepe nyghtes full many thynges couertly fallen openly within twenty yere age whan loue taketh corage yonge folke went soone bed wont done fast slept slepyng met suche swenyng lyke wonder wele sweue neuer dele ny afterwarde befal rygh dreame wol tell v dreme wol ryme aryght make hertes gaye lyght loue prayeth also comaundeth yf aske whether boke shall hate rede romaunce rose arte loue glose pthe matter fayre make god graunt gre take whome begone hath ywys mokel pryse therto worthy beloued well ought pryse ryght cleped rose euery wyght may thought tho fyue yere ago may thus dremed tyme loue iolitie thyng gynneth waxen gay neyther buske haye may nyl shrouded bene newe leues wrene woddes eke recoueren grene drye wynter ben sene erth wexeth proude withall swote dewes fall pore estate forgette wynter sette becometh ground proude woll haue newe shroude maketh queynt robe fayre hewes hundred payre grasse floures ynde pers many hewes full dyuers robe mene ywys grounde praysen byrdes han lefft songe whyle han suffred colde full stronge wether grylle derke syght ben may sunne bryght glad shewe syngyng herte suche lykyng mote syngen ben lyght doth nyghtyngale myght maken noyse syngen blythe blysfull many sythe chelaundre popyngay yonge folke entenden aye ben gay amarous tyme sauorious harde hert loueth nought may whan al myrth wrought whan may braunches small byrbes syngen clere blysfull swete swete songe pitions seson delytious whan loue affirmeth thynge thougt one nyght slepyng ryght bedde full redely morowe erly vp rose gan clothe anon wysh myne hondes syluer nedle forth drowe aguyler queynt ynowe gan nedle threde anon towne lyst gone sowne bryddes heare buskes syngen cleare swete season lefe threde bastyng sleues alone went playing small foules songe herkenyng payned hem full many payre synge bowes blossomed fayre iolyfe gaye full gladnesse towarde ryuer gan dresse herde renne fast fayrer playing none sawe playen ryuere hyll stode nere come downe streme full styffe bolde clere water colde well soth sayne somdele lasse sayne strayter wele awaye neuer saugh er daye water wele lyked wonder gladde se lusty place ryuere water ran clere face wysh tho sawe wele botome ypaued euery dele grauell full stone shene medowes softe sote grene beet ryght water syde ful clere morowe tyde full attempre drede tho gan walken thorowe mede downwarde aye playing ryuers syde coostyng whyle ygone sawe garden ryght anon full longe brode euery dele enclosed walled wele hye walles enbatayled portrayed without wel entayled many ryche portreytures ymages peyntures gan beholde besely woll tell redely thilke ymages semblaunce ferre haue remembraunce mydde sawe hate stonde wrath yre onde semed mynoresse angry chyderesse full gyle fell corage semblaunt ylke ymage nothyng wele arayed lyke wode woman afrayed yfrounced foule vysage grynnyng disputous rage nose snorted vp tene full hydous sene ful foule rusty heed ywryththen ywys full grymly great towayle pan ymage entayle lyste halfe fast name aboue heed sawe called felony pan ymage vyllany ycleped sawe fonde vpon wall right honde vyllany lyke somdele ymage trusteth wele semed wicked creature countenaunce portreture semed full dispytous eke full proude outragious wel coulde paynt vndertake suche ymage coulde make full foule chorlysh semed eke vyllanous lytle coulde norture worshyppe creature pand next paynted couetyse eggeth folke many gyse take yeue ryght nought agayne great treasure vp layne vsure leueth many creature lasse wynnyng couetous brennyng penne feele teacheth robbe steele theues small harlotes routh throtes full many one hongeth last maketh folke compasse cast taken folkes thynge robbery myscouetyng maketh trechours maketh false pledours termes dome done maydens chyldren eke gromes herytage forgo full croked hondes two couetyse euer wode grypen folkes good couetyse wynnyng full lefe hath men thyng pan ymage sette saugh next couetise fast cleped auaryce ful foule payntyng vyce full sad caytyfe eke also grene leke euyll hewed coloure semed haue lyued langour lyke thyng hungre deed lad lyfe onely breed kneden eysell stronge egre therto leane megre clad full poorely torne courtpy al dogges torne behynde eke beforne clouted beggarly mantell honge fast vpon benche weke small burnyt cote honge withall furred menyuere furre rough heere lambe skynnes heuy blake ful olde vndertake auarice cloth wele ne hasteth neuer adele certaynly lothe wearren oft ylke clothe yf forweared wolde haue full great nycetie clothyng er bought newe bad woll hewe auarice helde hande purse honge bande hydde bonde stronge men must abyde wonder longe purse come ought ne cometh thought certayne entent fro purse peny went ymage nygh ynough paynted enuy neuer lough neuer wel herte ferde yf eyther sawe herde great myschannce great disese nothyng may moche plese myschefe mysaduenture whan seeth discomfyture vpon worthy man fall lyketh well withall full glad corage yf se great lynage brought nought shameful wyse yf man honour ryse wyt prowesse hath great heuynesse trusteth well goth nye wood whan chaunce happeth good enuye suche crueltie fayth ne trouth holdeth frende ne felowe badde good ne hath kynne none blood ny full enemy nolde dare sayne hardely owne father fared wele sore abydeth euery dele malyce male talent great turment hate suche folke doth good nygh melteth pure wood herte kerueth breaketh god people well awreketh enuy ywys shall neuer let blame vpon folke set trowe yf enuy ywys knewe best man syde beyonde see yet somwhat lacken hym wolde yf hende wyse ne myght al abate pryse yet wolde blame worthynesse wordes make lesse sawe enuy payntyng wonderfull lokyng ne loked awry ouetwharte baggyngly foule vsage myght loke vysage man ne woman forth ryght playne shu te one eye disdayne enuy brenned whan myght man se fayre worthy wyse el stode folkes pryse psorowe paynted next enuy vpon wall masourye well sene colour lyued langour semed haue iaundice halfe pale auaryce ne nothynge lyke leanesse sorowe thought great distresse suffred daye nyght made yelowe nothyng bryght ful fade pale megre also neuer wight yet halfe wo semed fulfylled yre trowe wyght myght plese thyng myght ese ne wolde sorowe slake comfort none vnto take depe wo begon eke hert angre ronne sorowfull thyng wel semed nothyng slowe cratchen face rent many place clothes tere swyre fulfylled yre torne laye eke heere shulders rent angre male talent eke tell certaynly wept full tenderly worlde ny wyght harde hert sene sorowes smerte nolde haue pytye wo begonne thynge al dasht selfe wo smote togyther hondes two sorowe full intentyfe wofull rechelesse caytyfe rought lytle playing clyppynge kyssynge whoso sorowful herte hym lust playe ne sterte ne dauncen ne synge ne may hert tempre brynge make ioye euen morowe ioye contrary vnto sorowe elde paynted shorter fote iwys wont yonghede vnneth selfe myght fede feble eke olde faded beautye ful salowe waxen colour heed hore whyte floure iwys great qualme ne none ne synne although lyfe gone woxen body vnwelde drye dwyned al elde foule forwelked thynge whylom rounde soft eares shoken fast withall heed wolde fall face frounced forpyned hondes lorne forwyned olde ne went fote potent tyme passeth nyght daye restlesse trauayleth aye steleth v priuely v semeth sekerly one poynt dwelleth euer certes ne resteth neuer goth fast passeth aye ny man thynke may tyme nowe present asketh clerkes men thynke redely thre tymes bene passed tyme maye soiourne goth may neuer returne water downe renneth aye neuer droppe returne maye maye nothynge tyme endure metall erthly creature thyng frette shall tyme eke chaungeth doth waxe fostred thynge destroyeth tyme eldeth auncestours eldeth kynges emperours v shall ouercomen er deth v shal haue nomen tyme hath welde elden folke made elde inly wetyng myght helpe selfe nothyng turned ayen vnto chyldheed nothyng selfe lede ne wytte ne pythe holde chylde two yere olde nathelesse trowe fayre sometyme fresh se whan ryght full age past passage doted thyng becomen furred cappe nummen well clad selfe warme colde myght el done harme olde folke haue alwaye colde kynde suche ben olde panother thynge done writ semed lyke ipocryt cleped pope holy ylke priuely ne spareth neuer wycked dede whan men take none hede maketh outwarde precious wyth pale vysage pytous semeth simple creature ny misauenture ne thynketh corage ful lyke thylke ymage maked lyke semblaunce ful symple countenaunce clothed eke shod loue god yolden religion semed deuocion psauter helde fast honde besyly gan fonde make many faynt prayere god hys sayntes dere ne gaye freshe ne iolyfe semed ful ententyfe good werkes fayre therto hayre ne certes fatte nothyng semed wery fastyng colour pale deed gate aye werned paradyse blysful place folke maken leane grace christ sayeth hys euangyle gette hem prise towne whyle lytle glory veigne lesen god eke hys reigne pand alderlaste euerychone paynted pouert al alone nat peny holde although clothes solde though shulde honged naked worme yf wether stormy colde myght haue dyed ne strayte olde sacke many cloute stacke thys cote mantele neuer adele cloth wyth vndertake great leyser quake put talke ferre fro vp halke lurked coured poore thyng shamefaste dispised aye acursed may well daye poore man conceyued god wot al selde iwys pore man well yfedde well arayed ycledde well beloued wyse honour maye aryse pal thynges wel auysed haue er thys deuysed wyth golde assure ouer depaynted wall square wall hygh somdele enclosed ybarred wele stede hegge gardyn come neuer shepherde therin gardyn wel wrought coulde haue brought ladder el degre wolde wel haue lyked solace ioy pley trowe neuer man ne sey place delicious gardyn daungerous herberowe byrdes many one ryche yere neuer none byrdes songe braunches grene therin byrdes mo wene bene al realme fraunce ful blisful accordaunce swete pytous songe made al thys worlde ought glade selfe mery ferde whan blysful songes herde hundred pounde wolde passeage openly vnto free nolde entren se thassemble god kepe care byrdes whych therin ware songen mery throtes daunces loue mery note whan thus herde foules synge fell fast waymentyng whych arte engyn myght come gardyn way couthe fynde none gardayn gone ne nought wyst yf eyther hole place whych might haue entre ne none teache al lone wy wo anguyshe thys tyl laste bethought waye ne myght na ladder ne way pace hole fayre place tho gan go ful great paas enuyron euen compas closyng square wall tyl founde wicket small shette ne might gone entre none vpon dore gan smyte fetys lyte way coulde seke ful longe shofe knocked eke stode full longe al herkenynge herde wyght comynge tyl dore thylke entre mayden curteys opened heer yelowe hewe basen scoured newe fleshe tender chycke bent browes smoth slycke measure large openyng eyen clere nose good proporcion eyen gray faucon swete breth wel sauoured face white wel coloured lytle mouth rounde se cloue chynne eke necke good fassyon length greatnesse reason without bleyne scabbe royne fro hierusalem vnto burgoyne ny fayre necke ywys fele howe smoth softe throte also white hewe snowe braunche snowed newe body ful wel wrought men neden countre fayrer body seke fyne orfrays eke chapelet semely ne wered neuer mayde vpon fayre aboue chapelet rose garlande set gay mirrour wyth rych golde tresour heed tressed queyntly sleues sewed fetously kepe handes fayre gloues white payre cote grene cloth gaunt withouten wene wel semed apparayle wont great trauayle whan kempt fetouslye wel arayed rychly done al iournee mery wel begone ladde lusty lyfe maye thought nyght ne daye nothyng yf onely grayth well vncouthly whan thys dore opened thys may semely se thanked best might asked howe hight asked eke nought vnmeke ne answere daungerous fayre answerde sayd thus lo e name ydelnesse clepe men lesse ful myghty ful ryche one thyng namely entende nothyng ioye playeng kembe trysse aquaynted priue wyth myrth lorde thys gardyne fro lande alexandryne made tree hyther fette thys garden bene ysette whan tree waxen hyght thys wall stant thy syght dyd myrth enclosen al aboute ymages al without dyd hem entayle peynte neyther bene iolyfe ne queynte bene full sorow wo thou haste sene whyle ago ofte tyme hym solace sir myrth commeth place eke wyth hym cometh meyne lyuen lust ioylyte myrth therin byrdes howe syngen clere mauys nyghtyngale ioly byrdes smale thus walketh solace hym hys folke sweter place playen may fynde although sought one tyl inde alther fayrest folke se thys worlde may founde hath myrth wyth hym hys route folowen hym alwayes aboute whan ydelnesse tolde thys herkened wel ywys sayde dame ydelnesse nowe also wysly god blesse syth myrth fayre fre thys yerde wyth meyne fro thylke assemble yf may shal man werne day thys nyght ne mote se wel wene wyth fayre ioly companye fulfylled al curtesye forth without wordes mo wycket went tho idelnesse opened garden fayre se whan ywys myne herte ful glad thys wel wende ful sykerly haue bene paradyse erthly fayre trusteth well semed place espirituell certes deuyse place paradyse good dwel garden thought many byrde syngyng throughout yerde al thryngyng many place nyghtyngales alpes fynches wodwales swete songe delyten thylke place habyten might men se many flockes turtle lauerockes chalaundres fele sawe wery nygh forsongen thrustels teryns mauyse songen wyne hem pryse eke surmount songe birdes hem amonge note made fayre seruise byrdes deuise songe songe fayre well angel done espirituell trusteth whan hem herde ful lusty well ferde neuer yet melodye herde man myght dye swete songe hem amonge thought byrdes songe wonder lyke songe meremaydens see syngyng clere though meremaydens clepe hem englyshe vsaunce men clepe hem sereyns fraunce ententyfe synge byrdes vnkonnynge craft aprentyse songe subtyl wyse certes whan herde songe sawe grene place amonge herte wext wonder gay neuer erst er day iolyfe wel bygo ne mery herte tho wyst sawe ful well ydelnesse serued well put iolyte frende wel ought syth dore gardyn opened let hence forth wrought shal tell thought fyrst wherof myrth serued eke folke wyth hym wythout fable wyl discriue garden eke bliue wol tellen thys fayre fassyon al ywys well wrought none may tel al atones may shall ordure tellen ful fayre seruice eke ful swete byrdes maden sete layes loue ful wel sownyng songen iargonyng hye lowe songe vpon braunches grene ispronge swetnesse melodye made al hert reuelrye whan herde trowe byrdes syngyng rowe myght wyth holde ne went se myrth desyryng hym sene ouer thyng countenaunce hys manere syght full dere tho wet forth ryght hande downe lytell pathe founde myntes full fenell grene fast wythout wene myrth founde ryghte anon vnto myrth gan gon hym solace wyth hym lusty place fayre folke freshe whan sawe woundred fro whence folke myght come fayre wexen lyke syght angel bene fethered bryght folke whych tell vpon karole wenten tho lady karoled hem hyght gladnesse blysful lyght well coulde syng lustely none halfe wel semely couth make songe suche refraynyng sate wonder wel syng voice ful clere ful swete rude ne vnmete couth ynough doyng longeth vnto karollyng wont euery place syngen fyrst folke solace syngyng moost gaue crafte lefe tho myghteste thou karolles sene folke daunce mery bene many fayre turnyng vpon grene grasse springyng myghtest thou se stutours mynstrales eke ioglours wel synge dyd payne songe longes lorayne loreyne note ful sweter thys countre many tymbestere saylours dare wel swere couth craft ful parfetly tymbres vp ful subtelly cast hente ful ofte vpon fynger fayre softe fayled neuer mo ful fetys damosel two ryght yonge ful semelyhede kyrtels none wede fayre tressed euery tresse myrth done hys noblenesse amydde carole daunce therof lyeth remembraunce howe daunced queyntly one wolde come al priuely agayne togyther almoost threwe yfere mouthes play semed kyst alway dauncen well couthe gyse shulde deuyse ne bode neuer thence go whyles sawe hem daunce vpon karole wonder faste gan beholde tyl last lady gan espye cleped curtesye worshypfull debonayre praye god euer fal fayre ful curteysly called ye beau sire come yf lyke dauncen daunceth wyth v wythout taryeng went carollyng abashed neuer dele lyked ryght wele curtesye cleped bade daunce go yf durst certayne wolde haue karoled ryght fayne man daunce right blyth gan loke ofte syth shap bodyes cheres countenaunce maneres folke daunced shall tell ful fayre myrth ful longe high fayrer man neuer sigh rounde appel face full roddy whyte euery place fetys well besey metely mouthe eyen grey hys nose mesure wrought full ryght cryspe heere eke full bryght shulders large brede smallyshe gyrdelstede semed lyke purtreyture noble hys stature fayre ioly fetyse lymmes wrought poynt deuyse delyuer smerte great myght ne sawe thou neuer man lyght herde vnneth nothyng fyrst spryng full yonge mery thought samette wyth byrdes wrought wyth golde beten full fetously hys bodye clad full rychly wrought hys robe straunge gyse slyttered queyntyse many place lowe hye shode great maystrye wyth shone decoped wyth lace drury solace hys leefe rosen chapelet made hys heed set ye hys sefe dame gladnesse hym lefe syngeth well wyth glad corage twelue yere age loue graunt hym made sir myrth fynger hade daunsynge hym also greate loue twixt hem two fayre bryght hewe semed lyke rose newe colour fleshe tendre wyth brere smalle tendre men myght cleue dare well se forheed frouncels al pley bent browes two eyen gray glad also laugheden aye semblaunt fyrst mouthe couenaunt wot nose shal discryue fayre hath woman lyue heere yelowe clere shynyng wot lady lykyng frayes freshe garlande whiche haue sene thousande sawe neuer ywys garlande yet well wrought sylke ouergylte samyte cladde greate delyte whiche leefe robe werde meryer herte ferde next went syde god loue deuyde loue hym lyketh cherles daunten maken folkes pride fallen well lordes thrallen ladyes put lowe degre whan maye hem proude se thys god loue hys fassyoun lyke knaue ne quystroun hys beautie greatly prise robe deuyse drede encombred ycladde sylke floures stourettes paynted wyth amorettes wyth losenges scochons wyth byrdes lyberdes lyon beastes wrought full wele hys garment euerydele ypurtrayed ywrought wyth flour diuers medelynge colour floures many gyse yset compace syse lacked floure dome ne muche floure brome ne vyolet ne eke peruynke ne floure none men thynke many rose lefe full longe entermedled amonge also hys heed set rose reed chapelet nyghtyngales full greate route flyen ouer hys heede aboute leaues felden flyen al byrdes wrien popingay nyghtyngale chaulaundre wodewale wyth fynche larke archagel semed angel downe comen fro heuen clere loue wyth hym bachelere made alwayes wyth hym swete lokynge clepyng thys bacheler stode beholdyng daunce hys hande holdyng turke bowes two full wel deuysed one hem tree beareth fruite sauoure wicke ful croked foule stycke knotty also blacke bery slo vowe plante without wemme dare warrante ful euen proporcion trectes longe ful good fassyon paynted well twhitten ouer al diapred written wyth ladyes bacheleres ful lyghtsome glad cheres bowes two helde swete lokyng semed lyke gadlyng ten brode arowes helde whych fyue hys ryghthande shauen well dyght nocked fethered aryght al wyth golde begon stronge poynted euerychon sharpe keruen wele yron none ne stele al golde men myght se take fethers tree swyfteste arowes fyue bowe dryue best fethered flye fayrest eke cleped beautie arowe hurteth lesse cleped trowe symplesse thyrde cleped fraunchyse fethered noble wyse wyth valour wyth curtesye fourth cleped companie heuy shoten shoteth ryght ywys may therwith done great harme wo fyfth last also fayre semblaunt men arowe cal leest greuous hem al yet make full greate wounde maye hope hys sore sounde hurt wyth arowe ywys hys wo better bestowed maye soner haue gladnesse langour ought lesse fiue arowes gyse bene full foule deuyse shaft end soth tel also black fend hel fyrst hem called pride arowe next hym besyde cleped vyllanye arowe felonye enuenymed wyth spitous blame thyrde hem cleped shame fourth wanhope cleped fyfth newe thought ywys arowes speke fyue one manere resemblable hem wel syttyng able foule croked bowe hydous knotty roynous bowe semed wel shete arowes fyue bene vnmete contrarye fyue though tell blyue power ne myght hereafter shall tellen ryght soth eke signyfyaunce ferre haue remembraunce shall sayd vndertake er thys boke ende make nowe come tale agayne alderfyrst woll sayne fassyon countenaunces al folke daunce god loue iolyte lyght ladde hande lady bryght hygh prise great degre thys lady called beaute arowe whych tolde full well thewed holde ne darke ne browne bryght clere moone lyght agayne whome sterres semen smale candels demen fleshe tender dewe floure chere symple byrde boure whyte lylye rose ryse face gentyll treatyse fetys smale se wyntred browes ne popped neded nought wyndre paynt ought tress yelowe longe straughten vnto heles downe raughten nose mouth eye cheke well wrought remenaunt eke full great sauour swote thought myne herte rote helpe god remembre fassyon euery membre worlde none fayre wyght yonge hewed bryght sore pleasaunt fetyse wyth gent myddell small besyde beaute yede rychesse hyght lady great noblesse great price euery place durst trespace tyll folke werke dede full hardy drede helpe hyndre may yesterday ryche folke haue full great myght helpe eke greue wyght best greatest valoure dydden rychesse full great honoure besy serue wolde loue deserue cleped lady great small thys wyde worlde dredeth thys worlde daungere courte hath many losengere many traytour enuyous ben full besy curious dysprayse blame best deseruen loue name forne folke hem begylen losyngeours hem prayse smylen thus worlde wt worde anoynten afterwarde pryll poynten folke ryght bare bone behynde backe ben gone foule abaten folkes pryse full many worthy man wyse han hyndred ydon dye losyngeours wyth flaterye maketh folke full straunge hem ought ben pryue well yuell mote thryue thee yuell aryued mote losengeours full enuye good man loueth companye rychesse robe purple hadde ne trowe lye madde thys worlde none lyche ne thousande dele ryche ne none fayre full wele wyth orfreyes leyde euerydele purtrayde rybanynges duke story kynges wyth bende golde tassyled knoppes fyne golde amyled aboute necke gentyll entayle shette ryche cheuesayle whych full great plente stone clere fayre se prychesse gyrdell vpon bokell ston vertue great mokell myght bare stone bryght venyme durste hym nothynge dout whyle stone hym stone greatly loue tyll ryche man behoue worth golde rome fryse mourdant wrought noble gyse stone full precious fyne vertuous whole man couth make palsye toth ake yet stone suche grace seker euery place thylke daye blynde bene fastynge myght stone sene barres golde full fyne vpon tyssue satyne full heuy great nothynge lyght eueryche besaunt wyght vpon tress rychesse set cercle noblesse brende golde full lyght shone fayre trowe neuer none konnynge none coulde deuyse stone cercle shewen clere wonder thynge man coulde prayse gesse hem value rychesse rubyes saphyrs ragounces emeraudes two ounce full subtelly fyne charboncle sette sawe stone clere bryght soone nyght men myght sene go nede myle two length brede lyght sprange stone rychesse wonder bryght shone heed face eke aboute place dame rychesse honde gan lede yonge man full semelyhede best loued thynge hys lust moche housholdynge clothynge full fetyse loued well haue horse pryse wende haue reproued thefte murdre yf hys stable hackenay therfore desyred aye ben acqueynted wyth rychesse hys purpose gesse make great dyspence wythouten warnynge defence rychesse myght well sustene dyspences wel mayntene hym alwaye suche plentye sende golde syluer spende wythout lackynge daungere pourde garnere daunce went largesse set entent ben honorable free alexander kynne moste ioye ywys yafe sayd haue thys auaryce foule caytyfe halfe grype ententyfe largesse yeue spende god alwaye ynowe sende yaue awaye ywys alwaye great loo hath largesse great pryse wyse folke vnwyse wholy bandon brought well wyth yeftes hath wrought yf enemy trowe couth craftely make hym full sone frende large yeftes wyse therfore stode loue grace ryche poore euery place full great foole ywys ryche poore nygarde lorde maye haue maner vyce greueth auaryce nygarde neuer wyth strength hande may wynne hym great lordshyp lande frendes fewe hath done hys wyll performed woll haue frendes maye holde hys treasour dere ensample tell thys ryght adamant ywys drawen hym subtelly yron layde therby draweth folkes hertes ywys syluer golde yeuen largesse robe freshe ryche purpure sarlynyshe well fourmed face clere opened colere ryght present vnto lady made present golde broche full well wrought certes myssate nought smocke wrought sylke fleshe sene whyte mylke largesse worthy wyse helde honde knyght pryse sybbe arthour breteygne bare enseygne worshyp gousfaucoun yet suche renoun men hym saye fayre thynges baron erles kynges thys knyght comen newly fro tourneynge faste done great chyualrye hys vertue hys maystrye loue hys lemman caste downe many doughty man nexte hym daunced dame frauchyse arayed full noble gyse na browne ne dunne hewe whyt snowe yfallen newe nose wrought poynt deuyse gentyll tretyse wyth eyen glad browes hent heer downe heles went symple downe tree full debonayre herte durst neyther saye ne hyr longeth yf man dystresse loue heuynesse herte wolde haue full great pyte amyable free man bestadde wolde ben ryght sore adradde dyd ouer great outrage hym holpe hys harme taswage thought vylanye suckeny hempe heerdes fayre none arras lorde ryddeled fetylly na poynt truely na hys ryght assyse full well yclothed fraunchyse ny cloth sytteth bette damosell doth rokette woman well fetyse rokette cote ywys whyte rokette ryddeled fayre betokeneth full debonayre swete bere daunced bachelere tellen hyght fayre good hyght ben saye lordes sonne wyndesore next daunced curtesye praysed lowe hye neyther proude ne fole daunce called praye god gyue good grace come fyrst place na nyce ne outrageous wyse ware vertuous fayre speche fayre answere neuer wyght myssayde bare rauncour wyght clere browne therto bryght face body auenaunt wotte lady pleasaunt worthy bene emperesse crowned quene went knyght dauncynge worthy well speakynge full well coude done honour knyght fayre styffe stour armure semely man welbeloued hys lemman pfayre idelnesse saugh alwaye fast haue wythout fayle tolde shappe appareyle sayd lo dyd great bounte gate garden vndyd let passen daunced gesse fulfylled lustynesse na yet xij yere age wyth herte wylde thought volage nyce ne mente none harme ne sleyght entente onely lust iolyte yonge folke well weten ye haue lytell thought playe lemman besyde alwaye suche gyse kyste tymes hym lyste daunce myght se make force preuyte spake hem yuell wele ashamed neuer dele men myght sene hem kysse two yonge douues yonge thylke bachelere beaute wote none hys pere ryght suche age youth hys lefe suche corage lusty folke daunced also wyth hem meyne full hende folke wyse free folke fayre porte truely comenly sene countenaunces hem ladden thus daunces wyll gone se garden lyked loken fayre laurelles pyne tree cedres olmeres daunces ended many hem daunced wyth loues went away vnder tree haue playe lorde lyued lustely great foole sekerly nolde hys thakes lyfe lede thys dare sayne drede myght well fare better lyfe durst hym care ny good paradyse haue loue hys deuyse place went tho gardyn gan go playenge alonge full merely god loue full hastely vnto hym swete lokynge clepte lenger wolde kepte hys bowe golde shone bryght hem bent anone ryght full sone sette ende brayde gan bende toke hym hys arowes fyue full sharpe ready dryue nowe god sytteth maieste fro deedly woundes kepe yf shete yf wyth hys arowe mete greued sore ywys nothynge wyst thys went vp downe full many waye folowed fast alwaye wolde resle tyll garden garden measurynge ryght euen square compasynge longe large fruyte euery tre hys charge hydous tree whych two thre wote full wele pome garnettes full great dele frute full well lyke namely folke syke tree great foyson baren nuttes season suche men nutmygges call swote sauour ben wythall almandres great plente fygges many date tre yf men nede gardyn length brede eke werynge many spyce clowe gylofre lycorice gyngere greyne de parys canell setewale pry many spyce delytable eaten men ryse fro table many homely tree ther peches coynes apple bere medlers plommes peeres chesteynis cheryse whych many one fayne note aleys bola sene solas wyth many hygh laurer pyne renged clene gardyne wyth cypre wyth olyueris whych nygh plenty elmes great stronge maple ashe oke aspe plant longe fyne ewe popler lyndes fayre tree full many payre shulde tell many tree yet shulde encombred er rekened euery tree tree sette deuyse one another assyse fyue fadome syxe trowe hye great also kepe well sonne croppes thycke yronne euery braunche knytte full grene leues sytte sonne myght none dyscende lest tender grass shende myght men roe yse squyrels full great plente bowe bowe alwaye lepynge connes also playenge comyn clapers sondry colour maners maden many tourneynge vpon freshe grasse spryngynge place sawe welles whych frogges fayre shadowe euery well ne nombre tell stremys small deuyse myrthe done come condyse whych water rennynge gan make noyse full lykynge aboute brynkes welles stremes ouer elles sprange vp grasse thycke yset softe veluet whych men myght hys lemman ley fetherbed pley erthe full soft swete moysture well wete spronge vp sote grene gras fayre thycke myster moche amended place therth suche grace floures hath plente somer wynter sprange vyolet al newe freshe peruynke ryche hewe floures yelowe whyte rede suche plente grewe neuer mede full gaye grounde queynt poudred men peynt wyth many freshe sondrye floure casten vp full good sauoure woll longe holde fable thys garden delectable mote tonge stynten nede ne maye wythouten drede naught tellen beaute ne halfe bounte wyth went ryght hande lefte aboute place lefte tyll garden bene efters men myght sene thus whyle wente playe god loue folowed aye ryght hunter abyde beest tyll seeth hys tyde shoten goodmesse dere hym nedeth go nere befyll rested besydes well vnder tree whych tree fraunce men call pyne syth tyme kynge pepyne ne grewe tree mannes syght fayre ne well woxe hyght yarde hygh none spryngynge marble stone nature set soth tell vnder pyne tree well border wythout wrytten stone letter small sayden thus starfe fayre narcisus narcisus bachelere loue caught hys daungere hys nette gan hym strayne dyd hym wepe playne nede hym muste hys lyfe forgo fayre lady hyght echo hym loued ouer creature gan hym suche payne endure tyme hym tolde yf louen nolde behoued nedes dye laye none remedye nathelesse hys beaute fyers daungerous nolde graunten askynge wepynge ne fayre prayenge herde hym werne herte great wo toke great dyspyte wythout respyte deed anone ere deyde full pytously god prayde proude herte narcisus loue daungerous myght daye ben hampred loue bene hote wo neuer myght ioye attayne shulde fele euery vayne sorowe true louers maken ben vyllaynously forsaken thys prayer reasonable therfore god held ferme stable narcisus shortly tell auenture came ye well rest hym shadowynge daye come huntinge thys narcisus suffred paynes rennynge daye playnes thurst great dystresse herte hys werynesse hys breth almost nomen wel ycomen shadowed braunches grene thought thylke water shene drynke freshe hym well wythall downe knee gan fall forth hys necke heed straught drynke well draught water anone sene hys nose hys mouth hys eyen shene therof abashed hys owne shadowe hym betrasshed well wende forme se chylde great beaute well couth loue hym wreke tho daunger pryde also narcisus somtyme hym bere quyte hym well hys guerdon mused well shortly soth tell loued hys owne shadowe laste starfe wo sawe hys wyll myght maner waye fulfyll faste caught hym couth comforte naught lost hys wytte ryght place deyde wythin lytell space thus hys waryson toke lady forsoke ladyes praye ensample taketh ye ayenst loue mystaketh yf death wyte god full well wyle quyte yt thys lettre whych tel taught yt ye welle narcisus hys beaute gan anon wythdrawe fell remembraunce hym betyde suche myschaunce last thought scathlesse full sekerly myght vnto welle go wherof shulde abashen vnto welle went downe louted se clere water stone eke grauell whych shone downe botome syluer fyne welle thys fyne worlde none clere hewe water euer freshe newe welmeth vp wyth wawes bryght mountenaunce two fynger hyght aboute grasse spryngynge moyste thycke well lykynge ne maye wynter dye maye see drye downe botome set sawe two cristall stone craftely thylke freshe fayre well thynge sothly dare tell ye woll holde great maruayle tolde wythouten fayle sunne clere syght caste welle hys bemes bryght heete dyscended taketh cristall stone ywys agayne sonne hundred hewes blewe yelowe reed fresh new yet hath meruaylous cristall suche strength place ouer foule tree leues grene yerde sene done vnderstonde make ensample woll fonde ryght myrrour openly sheweth thynge standeth therby well coloure fygure wythouten couerture ryght cristall stone shynynge wythouten dysceyuynge entree yerde accuseth hym water museth euer whych halfe ye ye maye well halfe gardyne se yf turne maye ryght wele sene remnaunt euery dele none lytell thynge hydde ne closed wyth shyttynge ne sene though paynted cristall thys myrrour perillus whych proude narcisus sey hys fayre face bryght made hym syth lye vpryght loketh myrrour may nothynge hys socour ne shall se somthynge shall hym lede laughynge full many worthy man hath yblent folke greatest wyt ben soone caught wayted wythouten respyte ben beyted cometh folke newe rage chaungeth many wyght corage lyeth rede ne wytte therto venus sonne dan cupido hath sowen loue sede helpe ne lyeth none ne rede cercleth welle aboute hys gynne hath set withoute right catche hys panters damosel bachelers loue wyll none byrde catche though set eyther nette latche sede sowen thys welle cleped well knowen welle loue ryght whyche hath full many wyght spoken bokes dyuersely shull neuer verily discripcion welle ne eke sothe thys matere ye shull whan haue vndo crafte belongeth al way lyked dwell sene christall well shewed full openly thousande thynges faste may say sory houre stode loken powre sythen sore syghed myrrour hath nowe entriked fyrst knowen wyt vertue strengthes nolde haue mused bette ben el snare fell anone bytreshed many one thylke myrrour sawe tho amonge thousande thynges mo roser charged full rosis hedge aboute enclosis tho suche luste enuye parys ne pauye nolde haue lefte gone se greatest heape rose whan thys rage hente caught hath many man shente towarde roser gan go whan ferre therfro sauour rose swote smote right herte rote enbaumed yf ne endouted haue ben hated assayled thankes woll haue fayled pull rose route bere myne honde aboute smellen went euer dredde repent leste greued forthought lorde thylke gardyn wrought rose great wone fayre ware neuer rone knoppes close sawe well better woxen ben moyson drowe nygh season spedde hem faste sprede loue well suche rose rede brode rose open also ben passed day two knoppes wyll freshe two dayes leest el thre knoppes greatly lyked fayrer may man se myght haue one ought hym ben full lefe withall myght garlonde hem geten rychesse wolde leten amonges knoppes chefe one fayre remenaunt none ne preyse halfe well whan auyse wyt well enlumyned wyth colour reed wel fyned nature couthe make fayre hath leaues wel foure payre kynde hath set hys knowynge aboute redde rose springyng stalke ryshe ryght theron stode knoppe vpright ye bowed vpon syde swote smel spronge wyde dyed place aboute whan smelled sauour swote wyll fro thence yet go somdele nere went tho take myne honde drede ne durste rose bede thystels sharpe many maners netles thornes hoked brier moche distourbled sore dradde harmed god loue bowe bent day set hys talent pursue spyen stondyng fygge tree whan sawe chosen ententifly bothum vnto paye say toke arowe ful sharply whette hys bowe whan sette streight vp hys eere drough stronge bowe tough shotte wonder smerte myn eye vnto myn herte takel smote depe wente therwithal colde hente vnder clothes warme softe sythen day haue chyuered ofte whan hurte thus stounde fell downe platte vnto grounde myne hert fayled faynted aye longe tyme swoune laye whan came swounyng wytte felyng al mate wende full wele bloode haue lorne full great dele certes arowe stoode ne drewe droppe bloode founde woundes al drey toke myn hondes twey arowe full faste ought plyght pullyng sore syght laste shafte tree drough fethers thre yet hoked heed ywis whiche beaute called gan depe myne herte pace myght arace myn hert styll stoode bledde droppe bloode bothe anguyshous trouble peryll sawe double nyste say ne get leche woundes neyther grasse ne rote ne helpe hope ne bote bothum euer mo myn herte drewe wo thought none thyng ben kepyng wolde haue brought lyfe agayne certes euenly dare wel sayne syght onely sauoure alegged moche langoure gan drawe towarde bothom fayre se loue get hym throwe another arowe hys bowe shote gan hym dresse arowes name symplesse whan loue gan nygh nere drowe vp withouten shotte wyth al hys myght thys arowe anon ryght throughout eygh founde myn herte hath made wounde anon dyd crafte drawen shafte therwithall syghed efte myn herte heed lefte whyche aye encresed desyre vnto bothom drowe nere euermo wo desyre go vnto roser grewe freshe bothom bright hewe better haue letten behoued nede ryght myne herte badde euer body muste ladde herte wele wo force togyther muste go neuer archer wolde fyne shote wyth hys pyne make hym mete thyrde arowe gan shete whan best hys tyme myght espye whiche named curtesye myne herte dyd auale swoune fell bothe deed pale longe tyme lay styrred nought tyll abrayde thought faste auysed drawe shafte tree euer heed lefte behynde aught couthe pull wynde sore stycked whan hytte crafte myght flytte anguyshous full thought lefte suche wo wounde aye wrought somoned alway go towarde rose plesed ne durste manere bycause archer nere euermore gladly rede brent chylde fyre hath moche drede certes yet al peyne though syght yet arowes reyne grounde quarels sharpe steele ne payne might fele yet myght selfe holde fayre roser beholde loue yaue suche hardyment fulfyll hys commaundement vpon fete rose vp feble wounded man forthe gon might sette archer nolde lette towarde roser faste drowe thornes sharpe mo ynowe also thystels thicke breres brymme pricke ne myght get grace roughe thornes pace sene freshe rose hewe muste abyde thought rewe hedge thycke closed rose compas thyng lyked right wele nyghe myght fele bothom swote odoure also se freshe coloure right greatly lyked nere might se suche ioye anon therof forgate maladye sene suche delyte sorowe angre quyte woundes thore thyng lyken myght dwellen roser aye thence neuer passe awaye whan whyle thare god loue whyche share myne herte wyth hys arowes kene casteth hym yeue woundes grene shotte full hastely arowe named company whyche takell full able make ladyes merciable anon gan chaungen hewe greuaunce wounde newe agayne fel swounyng syghed sore complaynyng sore complayned sore gan greuen non hope allegeaunce nygh drowe disperaunce rought dethe ne lyfe whether loue wolde dryfe martyr wolde make might hys power forsake whyle anger thus woke god loue arowe toke ful sharpe pugnaunt called fayre semblaunt whiche wyse wol consent louer hym repente serue hys loue herte peryll may befall though thys arowe kene grounde rasour founde cutte kerue poynte god loue anoynte wyth precious oyntment somdele yeue alegement vpon woundes hade body herte made helpe sore cure may bette endure yet thys arowe without made myne herte large sore full great payne abode aye oyntement went abrode throughout woundes large wyde spredde aboute euery syde whose vertue whose myght myne herte ioyfull lyght ben deed shent precious oyntment shafte drowe arowe rokyng wo right wonder narowe heed whiche made smerte lefte behynde myne herte wyth foure dare wel say neuer woll take away oyntment halpe wele yet suche sorowe dyd fele al day chaunged hewe woundes freshe newe men might se vysage arowes ful rage varyaunt diuersyte men n eueryche myght se bothe great anoye eke swetnesse ioye meynt bytternesse nowe easy wood hem felte bothe harme good nowe sore without aleggement nowe softyng wyth oyntment softned pricketh thus ease anger togyther god loue delyuerly come lepande hastely sayd great iape yelde thou may escape may defence auayle therfore rede make daungere thou wolte yelde hastely thou shalt rather haue mercy foole sykernesse wyth daunger stoutnesse rebelleth shulde plese suche folye lytell ese meke thou muste nedes bowe stryue ayen nought thy prowe come atones haue ydo woll yelde debonairly answered full humbly gladly sir byddyng wol yelde thyng seruyce woll take god defende shulde make ayen byddyng resystence woll great offence yf dyd skyll ye may wyth ye wyll saue spyll also slo fro wyse may go lyfe dethe honde may laste bonde playne lyste yelde hopyng herte somtyme ye comforte ese shull sende el shortly ende withouten helthe mote aye dure yf ye take cure comforte helthe howe shulde haue sythe ye hurte ye saue helthe loue mote founde token fyrst wounde yf ye lyst make prisoner woll take herte wyll fully gre holy playne yelde wythout feynyng feyntyse gouerned empryse moche price woll ben hole deuyce fulfyll lykyng repente nothyng hopyng haue yet tyde mercy abyde wyth couenaunt yelde anone downe knelyng vpon kne proferyng kysse hys fete nothyng wolde lete said loue bothe preise sen thyn answer doth ese thou answered curtesly wote wel vtterly thou arte gentyll thy speche though man ferre wolde seche shulde fynden certayne suche answere vilayne suche worde ne myght nought isse vilayns thought thou shalt lesen thy speche thy helpyng woll eche eke encresen maye fyrst woll thou obaye fully thyne auauntage anon homage sythe kysse thou shalte mouthe whiche vilayne neuer couthe aproche ne touche saufe cherles ne vouche shall neuer neyght nere curteys fayre manere well taught full gentylnysse muste ben shall kysse also full hygh fraunchyse shall atteyne emprese fyrst thyng warne payne great aduersyte mote endure eke trauayle shall serue without fayle agaynst comforte wyth thy seruyce disporte thou mayst full glad ioyfull good mayster haue lorde hygh renoun beare loue gonfenoun curtesy banere selfe manere gentyll curteys meke fre euer ententyfe honoure doute serue also hym obserue fro trespace fro vilanye hym gouerne curtesye wyth wyll wyth entencion whan fyrst prison caught muste vtterly fro thence forthe full besyly caste hym gentyll desyre helpe anon without delay withouten daunger affray become hys man anone gaue hym thankes many one kneled downe wyth hondes ioynt made porte ful queynt ioye went hert rote whan kyssed hys mouthe swote suche myrthe suche lykyng cured languyshyng asked hostage ha te sayd taken fele homage one haue bene disteyned ofte withouten wene felon ful falsyte haue many sythes begyled falshede luste acheued wherof repent agreued hem get daungere falshede shull bye full dere loue say playne woll certayne sore woll nowe bynde thou away ne shalt wynde denyen couenaunt done auenaunt thou false great ruthe sythe thou semest full truthe sir yf lyst vnderstande meruayle askyng thys demande wherfore shulde ye hostage borowes aske sykernesse sythe ye wot sothfastnesse ye haue susprised hole myne herte taken fro woll nothyng yf byddyng myne herte myn right nought behoueth dede thought redy worche wyll whether turne good yll sore lusteth plese man therof may disese ye haue theron sette suche iustyse werreyed many wyse yf ye doute nolde obey ye may therof make key holde wyth hostage nowe certes thys none outrage quod loue fully accorde body full lorde hath herte hys tresore outrage asken aumener drough lytell key fetyse ynough gold polished cler said wt key thyn hert nowe woll shette iowell loke knette bynde vnder lytell key wight maye cary awey key full great poste wyth whyche anon touched vnder syde full softely myne herte sodaynly wythout anoye hadde speered yet right nought hath deered whan hadde done wyll putte hem doute syr sayd haue right great wyll luste pleasure fulfyll loke ye seruyce take gree thylke faythe ye owe saye nought recreaundyse nought doute seruyce seruaunt traueyleth vayne seruen dothe hys payne vnto lorde whyche wyse conne hym thanke hys seruyce loue sayd dismay nought syth thou socour haste sought thake thy seruice wol take high degree woll make wyckednesse ne hynder hoope shall nought worshyppe wyght auenture maye come yf payne endure abyde suffre thy distresse hurteth nowe shall lesse wotte selfe maye saue medicyne thou woldest haue yf thy trouthe thou kepe shall vnto thyne helpyng eke cure thy woundes make hem clene olde grene thou shalte holpen wordes fewe certaynly thou shalte well shewe thou seruest good wyll accomplyshen fulfyll commaundementes daye nyght whyche louers yeue right ah syr goddes loue sayd er ye passe hen ententyfely commaundemetes ye say shall kepe hem yf may hem kepen thought yf wote hem nought maye vnwyttingly wherfore praye entierly wyth myne herte lere trespace manere god loue charged anone ye shall se worde worde right empryse romaunt shall deuyse maister leseth hys tyme lere whan disciple woll nat vayne hym swynke hys lernynge woll nat thynke luste loue lette hym entende nowe romance begynneth amede nowe good faye canne saye poynt reason sette gate ywis shall nat well thyng brought good vnderstondyng reder poynteth yll good sentence maye ofte spyl boke good endyng made newe lusty thyng woll endyng crafte loue shall nowe lere woll longe abyde tyll thys romance maye vahyde vndo sygnyfiaunce thys dreme romaunce sothfastnesse nowe hydde without couerture shall kydde whan vndone haue thys dremyng wherin worde leasyng villany begynnyng woll saye loue ouer thyng thou leaue yf thou wolte false trespace ayenst curse blame generally hem louen villany villany maketh villeyne hys dedes chorle seyne villayns arne without pyte frendshyp loue bounte nyll receyue vnto seruyce hem ben villayns emprise vnderstonde thyne entent thys myne entendement clepe wight age onely gentyll hys lynages vertuous hys porte outragyous whan suche one thou seest beforne though gentyll borne thou mayste well seyne thys sothe gentyll bycause dothe longeth gentylman hem none deme certaynly withouten drede chorle demed hys dede hye lowe ye may se kynrede ne say nought none yuell wyll thyng holden styll worshyp missey thou mayste ensample take key somtyme missayeng hated bothe olde yonge ferre gaw yn worthy preysed hys curtesye kaye hated fell worde dispytous cruell wherfore wyse aqueyntable goodly worde resonable bothe lesse eke mare whan thou comest men loke thou haue custome aye fyrst salue hem yf thou maye yf fall hem somme salue fyrst domme quyte hem curtesly anon wythout abydyng er gon nothyng eke thy tonge applye speke wordes rybaudrye villayne speche degre late neuer thy lyppe vnbounden nought holde hym good faythe curteys foule wordes saythe woman serue preyse thy power honour reyse yf missayere dispise woman thou mayst blame byde hym holde styll sette thy myght thy wyll woman ladyes please thynge may hem ease euer speke good thou mayst best praysed loke fro pride thou kepe wele thou mayst perceyue fele pride bothe foly synne pryde hath wythin ne may hys herte wyse meken ne souplen seruyce pride founde euery parte contrarye vnto loues arte loueth trewly shulde hym conteyne iolyly wythout pride sondrie wyse hym disgysen queyntyse queynte aray wythout drede nothyng proude taketh hede freshe aray men may se wythout pride may ofte mayntayne thy selfe thy rent robe eke garment many syth fayre clothyng man amendeth much thyng loke alwaye shape garment thou shalte make hym beste wythall parteyneth therto poyntes sleues wel syttande ryght streyght hande shone bootes newe fayre loke leest thou haue payre sytte fetously rude may vtterly meruayle syth sytte playne howe come agayne weare strayte gloues wyth aumere sylke alway wyth good chere thou gyue yf thou haue rychesse yf thou haue naught spende lesse alwaye mery yf thou may wast thy good alway haue
