lyeth ieopardye eke myne emes lyfe lyeth balaunce nathelesse god gouernaunce shall done myne honour shal kepe eke lyfe stynt wepe harmes two lesse chese yet leuer maken hym good chere honour myne emes lyfe lese ye sayne ye nothyng el requere wy myne owne nece dere wel wyll payne shal myne hert ayen lust constrayne yt nyll nat holden hym honde ne loue man nought ne maye ayenst wyll el wol fonde myn honor saue plese day today therto nolde nat one haue sayde naye dred fantasye cesse cause aye cesseth maladye make protestation processe yf ye deper go certaynly sauacion though ye steruen two though worlde day ne shall neuer hym haue routh graut wel pandare trouth maye trust wel quod thyng yt ye han hyght ye woll holde truly vnto yea doutlesse quod myne vncle dere ne shal haue cause matere quod playne ofter preche parde nedeth speche tho fyll tale glade tyll last good eme quod tho loue god v made tell fyrst ye wysten wo wot none ye sayd wel speke loue prey tel bet shal puruey tho pandarus lyte gan smyle sayd trouth shall tell daye nat gone full longe whyle within paleyes garden well gan well halfe daye dwell ryght speken ordinaunce grekes mitghten disauaunce soone gone lepe casten dartes two fro tyll last sayd wolde slepe grasse adowne layd tho gan roman fro tyll herde walked alone began full wofully grone tho gan stalke hym softly behynde sekerly soth sayne clepe ayen mynde right thus loue gan hym playn sayde lorde haue routh vpon payne haue ben rebell myne entent nowe men culpa lorde repent god thy disposition ledest fyne iust purueyaunce euery wyght lowe confession accept gree sende suche penaunce lyketh disesperaunce may goost depart alway fro thou shylde thy benignitie certes lord sore hath wouded stode black lokyng eye hertes botom yfounded thrugh wot yt mot nedes dyen ye worst dar nought bewreye well hoter ben gledes red men hem wren wt ashen pale deed smot heed adowne anon gan muttre nat truly gan styll away gone let thereof nothyng wyst came agayne anon stode hym sayd awake ye slepen longe semeth nought yt loue doth wronge slepen noma may awake whosey euer dull man ye frende quod ye heedes ake loue let lyuen lord wo pale wan yet made tho fresh countenaunce though shuld haue led new dauce passed forth tyll daye fell come runnyng alone chaber founde yt laye vpon bed man sore grone ne herde neuer mone ne wyst nought comynge al sodaynly left complaynyng toke somwhat suspectioun nere come founde hym wepe sore god wyse sauatioun neuer thyng routh neyther wyth engyn ne lore vnnethes myght fro deth hym kepe yet fele myne hert hym wepe god wot neuer syth borne busy noman preche ne neuer wyght depe sworne er tolde myght ben leche rehersen spech al wofull wordes sowne ne bid nouyt ye woll se swon saue lyfe el nought non harm thus driuen ye loue god v hath wrouyt chere doth may liue haue plat myne hert shryue syth ye wot myne entent clene take hede therof none euyll mene riyt good thrift pray god haue ye han one ycaught withouten net ye wyse ye fayre se wel rynge ruby set neuer two well ymet whan ye ben hole ther mighty god yet graut v se hour nay therof spake nat aha quod helpe god ye shenden euery dele mercy dere nece anon quod whatso spake ment nought wele mar god helmed stele beth wroth blod nece dere nowe well quod foryeuen toke leue home wet yea lord glad wel bygon creseyde arose lenger ne stent streyght closet went anon set downe styll stone euery worde gan vp wynde sayd came mynde woxe somdele astoned thought ryght newe case whan yt ful auysed tho founde ryght nouyt peryll ought aferde man maye loue possibilitie woman hert may brest nat loue ayen leste sate alone thought thus thascrye arose scarmoche al without men cryed strete se troylus hath right put flyght yu grekes rout gonne al meyne shoute go se cast vp yates wyde strete mot palys ryde waye fro yates none dardanus open cheyne come al folke anone easy pace rydyng route tweyne right happy day sothe seyne whiche men sayth may nat disturbed shal betyde necessyte troylus sate baye stede al armed saue heed ful ry ely wounded horse gan blede whiche rode pace ful softely suche knyghtly syght trewly nat withouten fayle loke mar god batayle lyke man armes knyght sene fulfylled hygh prowesse bothe body myght thyng wel hardynesse eke sene geare dresse freshe yonge weldy semed heuen vpon se helme hewen twenty place tyssue honge backe behynde shelde dasshed wt swerdes wt mace whiche men myght many arowe fynd thyrled horne nerfe rynde aye people cried cometh ioy next brother holder vp troye whiche wext lytel reed shame whan herd people vpon cryen holde noble game sobrelych cast adowne eyen cresceyde anon gan chere espyen let softe hert synke selfe sayde yaue drynke al owne thought wore red remembryng ryght thus lo yt myne vncle swereth mot deed hym haue mercy pytie yt thought pure ashamed gan heed pull fast whyle people forth past gan cast rollen vp downe within thought excellent prowesse estate also renowne wyt shap eke gentyllesse fauour distresse al thought routh sleen suche one yf ment trouthe pnow myght enuyous iangle thus sodayn loue might lyghtly loued troylus ryght fyrst syght yea parde whoso sayd mote neuer euery thynge gynnyng hath nede er al wrought withouten drede saye nat sodaynly yafe hym loue gan enclyne lyken hym tho haue tolde manhod pyne made loue within gan myne processe good seruyce wan loue sodayne wyse also blysfull venus wele arayed sat seuenth house heuen tho disposed wele aspectes payed helpe sely troylus wo soth sayne na nat al fo troylus natiuitie god wote wele sooner sped let v stynt troylus throwe rydeth forth let v turne fast vnto creseyde yt henge heed full lowe sat alone gan cast wheron wolde apoynt last eme ne wolde cesse troylus vpon presse lorde gan thought argue matter haue tolde best wer eschue plyted full oft many solde hert warme cold thought sowhat shal write myne autor lysteth tendyte thought fyrst troylus persone knewe syght eke gentelnesse thus sayd al wer nought graut loue yet worthynes wer honour play gladnesse honestie suche lorde dele myne estate also heale eke wel wot kynges sonne syth hath se suche delyte yf wolde vtterlyche syght flye peraduenture might haue despite miyt stod worse plyte wyse bate purchace without nede may stonde grace euery thyng wot lyeth mesure though man forbyd dronkenesse nought forbyddeth euery creature nlesse alwaye gesse eke syth wot distresse ne ought nat thyng hym despyse syth meaneth good wyse eke knowe longe tyme agone thewes good ny nat nyce vauntour sayne men certayn non wyse done great vyce ne al nyl hym neuer cherice shall make auaunt iust cause shall neuer bynde suche clause set case hardest iwys men myght demen loueth dishonour vnto may iche let nay parde knowe also alwaye se men louen woman al towne werse nay without dout thynke eke worthy haue al noble towne thryftyest woman yf honour saue worthyest saue onely hector best yet lyfe lyeth al nowe cure suche loue eke myne auenture ne loue wondre nought well wot selfe god spede woll none wyst thought one fayrest drede goodlyest whoso taketh hede men sayne al towne troye woder though haue ioye myne owne woman well ease thanke god myne estate right yonge stond vntyed lusty lese withouten ielousye suche debate shal husbond sayne checke mate eyther ben full ielousye masterfull louen nouelry shal fyne lyue thus shal nat loue case yf lest pardieux religious though myne hert set rest vpon knyght worthyest kepe alway myne honour name ryght may shame right whan son shyneth bright marche yt chaungeth oft tyme face cloude put wt wynde flight ouersprat sonne space cloudy thought ga soul pace ouersprad bryght thoughtes feare almoost gan fall thouyt ala syth fre sulde loue put ieopardye sykernesse thrallen lybertye ala durst thynken follye may well folke aspye dredful ioy constreynt payne loueth non ne hath waye playne loue yet stormy lyfe ryght hym selfe euer begon euer mystrust nyce stryfe loue cloude ouer sun therto wretched wome nothing co whan v wo wepe syt thynke wrech owne wo drynke also wycked tonges bene prest speke v harme eke men vntrue ryght anon cessed lest cesseth loue forth loue anewe harme ydo done whoso rewe thouy loue hem first rede full sharpe begynnyng breketh oft ende ofte tyme maye men rede sene treson woman hath fyne suche loue sene becommeth whan go wyght wote trowe wher becometh lo wiyt sporneth erst nothynge nought tourneth besy yf loue eke must plesen hem iangle loue demen coyen hem say harm though ther cause yet hem semen al harme yt folke frendes quemen may stoppen euery wycked tonge sowne bel whyle yt ben ronge thought gan clere sayd yt nothyng vndertaketh nothyng acheueth hym loth dere wt though hert quaketh tha slepeth hope drede awaketh hote cold thus betwixe twey rysle vp went pley adowne stayre anonryght tho went gardyn neces thre vp downe made many went flexippe tarbe antigone playen ioye se woman great route folowed garden yerd large rayled aleyes shaddowed wel wt blosomy bowes grene benched newe soded al wayes walketh arm arme betwene tyll last antigone shene gan troyan songe syngen clere heuen voyce heare said loue haue shall ben humble subiect trewe myne entent best lorde yeue yche euermore hertes lust rent neuer yet thy grace wyght sent blysfull cause lyfe lede al ioye suretie drede blysful god hath wel beset loue iwys bereth lyfe ymagynen ne coulde bet lorde withouten ielousye stryfe loue one moost ententyfe seruen wel vntweryly vnfayned euer lest harme distayned well worthynesse trouth ground myrrour godlyheed wyt apollo stone sykernesse vertue roote lust fynder heed sorowe fro deed ywys loue hym best doth good thrift haue whersoeuer shulde thaken god loue blysse bath gynne thanked ye lorde loue ryght lyfe flemen al maner vyce synne doth vertue entende daye day wyll amende sayth ye loue vyce thraldome though felt distresse eyther enuyous ryght nyce vnmyghty shreudnesse louen suche maner folke gesse diffamen loue nothyng knowe speken bent neuer bowe sonne worse kynde ryght though yt man feblenesse eyen may nat endure se bryght loue worse wretch cryen wele worth yt may sorowe dryen thy hath heed verre fro cast stone ware hym werre al myne hert al myght haue sayde wol loue vnto last dere hert myne owne knyght myne hert growen fast shall euer last dredde fyrst loue hym begyn wot well peryll songe right wt worde stent therwithal nowe nece creseyde made song wt good entent antygone answerde anone sayde madame ywys goodlyest mayde great estate al towne troye led lyfe moost honour ioye soth semeth songe quod tho creseyde gan therwtih sike said lorde blysse amonge louers fayre endite yea wysse quod freshe antygone whyte al folke haue bene lyue ne conne wel blysse loue discryue wene ye euery wretche wote parfyte blysse loue nay ywys wenen al loue yf one hote way way wote nothing menne mote asken sayntes yf ought faire heue tell aske fendes yf foule hell creseide vnto purpose naught answerde sayd ywys wol nyght faste euery word herde gan printen herte faste aye gan loue lasse agaste dyd erst synken herte waxe somwhat able conuerte dayes honour heuens eye night foe al thys clepe sunne gan westren fast downwarde wrie hys dayes course yrunne whyte thinges woxen dymme donne lacke lyght sterres apere al folke went yfere whan lyked gone reste voyded voyden oughte sayd slepen well leste woman sone tyl bed broughte wha al hust tha lay styl thoughte al thys thynge maner wyse reherce nedeth nat ye bene wyse nyghtyngale vpon cedre grene vnder chamber wal lay ful loude songe ayen mone shene parauenture hys byrdes wyse lay loue made herte freshe gaye herkened longe good entente tyl last deed slepe hente slept anon ryght tho mette howe egle fethered white bone vnder brest hys longe clawes sette hert rent anone dyd hert brest gone nought agrose ne nothig smert forthe flyeth hert lefte herte nowe let slepe tale holde troylus paleys rydden fro scarmyshe whych tolde hys chambre sate hath abydden tyl two thre messangers yeden pandarus soughten ful fast tyl found brought ye last thys pandarus came leapyng one sayd thus hath bene wel ybete daye wyth swerdes slonge stone troylus hath caught hete gan iape sayd lorde ye sweete ryse let v soupe go reste answerde leste wyth al hast goodly myght spedde hem fro souper bedde euery wyght dore dyght whyder lyst vpo way sped troylus thought herte bledde wo tyl herde tydynge sayd frende shall wepe synge quod pandarus styll let slepe thyne hoode thy nedes spedde chese yf thou wolt syng daunce lepe short wordes thou shalte trowe sir nece wol done wel loue beste god trouthe lacke pursute make thy slouthe thus forforth haue thy werke begon fro day daye tyl day morowe loue frendshyp haue therfore hath laid faith borow algate foote hameled thy sorowe shulde lenger sermon holde ye haue herde al tolde right floures colde night closed stoupen stalkes low redressen hem ayen sunne bryght spreden kynde course rowe ryght gan tho eyen vp throwe thys troylus sayd venus dere thy myght thy grace yheryed padarus helde vp hodes sayd lorde al thyne haue hole brosten ben bondes thousande troyes yaue eche god wy saue ne might gladen lo myne herte spredeth ioye wol sterte lord shall shal lyuen whan shal next dere herte se howe shal longe time away dryuen tyl thou ayen fro thou mayst answere abyde abyde hangeth necke soth sayne great disease abydeth payne al easely nowe loue marte padarus euery thynge hath tyme longe abyde tyll nyght departe al syker thou lyest god forne wol prime thy werke somwhat shal saye wyght thys charge laye parde god wot haue euer yet ben redy serue night haue nat fayned emforth wyt done al thy lust shal al might nowe shal sayne fare aryght yf thou nylt wyte al thy selfe thy care naught alonge thyne yuel fare wote wel thou wyser art thousande folde yf thou god helpe wolde vtterly right myne owne hande write nowe lettre whiche wolde tellen howe farde amysse beseche routh nowe helpe thy selfe leaue slouth selfe shal therwyth gon wha thou woste yt worth thou vp courser ryght anon yee hardely ryght thy beste gere ride forth yt place naught ne thou shalt fynde v may syttyng wyndowe strete lokyng lyst mayst thou v salue vpon make thou thy countenaunce thy lyfe beware faste eschue taryen ought god shyld v fro mischauce ride forth thy waye holde thy gouernauce shall speke somwhat trowe whan thou art gone thyn cere glowe touchyng thy lettre thou arte wyse ynough wot thou nylte deignelyche endyte maketh argumentes tough ne scryueynyshe craftely thou write bebiotte thy teeres eke alyte thou write goodly worde al ofte though good reherce ofte though best harpour vpon lyue wolde beste sowned ioly harpe euer wyth al hys fyngers fyue touch aye strynge aye warble harpe hys nayles poynted neuer sharpe shulde make euery wyght dull gle stroke full ne iombre eke discordans thing e e thus vsen termes physyke loues termes holde thy matere forme alway lyke yf peyntour wolde paynte pyke wyth ass fete heeded ape cordeth nat iape counsayle lyked wel vnto troylus dredeful louer sayd thys ala dere brother pandarus ashamed write ywys leste myne innocence sayd amys nolde dispyte receyue tha deed ther might nothing weyue pandare answerde yf lest saye let therwyth gon lorde formed eest west hope brynge answere anon right hande yf thou nylt non let sory mote ben hys lyue ayenst thy lust helpeth thryue quod troylus depardieur yche assent syth lyst wol aryse write blysful god pray yche good entent vyage lettre shal endyte spede thou mynerua white yeue thou wyt lettre deuyse set wrote right wyse fyrst gan right lady cast hertes lyfe lust sorowes leche blysse eke termes case ye louers al seche ful humble wyse speche gan hym recomaunde vnto grace tel al howe asketh mokel space thys full lowly prayde nought wroth though hys folye hardy write sayde loue made el must dye pitously gan mercy crye sayd lyed full loude selfe lytle worth lasse coulde wolde haue coning excused lytle eke drede h vnworthynesse aye acu gan tel wo endelesse wythouten ho said wold trouth alwey hold redde ouer gan lettre fold salte teeres gan bath ruby signet sette vpon deliuerlyche rath therwith thousande tymes er lette kyste tho lettre shette sayd lettre blysful destyne shapen lady shal se thys pandare toke lettre betime morowe hys neces paleys sterte fast swore passed prime gan iape sa ywys myne herte freshe although sore smerte may nat slepe neuer mayes morowe haue ioly wo lusty sorowe creseyde whan vncle herde wyth dredeful herte desyrous cause comyng thus answerde fayth e vncle dere maner wyndes gydeth nowe tel v ioly wo penaunce howe ferforth ye put loues daunce god hope alwaye behynde laugh thought herte brest quod padarus loke alway ye fynde game myn hood herkeneth lest ther ryght come ye town gest greke espye telleth newe thynges whych come tel new tydynges gardyn go ye shal al preuely thys longe sermoun wente arme arme yfere gardyn fro chambre doun whan farre soun spake man heren myght sayd thus lettre plyght lo al hooly free recomendeth lowly grace sent lettre auyseth whan ye han space goodly answere purchace helpe god playnly sayne may longe lyuen payne ful dredefully tho gan stande styll toke al humble chere gan chaunge sayd scripte byl loue god toucheth matere ne brynge none also vncle dere myne estate haue regarde pray lust shulde say loketh nowe yf reasonable letteth fauour ne slouth sayne soth nowe couenable myne estate god trouth take haue routh harmyng selfe repreue beare ayen ye leue pandarus gan stare sayd nowe greatest wonder euer sawe let nyce fare deth mote smytten thonder citye whych standeth yonder wolde lettre vnto brynge take harm lyst thus make thus ye faren wel nyghe al moste desyreth serue ye retche lest become whether leue el sterue al euer may deserue refuse nat hente fast bosom ye letter dwone tharste sayd nowe caste away anon folke may tene gaurne v twey quod abyde tyl gon gan smyle sayd eme pray suche answere list selfe puruey trewly wol lettre write wol quod ye endyte therewith lough sayd go dyne gan selfe iape faste sayd nece haue great pyne loue eueryche day faste gan beste iapes forthe caste made laugh folye laughter wende dye whan comen hall nowe eme wol go dyne anon gan woman call streyght chambre gan gone besynesses one amonges thynges drede ful priuely lettre rede auysed worde worde euery lyne foude lacke thought coude goode vp put went dyne pandarus stodye stoode er ware toke hoode sayd ye caught er ye wyste vouchesafe quod lyste tho wysshen set hem downe ete noone ful slyghly pandarus ga drawe ye wyndowe nye strete sayd nece hath arayed thus yonder house stante aforyeue v house gan beholde knewe wel tolde fellen forth speche thynges smale saten wyndowe twey whan pandarus sawe tyme vnto tale sawe wel folke al away nowe nece myne tel quod pray howe lyke letttre ye wote theron trouth therwyth al rosy hewed tho woxe gan hym sayd trowe aquyte wel goddes loue selfe medes wol lettre sowe helde handes vp sate know nowe good nece neuer lyte yeue labour sowe plyte yea writen tho eke shulde hym say nay nece pandare say nat yet lest thonketh pray good wyl doth hym dey nowe loue nece dere refuseth tyme prayere depardieux god leue wele god helpe fyrst lettre euer wrote yee al dele closet aduyse bettre w nt alone gan hert vn e tte daynes prison lyte se e downe gan lettre write tell short myne entent theffecte ferre vnderstonde thanked al wel ment towardes holden honde wolde make seluen bonde loue syster plese wold aye done hert ese shette pandare gon sate loked strete downe sette stone iaspre vpon quyshen golde ybete sayde wysely helpe god gret neuer dyd thyng wyth payne write ye costrayne toke hym thanked sayd god wote thyng ful often loth begonne cometh ende good nece mine creseyde ye harde nowe bene ywonne ought glad god yonder sonne men sayth impression lyght full lyghtly ben aye redy flyght ye han played tyraunt al longe harde herte graue nowe stynt ye lenger honge al wolden ye forme daunger saue hasteth done hym ioye haue trusteth wel longe ydone hardnesse causeth dispyte ful often distresse ryght declared thys matere lo troylus right stretes ende came rydyng wyth tenthe yfere al softely thyderwarde gan bende ther sat way wend paleys ward pandare aspide sayd nece se cometh ryde flye nat sethe v suppose leste maye thynken ye hym eschue nay nay woxe redde rose wyth gan humbly salue wyth dredful chere oft hys hewes mue vp hys loke debonairly caste becked pandare forthe paste god wot yf sate horse aryght goodly besene ylke daye god wot wher lyke maly knyght shulde dretche tell aray creseyde thynges say tel shorte lyked al yfere hys person hys aray loke chere goodly maner gentyllesse wel neuer syth borne ne routh distresse hath hard ben beforne god hope hath caught thorn shal pul next wyke god sende mo thornes pyke pandare whyche stode faste felte yron hotte beganne smyte sayd nece pray hertely tel shal asken alyte woman hys deth whyte withoute gift lacke routh wel done nay trouth god help ye say soth ye felen wel selfe naught lye lo yonder rydeth ye doth wel pandare haue tolde thrie let nyee shame folye speke eysyng herte let nycete smerte theron heauen done consydryng althyng may nat shame eke sone graunten great liberte playnly entent sayd loue hym vnwyst yf myght guerdon wt nothig syght pandare thought shall may thys nyce opinyon shal ben holden fully yeres two shuld make thys long sermon muste assent conclusion tyme whan eue al wel rose toke hys leue way faste homwarde sped ryght ioye felt herte daunce troylus founde alone abed lay done louers traunce betwixen hope derke disesperaunce pandare ryght hys comyng song saith lo somwhat bring sayd bed sone yburyed thus frende troylus nay helpe moone pandarus thou shalt vp ryse se charme sent ryght nowe healen thyne axesse thou forthwith al thy besynesse ye myght god troylus pandarrus gan lettre take sayde parde god hath holpen v haue lyght loke al blake ofte gan hert glade quake troylus whyle gan rede wordes yaue hope drede finally toke al beste wrote somwhat beheld thought might hys hert rest al couered wordes vnder shelde thus worthy parte helde hope padarus beheste great wo foryede leste may al day seluen se wood coole fyre ryght encrease hoope therwyth full ofte encreaseth eke desyre oke cometh lytle spyre lettre whiche yt sent encreasen gan desyre brent wherfore say alway day nyght troylus gan desyren dyd erste hoope myght preaso padarus lore writen sorowes sore fro day day lete nought refreyde padare somwhat wrote seid dyd also obseruaunces tyll louer longeth thys caas dyce turned chaunces eyther glad sayd ala helde hys gestes aye paas answer dayes sory eyther glad padare alwaye recours pytously gan aye playne besought rede socours padarus saw wode payne wert wel nygh deed routh soth sayne besyly al herte caste wo sleen faste sayd lorde frende brother dere god wote thy disease doth wo wylt thou stynten al woful chere trouth er dayes two god forne yet shal shape thou shalt come certayne place ther yu maist thy selfe prayen grace certaynly yf thou woste bene experte loue say one thynges forthereth moste man haue leyser pray syker place wo bewray good hert mote routh impresse se gyltlesse distresse paraueture thinkest thou though kinde wolde done begynne haue maner routh vpon wo sayth dauger nay yu shalt neuer winne ruleth hertes goste within though bende yet stont rote effecte thys vnto bote thinke ayen whan sturdy oke men hacketh ofte none receyued hath happy fallyng stroke great sweyght doth come one done rockes mylne stone swyfter course cometh thig yt wight whan discendeth done thinges light rede boweth euery blast ful lyghtly cesse wynde wol aryse nyl oke whan cast nedeth nought longe forbyse men shal reioysen great empryse atcheued wel stant withouten dout al haue men ben lenger troylus nowe tell yf lest thyng shal asken thy brother thou louest best thy hertes preuyte wy brother diephebus tho padare er houres twyse twelue shal case vnwyst selue nowe let alone worken maye quod deiphebus went tho lord great frende bene aye saue troylus man loued tel shorte without wordes mo quod pandarus pray ye frende cause toucheth yes parde deiphebus wel thou wost al euer may god fore al nere man loue moste brother troylus say wherfore syth day bore na ne neuer mo bene thynke ayenst thyng myght forthynke padare gan thanke seyd lo sir haue lady thys towne nece called creseyd men wolde done oppressioun wrongfully haue possessioun wherfore lordshyp beseche bene frende withouten speche deiphebus hym answerde thys thou speakest thus straugely creseyde frende sayd hym yes nedeth deiphebus hardely nomore speke trusteth wel yt woll champion wyth spore yerde ne rought though al foe herde tel howe thou wost thys matere myght best auaylen nowe let se quod pandarus yf ye lorde dere wolden thys honour prayen morowe lo came vnto playntes deuyse aduersaryes wolde agryse yf durst praye nowe chargen haue great trauayle haue brethre myghten cause bet auayle wote well myght neuer fayle ben holpen instaunce wyth frendes gouernaunce deiphebus whych yt comen kynde honoure bounte consente answerde shalbe done fynde yet greater helpe thys myne entent woldest yu sayne yf heleyne sent speake thys trowe best maye leden parys lest hector whych yt lorde brother nedeth praye hym frende haue herde hym tyme eke speken creseyde honour may ayne bet hap hym hath nedeth hys helpes craue shalbe suche ryght wol hym haue speake thou thy selfe also troylus behalfe pray hym v dyne syr thys shalbe done pandarus toke hys leaue neuer gan fyne hys neces house streyght lyne came founde fro meate aryse set hi downe spake ryght wyse sayd god haue ronne lo nece myne se ye howe swete ye thanke conne ye ware howe false poliphete nowe aboute eftsones plete brynge aduocacies newe chaunged al hewe dretche done wronge shal ala yet hym selfe nothynge wolde retche nere antenor eneas ben hys frendes maner caas loue god myne vncle dere force let hym haue yfere wythouten haue ynough v nay pandare shall nothynge haue ben ryght nowe deiphebus hector myne lordes mo shortly maked eche hem hys foe thryfte shall neuer wynne ought begynne casten best done deiphebus hys owne curtesye came praye hys propre persone holde hym morowe companye dyner whych nolde denye goodly gan hys prayer obey thanked wente vpon hys wey thys done thys padare anone tell shorte forth gan wende troylus styll stone al thys thyng tolde word ende howe deiphebus gan blende sayd hym nowe tyme yf yt ye conne beare well morowe al wonne speke pray pitously coplain let nyce shame drede slouthe somtyme man mote tell hys owne payne beleue woll haue routhe thou shalt ben saued thy fayth trouth well wote thou nowe arte drede lay arede thou thinkest shuld al cheres musten folke aspye loue fare amys yet leuer vnwyst sorowe dye nowe thynke thou doest gret foly ryght nowe haue founden manere sleyght coueren thy chere thou shalt gone ouernight bylyue vnto deiphebus house play thy maladye away bet dryue whych thou semest sycke soth saye sone thy bedde laye saye thou mayst lenger vp endure lye ryght byde thyne aueture say thy feuer wote take tyme laste tyl morowe let se nowe wel thou ranst make parde sycke sorowe go farewell venus borowe hope thou thys purpose holde ferme thy grace shall fully conferme quod troylus ywys thou nedelesse counsaylest sycklyche fayne sycke ernest doutlesse well nygh sterue payne pandarus thou shalte better playne haste lesse nede counterfete hym demeth hote yt seeth hem swete lo holde thy tryste close shall well deere vnto thy bowe dryue therwyth toke hys leaue al softely troylus paleys went blyue glad ne neuer hys lyue pandarus rede gan assente deiphebus house nyght wente nedeth tellen chere deiphebus vnto hys brother made hys axis hys sycklyche manere howe men gon hym clothes lade whe layd wold glade al nought held forth aye wyse ye han herde pandare er thys deuyse certayne er troylus hym leyde deiphebus prayde hym ouernyght ben frende helpynge creseyde god wote graunted anone ryght ben full frende wyth hys myght nede pray hym thenne bydde woode man renne morow came neyghen gan ye tyme meal yde fayre quene heleyne shope houre pryme wyth deiphebus nolde fayne hys suster homely soth sayne came dyner playne entente god padare wyst al mente came eke creseyde innocent thys antygone nece tarbe also slye nowe prolixite best loue god let v fast go ryght theffecte wythouten tale mo thys folke assembled thys place let v saluynges pace great honour dyd hem deiphebus certayne fedde hem wel wyth al myght lyke euermo ala hys refrayne good brother troylus syke lyth yet therwythall gan syke payned hym glade hem myght chere good made complayned eke heleyne hys sycknesse faythfully pyte euery wyght gan wexen ax leche anone sayd thys manere men curen folke thys charme woll ye lere sate one lyste teche thought yet best could ben leche coplaynt hym gonne prayse folk yet whe wyght hath bego prayse wyth prayse hym rayse thousande folde yet hygher son fewe lordes kon pandarus wolde afferme nought forgat praysynge conferme herde al thys thyng creseyd wel ynough euery worde gan notifye whych wyth sobre chere herte lough ne wolde glorifye mowen suche knyght done lyue dye passe lest ye longe dwell fyne euer tell tyme came fro dyner ryse hem ought arysen euerychone gone whyle thys deuyse pandarus brake thys speche anone sayd deiphebus woll ye gone yf wyll prayde speake nedes creseyde heleyne whych ye honde helde toke fyrst tale sayd go blyue goodly creseyde behelde sayd ioues let hym neuer thryue doth harme ryue hym sone lyue ye sorowe shall rue yf maye folke true tel thou thy neces case quod deiphebus pandarus thou canst best tell lordes ladyes stante thus shulde lenger dwell ronge hem proces lyke bell vpon foe hyght poliphete heynous men myght spete answerd eche worse hem poliphete gonnen thus waryen honged suche one brother shall ne maye nought varien shulde lenger thys tale taryen p aynlyche one hyghten ben frede yt euer myghten spake heleyne sayd pandarus wote aught lord brother thys mater meane hector wote troylus sayd yea woll ye nowe thinketh thus syth troilus good yf ye wolde assent tolde hym selfe thys er went woll haue grefe herte bycause lo lady wyl woll ryght sterte wete anone ywys yf slepe woll ought thys lepte sayd hym hys eere god haue thy soule brought haue thy bere smylen thys gan tho troylus pandarus wythouten rekenynge went anone heleyne deiphebus sayd hem taryenge ne prease woll well ye brynge creseyde lady maye enduren wol well ye wote chambre lyte fewe folke may lyghtly make warme nowe loketh ye woll haue wyte bryng prease yt might harme hym dyseasen better arme yet bet bydde tyll eftsoonis nowe loke ye knowen done saye best knowe wyght ne wende ye twey throwe reherce case vnlyke sey thys maye one hym prey ben good lorde shorte take leue thys maye mokell hys ease hym reue eke strauge woll forbere hys ease whych hym dare eke thynge toucheth woll tell wote well ryght nowe secrete townes prowe knewe nothyng hys entent wythout troylus went heleyne goodly softe wyse gan hym salue womanly playe sayd ywys ye mote algate aryse nowe fayre brother hole praye gan arme ryght ouer sholder lay hym wyth wyt recomforte best coulde gan hym dysporte thys beseke dere brother deiphebus loue god doth pandare eke ben good lorde frende ryght hertely vnto creseyde whych certaynly receiueth wroge wote wel padare case well bet declare padarus gan new tonge affyle case reherce anone sayd sone whyle quod troylus sone may gone wol ryght fayne al might one haue god trouth cause sustene good thryft haue ye heleyne quene quod pandarus wyll maye take leaue er go el god forbyd tho yf vouchsafe wyth worde troylus ye two deiphebus syster lefe dere haue speake matere ben aduysed rede better founde hap beddes heed copye treatyse lettre hector hym sent asken reed yf suche man worthy ben deed wote nought grysly wyse prayde hem anone auyse deiphebus gan thys lettre vnfolde ernest great dyd heleyne quene romynge outward fast gone beholde downewarde steyre herber grene thys ylke thynge redden hem bytwene largely mountenauce houre gonne reden pore nowe let hem rede turne anone pandarus gan full softe prye well gan gone great chambre hye sayd god saue thys companye come nece myne lady quene heleyne abydeth eke lordes tweyne ryse take wyth nece igone whome lyst force hardely lasse prease yt bet come forth wyth loke ye thanken humbly hem thre ye maye goodly tyme yse taketh hem leue lest longe hys restes hym byreue innocent pandarus entente quod tho creseyde go vncle dere arme arme inwarde wt wete auysynge well wordes chere pandarus ernestfull manere sayd folke goddes loue praye stynteth ryght softely playe auyseth folke bene wythin plyte one god hym amende inwarde thus full softely begyn nece coniure hyghly defende hys halfe whych soule v al sende vertue corownes twayne slee thys yt hath payne fye deuell thynke whych one plyte lyeth come anone thynke suche taryed tyde lost ny woll ye sayne ye ben one secondly yet deuyneth none vpon two come nowe yf ye conne whyle folke blent lo tyme wone tyterynge pursute delayes folke deuyne waggynge tree though ye wolde han mery dayes dare ye spake suche worde thus loked lest tyme lost dare wyth dele come therfore bryngeth hym hele nowe ye louers ben troylus cankedorte lay might ye whyspryng hem thought lorde ryght reneth sorte fully dye haue anone comforte fyrst tyme shulde pray loue myghty god shall saye pexplicit liber secundus blysfull lyght bemes clere adorneth thyrde heuen fayre sonnes lese ioues doughter dere pleasaunce loue goodly debonayre gentyll hertes aye redy repayre cause heale gladnesse yheryed thy myght thy goodnesse heauen hell erthe salte see felte thy myght yf well dyscerne man beest fyshe herbe grene tree fele tymes wyth vapour eterne god loueth loue woll naught werne thys worlde lyues creature wythouten loue worth maye endure ye ioues fyrst thylke affectes glade whych thynges lyuen al comenden amorous hem made mortall thynge lyst aye ye yeue hem loue ease aduersyte thousand formes downe hym sente loue erth lyste hente ye fyrce marce apeasen hys yre lyst ye maken hertes dygne algates hem ye woll set afyre dreden shame vyces resygne ye done hem curteys freshe benigne hye lowe wyght entendeth ioyes yt hath myght sendeth ye holden reygne house vnite ye soth fast cause frendshyp ben also ye knewen thylke couered qualyte thynges whych folke wondren construe howe may go loueth hym loueth fyshe cometh ye folke lawe haue set vniuerse thys knowe hem louers stryueth wt hath ye werse nowe lady bryght thy benignite reuerence hem seruen whose clerke techeth deuyse ioye felt thy seruyce yea naked herte sentement hylde shewe thy swetnesse cal ope thy voyce nowe present nede seest thou dystresse howe mote tell anone ryght gladnesse troylus venus heriynge whych nede hath god hym brynge pincipit liber tertius lay thys meane whyle troylus recordynge hys lesson thys manere mafey thought thus wol say thus thus woll playne vnto lady dere worde good thys shalbe chere thys nyll foryeten wyse god lene hym werken deuyse lorde hys herte gan quappe herynge come shorte syke pandarus ledde lappe came nere gan curteyn pyke sayd god bote syke se comen vysyte lo death wyte therwyth semed wepte almoste quod troylus routhfully wo myghty god thou woste se truly syr creseyde pandare ye swete herte ala maye ryse knele honoure wyse dressed hym vpwarde ryght tho gan hondes softe vpon hym ley loue god ye quod ey thys sey syr comen cause twey fyrst thanke lordshyp eke continuaunce wolde beseke thys troylus herde hys lady praye lordship woxe neither quicke ne deed ne myght worde shame saye though men shulden smyten hys heed lorde woxe sodeynlyche reed syr hys lesson wende conne prayen hys wyt yronne creseyde thys aspyed well ynough wyse loued hym neuer yt lasse nere aperte made tough bolde synge foole masse hys shame gan somwhat passe hys resons may rymes holde woll tell techen bokes olde chauged voyce ryght hys drede whych voyce eke quoke therto hys manere goodly abasht nowe hys hewes rede nowe pale vnto creseyde hys lady dere wyth loke downe cast humble iyolde chere lo alderfyrst worde hym twyse mercy mercy swete herte stynt whe might bring next worde god wote haue faythfully haue konnynge ben god soule saue shal tyl wofull wyght graue though dare ne vnto playne iwys suffre lasse payne thus moch nowe ah womalyche wyfe maye brynge yf thys dysplese shall wreke vpon myne owne lyfe ryght sone trowe hert ese yf wyth death herte maye apese sen ye han herde somwhat sey nowe retche neuer howe sone dey therwyth hys manly sorowe beholde myght haue made hert stone rew pandare wept water wolde poked euer hys nece newe new sayd wo begon ben hertes trewe loue god make thys thinge ende slee v one er ye wende god trouth nat ye wylne sey ey ye haue hym routh goddes loue doth hym dey nowe thus wolde hym prey tell fyne hys entente yet wyst neuer well mente meane swete herte dere quod troylus goodly freshe free wyth stremes eyen clere ye wolden somtyme frendly se agreen may ben wythouten braunche vyce wyse trouth alwaye seruyse lady ryght chefe resorte wyth wytte diligence haue ryght lyst comforte vnder yerde egall myne offence death yf breake defence ye deygne moche honour comaunden aught hour ben humble trewe secrete paynes pacient euer desyren freshly newe seruen ben aye ylike dilygent good herte al holy talent receyuen wel howe sore smerte lo meane myne owne swete hert quod pandarus lo hard request reasonable lady warne nowe nece myne natall ioues feeste god ye shulde sterue yerne heren wel man wol nothyng yern honour sene almost sterue ben lothe suffre serue wyth gan eyen cast full easely full debonairly auysyng hyed fast wyth neuer worde sayd hym softely myn honour safe wolde wel truly forme deuyse receyuen fully seruice besechyng hym goddes loue wolde honour trouthe gentellesse wel meane eke meanen wel myn honour wit besynesse aye kepe maye done gladnesse hence forthe iwys nyl nat fayne nowe bethe al hole lenger ye ne playne nathelesse warne kynges sonne although ye ywis ye shal haue soueraynte loue right case ne nyl forbeare ye done amys wrathe whyle ye serue cherysshen right ye deserue shortly dere hert al knyght beth glad draweth lustynesse shal trewly al ful myght bytter turnen al swetenesse may gladnesse euery wo ye shal recouer blysse armes toke gan kysse fyl pandarus knee vp eyen heuen threw helde hondes hye immortal god mayst nat dyen cupide meane mayste glorifye venus thou mayste maken melodye withouten honde semeth towne myracle yche eche bell sowne ho nowe matere folke wol comen vp anone haue lettre redde lo hem coniure creseyde one two thou troylus wha yu mayst gone myn house ye ben warnyng ful wel shal shapen comyng easeth hertes right ynough let se whiche shal beare bel speke loue aright therwith lough haue leyser tell quod troylus howe long shal dwell er ben done whe thou maist ryse thyng shal right list deuyse heleyne also deiphebus tho comen vpward right ye stayres ende lorde tho gan gronen troylus brother syster blende pandarus tyme wende take nece myn leaue al thre let hem speake cometh forth toke leaue hem ful thryftely wel coulde reuerence vnto ful dydden hardely wonder wel speaken absence praysyng excellence gouernaunce wyt hyr manere comendeden ioye nowe let wende vnto owne place turne troylus agayne gan ful lightly lettre pace deiphebus gardyn seyne heleyne hem wolde feyne deleuered ben sayd hem leste slepe tale haue reste heleyne kyste toke leue blyue deiphebus eke home wente euery wight pandarus faste may driue troylus tho came lyne ryght paillet al gladde nyght troylus lay mery chere tale wel hem yfere whe euery wight voyded two al dores faste yshette tel shorte without wordes mo pandarus without lette vp rose beddes syde sette gan speaken sobre wyse troylus shal deuyse myn alderleuest lorde brother dere god wot thou sate sore whan sawe languysshyng loue thy wo woxe alway al might al lore haue euer sythen done besynesse bringe ioye distresse haue brouyt plyte yu woste yt thou stondest way faren wel say boste woste thou shame say haue begon gamen play whiche neuer done shal efte al tho thousande folde brother say becomen betwyxen game ernest suche mene maken woman vnto men comen al say nat thou woste well mene haue nece vyces clene fully made thy gentyllesse tryst shal ben ryght thy selfe lyste god yt al wotteth take wytnesse neuer thys couetyse wrought onely abredge distresse wel nye thou dydest thouyt good brother nowe ought goddes loue kepe blame sen thou art wyse saue alway name wel thou wost name yet amoges ye people sayd halowed man vnbore dare wel swere euer wyste dyd amys wo cause al thys may thynken nece dere eme traytour eke yfere wyste yt myn engyn myne nece yput fantasye done thy lust holly thyn al worlde wolde vpon crye say worste trecherye dyd thys case euer begonne fordone thou right naught ywone wherfore er wol ferther gone paas yet efte beseche fully say priuyte go v thys caas sayne thou v neuer wray nat wrothe though ofte pray holden secre suche hygh matere skylfull thou woste well prayere thinke wo ther hath betyd er makyng auauntes men rede myschaunce worlde yet fro day day right wycked dede whiche wyse clerkes ben dede haue euer thys prouerbed v yonge fyrst vertue kepe tonge nere wylne abredge diffusyon speche coulde almost thousande olde story aledge woman loste false fooles boste prouerbes canste thy selfe ynowe woste ayenst vyce ben blabbe al sayd men sothe often gabbe tonge ala often beforne haste thou made many lady bright hewe sayd welaway day borne many maydens sorowe newe parte al vntrewe yelpe brought preue kynde none auauntour leue auauntour lyer al one thus pose woman graunt loue sayth woll none sworne holden secre tel two thre iwys auauntour leest lyer eke breke beheest loke tha nat blame suche maner folke shall clepe hem hem auaunte woman name yet behyght hem neuer ne ne knowe hem myne olde hat wonder god sende heele though wome dreden v men deele say nat thys mistrust ne wyse men fooles nyce harme ye worlde nowe wel folye ofte malyce wel wote wyse folke vyce woman dredeth yf well auysed wyse ben fooles harme chastysed nowe purpose leue brother dere haue thyng yt haue sayd mynde kepe close good chere thy dayes thou shalt trewe fynde shall thy processe set suche kynde god toforne shall suffyse shall right thou wolte deuyse wel wote thou meanest well parde therfore dare fully vndertake thou woste eke thy lady graunted day set chartres make haue good night may leger wake byd syth thou arte blysse god sende dethe soone lysse might tellen halfe ioye feest whych soule troylus tho felte heryng theffect pandarus beheest olde wo made herte swelte gan tho ioye wasten melte richesse syghes sore one fledde felte hem right holtes hayis han wynter deed ben drie reuesten hem grene whan may whan euery lusty lysteth play right selfe wyse sothe say woxe sodainly herte full ioye gladder neuer troye gan loke pandarus vp caste ful soberly frendly se sayd frende april laste well thou woste yf remembre howe nyghe yt dethe wo thou founde howe thou dyddest thy besynesse knowe cause distresse thou woste longe forbare say arte man best tryst peryll none bewray wyst well tel yf lyste sythe loth thy selfe wyste howe durste mo tellen matere quake nowe wight may v nathelesse god swere lyst may al world gouerne yf lye achylles wyth spere myne herte cleaue al lyfe eterne mortal yf late yerne wolde bewray durst shulde conne al good god made vnder sonne rather dye wolde determyne thynketh nowe stocked prison wretchydnesse fylthe vermyne captyfe cruell kyng agamenon temple towne vpon goddes woll swere morowe day yf lyketh thou haste moche ydon ne may neuer deserue know well might thousande tymes morowe sterue woll serue ryght thy slaue whyther thou wende euer vnto lyues ende al myn herte beseche neuer thou deme suche folye shall sayne thought thy speche whiche thou doest copanye shulde wene baudrye nat woode yf leude nat wot well parde gothe golde rychesse suche message call ye lyste thou doest call gentylnesse compassyon felawshyp tryste departe wyde wyste howe dyuersyte required betwixen thynges lyke haue lered yt thou knowe thynke nat ne wene thys seruyce shame iape haue fayre suster polixene cassandre heleyne frape neuer fayre well yshape tel whiche thou wylte euerychone haue thyne let alone buth syth yt thou hast done seruyce lyfe saue non hope mede loue god great emprise parfourme nowe moste nede hygh lowe withouten drede wol alway thyne hestes al kepe haue nowe good nyght let v bothe slepe thus helde hem eche well apayde worlde ne might bet amende morowed wha arayde eche hys owne nedes gan entende troylus though fyre brende sharpe desyre hope pleasaunce nat forgate good gouernaunce selfe wt mahode gan restreyne eche rakel dede eche vnbridled chere lyuen sothe sayne ne shulde haue wyst word manere mente touching matere euery wyght ferre cloude wyse wel dissymulen coulde al ye whyle deuyse thys hys lyfe full myght day martes hyghe seruyce sayne armes knyght parte longe nyght lay thought might serue lady best thanke deserue nyll nat sweare though lay softe thought na somwhat disesed ne turned pillowes ofte wolde missed haue ben eased suche case men nat alwaye pleased naught wot deme possibylyte certayne purpose go whyle written geste sawe lady somtyme also wyth spake wha yt durst leste bothe auyse beste apoynteden ful warely nede durste howe wold procede spoken shorte wyse suche awayte alway suche fere leste wight deuynen deuyse wolde hem two lay eere worlde lefe hem ne cupyde wolde hem grace sende maken speche right ende thylke lytel spake wrought hys wyse goste toke aye suche hede semed wyste thought withouten worde nede bydde hym aught aught forbede thought yt loue al come late al ioye opened yate shortly thys processe pace wel werke wordes besette ful stode lady grace twenty thousande tymes er lette tonked god euer hym mette coulde hym gouerne suche seruyce al worlde ne might bet deuyse founde discrete secrete suche obeysaunce well felte wall steele shelde euery displesaunce ben hys good gouernaunce wyse nomore afered meane ferre ought ben required pandarus quicke alway fyre euer ylyke prest dyligent ease frende set al hys desyre shone aye fro sent letter bare whan troylus absent neuer man hys frendes nede ne bare hym bet withouten drede paraueture som wayte wold euery worde sonde loke chere troylus rehercen shulde whyle vnto hys lady dere trowe longe thyng wight yt stante suche disioynte wordes al euery loke poynte sothe haue nat herde done er storye none ne man wene though wolde coulde nat ywys epystel hem betwene wold saith myn auctour wel cotene nye half boke hi lyst nat write howe shulde lyue endyte great effecte say thus stondyng concorde quyete thys ylke two creseyde troylus haue tolde tyme swete saue onely often might nat mete ne leyser haue speches fulfell befyl ryght shall tel pandarus euer dyd might right fyne shall speke bryngen house nyght fayre nece troylus yfere leyser al thys hygh matere touchyng loue ye ful vp bounde doute tyme founde great delyberation euery thyng therto might auayle forne caste put execution neyther lefte coste ne trauayle come yf hem lyste hem shuld nothyng fayle ben aught aspyed wyste wel inpossyble dredelesse clere wynde euery pye euery let game nowe wel al worlde blynde mater bothe fremed tame tymber al redy vp frame v lacketh naught weten wolde certayne houre comen shulde troylus purueyaunce knewe full wayted aye vpon eke made great ordynaunce founde hys cause therwith aray myssed nyght day whyle aboute seruyce gone done hys sacrifyce muste suche temple alone wake answered apollo fyrst sene holy laurer quake er apollo spake tree tell hym next whan grekes shulde flye thy let hym man god forbede pray apollo helpe thys nede nowe lytell done pandare vp shortly sayne right sone vpon chaungyng ye moone wha lightlesse ye world night twayne welken shope hym rayne streyght morowe vnto hys nece wente ye haue well herde fyne hys entente wha come gan anon playe wonte hym selfe iape fynally swore gan say shulde hym nat escape lenger done hym cape certaynly muste leue come soupen hys house wyth hym eue lough gan fyrst excuse sayd rayneth lo howe shulde gone let ne stonde nat thus muse mote done ye shal come anone laste herof fell one el faste swore eere nolde neuer comen sone hym gan rowne asked hym yf troylus swore nay towne sayd nece pose durste neuer haue feere rather men might hym aspye leuer thousande fold dye naught lyst myne auctour fully declare thought whan sayd troylus towne yfare yf sayd therof sothe wythouten awayte go grauted syth besought hys nece obeyed ought nathelesse yet gan hym beseche though wt gone feere beware gofyshe people speche dreme thynges neuer well auyse brought sayd eme sen muste tryst loke al wel nowe lyst swore stockes stone goddes heuen dwell el leauer soule bone wyth pluto kyng depe ben hell tantalus shulde tell whan al well rose toke leue souper came whan eue wyth certayne owne men fayre nece antigone woman nyne ten glad nowe trowe ye troylus stode myght se throughout lytel wyndowe stewe hebeshet sith midnight mewe vnwyst euery wight pandare poynt nowe whan yt coe wyth ioye frendes fare eme anone armes hath nome supper whan tyme ful softe hem sette god wote deynte ferre fette supper gannen ryse ease well hert freshe glade wel coude best deuyse lyken laughen made songe playde tolde tale wade laste euery thyng hath ende toke leaue nedes wolde wende fortune executrice wyerdes influentes heuens hye sothe vnder god ye ben hierdes though v beestes ben cause wrie mene ga homward hye execute al besyde leue goddes wil muste bleue bente moone horne pale saturnus ioue cac ioyned suche rayne heuen gan auale euery maner woman smoky rayne feere whiche pandare tho lough sayd thenne nowe tyme lady gon henne good nece yf might euer please thyng pray myne herte nowe great ease dwell al nyght wyth owne house parde trouhe say nat game wende nowe shame creseyde could moche good halfe worlde toke hede hys prayere sen rayned al flode thouyt good chepe may dwel graunt gladly frendes chere haue thonke grutche abyde home gone may nat wel betyde woll myne vncle liefe dere sen lyst skyll ryght glad dwellen sayd againe wolde go wy graunt mercy nece tho game sothe tell glad sen lyste dwel thus al wel tho began aright newe ioye feest agayne pandarus yf goodly myght wolde haue hyed bedde fayne sayd lorde huge rayne thys wether slepen rede v soone begyn nece wote ye wol lay shul nat lyggen ferre sonder ye neyther shullen dare say noyse rayne ne thonder god ryght closet yonder wol vtter house alone ben wardayne woman euerychone myddel chambre ye se shall woman slepen wel softe sayd shall seluen yf ye lyggen well nyght come ofte careth nat wether loste wyne anon whan leste go slepe trowe beste ny herafter sone voyde dronke trauers drawe anon gan euery wyght naught done place chambre gon euermore sternelyche rone blewe therwyth wonderlyche loude wel nyghe man heren coulde tho padarus eme right ought woman suche aboute ful glad vnto beddes syde brought toke leaue gan full lowe loute sayd closet dore wythout right ouertwarte woman lyggen lyst hem ye may sone cal whan closet layde woman forth ordynaunce bedde haue sayde na skippe praunce boden go bedde mischaunce wyght sterynge let hem slepen bedde pandarus yt wel couthe eche adele olde daunce euery poynte therin whan sawe thyng wele thought wolde vpon werke begyn gan stewe dore al softe vnpyn styl stone without lenger lette troylus adown right sette shortly poynte right gon al thys werke tolde worde ende sayd make redy right anon thou shalt heuen blysse wende blysful venus thou grace sende troylus neuer yet dede er nowe ne halfendele drede pandarus ne drede neuer adele shal right thou wolte desyre thriue night shal make wele casten al gruel fyre yet blisfull venus nyght yu enspyre troylus wy serue euer bet bet shal tyll sterue yf venus full myrthe aspectes badde mar saturne thou combuste let byrthe thy father pray al thylke harme disturne grace glad ayen may turne loue hym thou louedest shawe meane adon ye bore awe ioue eke loue fayre europe forme bulle away thou set helpe mar thou wt thy blody cope loue cipria thou naught ne let phebus thike wha daphne selue vnder barke laucer woxe drede yet loue helpe nowe thys nede mercurye loue eke pallas wt aglauros wrothe nowe helpe eke dyane beseke thys vyage nat lothe fatall sustren whyche clothe shapen destyne sponne helpeth thys werke begon padarus thou wretched mouces herte arte thou agast wol byte furred cloke vpon thy sherte folowe wol haue wyte byde let gon alyte wyth gan vndone trappe troylus brought lappe sterne wynde loude gan route wight noyse might layen dore without ful sykerly slepten al yfere pandarus ful sobre chere gothe dore anon withouten lette laye softely shette came ayenwarde priuely hys nece awoke asketh goth dere nece quod ne wondreth nat ne haue feere nere came sayd eere worde loue god beseche let wyght aryse heren speche way ye comen benedicite quod howe vnwyst hem al secrete trappe dore quod tho crescide let wight cal eygh god forbyde shulde fal pandarus ye foly wrought might deme thing neuer er thouyt nat good slepyng hounde wake ne yeue wyght cause deuyne woman slepyng al vndertake yt hem house men myght myne slepen wollen tyl sunne shyne whan tale brought ende vnwyst right came woll wende nowe nece myne ye shul wel vnderstande ye woman demen al holde loue man honde hym lefe dere herte call maken hym howue aboue call mene loue mene doth selfe shame agyle nowe wherby tel al thys ye wote selfe wel wyght howe loue al fully graunted troylus worthyest wyght one worlde therto trouth yplyght alonge ye nolde neuer falsen whyle ye lyuen sholde nowe stonte thus yt syth fro went thys troylus ryght platly seyne gutter priuy went chambre come al thys reyne vnwyste euery maner wyght certeyne saue selfe wysely haue ioye fayth iowe priam troye come payne distresse al fully woode thys sodaynly mote fal woodnesse yf god helpe cause thys sayth tolde frende hys yt ye shuld loue one hyght horast sorow niyt shal last creseyde al thys wonder herde g ul sodaynly aboute herte colde syghe soroufully answerde ala wende tale tolde dere herte wolde nat holde lyghtly false ala conceytes wronge harme done nowe lyue loge horaste ala falsen troylus knowe hym god helpe ala wycked spyrite tolde hym thus nowe certes eme morowe se shal therof fully excused euer dyd woman yf lyke worde gan ful sore syke god wordley selynesse whych clerkes callen false felicite ymedled many bytternesse full anguyshous god wot condicion veyne prosperyte eyther ioyes comen nat yfere el wyght hath hem alway brotyl wele mannes ioye vnstable wyght howe yu play eyther wot ioye arte muable wote mote bene one tway yf wote nat howe may say hath ioye selynesse ignoraunce aye derkenesse nowe yf wote ioye transitorye euery ioy worldly thyng mote flye euery tyme hath memorye dred lesyng maketh may parfyte sykernesse yf lese ioye set myte tha semeth ioye worth ful lyte wherfore wolde deffine thys matere treuly aught espye wele thys worlde thou wycked serpent ielousye thou misbeleued enuyous folye hast thou troylus made vntrist neuer yet agylte wyst quod padarus thus fallen thys caas vncle myn tolde hym thys doth dere hert thus ala ye wote ye nece myne hope al shal wel amys ye may quench al thys leste doth ryght holde beste shal morowe ywys god forne shal suffyse morowe ala fayre nay nay may nat stonden wyse nece myne writen clerkes wyse peryl wyth dretchyng drawe nay soch abode nat worth hawe nece al thynge hath tyme dare auowe whan chambre fyre hal wel nede sodaynly rescowe desputen asken amonges al howe candel strawe fal ah benedicite al amonge fare harme done farwell feldefare nece myne ne take nat grese ye suffre hym al nyght thys wo god helpe ye neuer lefe dare saine ther two wel wote ye wol nat ye bene wyse done great folye put hys lyfe al nyght ieopardye hym neuer lefe god wene ye neuer thyng lefe quod nowe thryfte yt shal sene syth ye make thys ensample iche al nyght wolde sorowe se al treasour towne troy bydde god neuer mote haue ioye nowe loke yf ye bene hys loue shulde put hys lyfe al nyght ieopardy thyng nought ye god aboue nat onely thys delay cometh foly malice yf shulde nat lye platly ye suffre hym distresse ye neyther bounte done ne gentyllesse quod tho creseyde wol ye done thyng ye therwyth shal stynte al disease haue bere hym blewe ryng nothing might better plese saue selfe ne herte apese saye dere herte sorowe causelesse shal sene morowe rynge ye haselwodes shaken ye nece myne ye ryng must haue stone myght deed men alyue maken ryng trowe ye haue none discrecion heed gone fele nowe routh time ylost wel maist thou cursen slouth wote ye wel noble hye courag ne soroweth ne stynteth eke lyte yf fole ielous rage nolde setten hys sorowe amyte fesse hym fewe wordes whyte day wha might fynde thys thyng stant al another kynde thys gentyl tender hert wt deth wol hys sorowes wreke trust wel howe sore smert wol ialous wordes speke thy nece er herte breke speke selfe hym matere wyth worde ye may hys hert stere nowe haue tolde peryl hys comyng vnwyst euery wight ne parde harme may none ne syn wolde selfe wyth al night ye knowe eke howe owne knyght ryght ye must vpon hym f yste al prest fetche hym wha lyste accident pytous eke lyke soth prime face troylus knyght dere priue comyng syker place though dyd grace consydred al thynges stode wonder sen dyd al goode creseyde answerde wyselye god reste soule bryng wo eme ywys fayne wolde done best grace whether ye dwell hym go tyl god bettre mynde sende dulcarnon ryght wyttes ende quod pandarus yea nece wol ye dulcarnon called flemyng wretch semeth hard wretch woll nauyt lere slouth wylful etches sayd hem yt nat worth two fetch ye ben wise yt ye han honde ny neyther hard ne skylful withstonde tha eme doth lyst er come wol vp fyrst aryse loue god sen al tryst two ye bethe bothe wyse werketh nowe discret wyse honour may haue plesaunce al gouernaunce wel sayd nece dere good thryfte wyse getyl hert lyggeth styl taketh hym ryght nedeth ferther hym stert ech easeth sorowes smert loue god venus herye sone hope shal ben merye troylus ful sone knee sette ful sobrely ryght beddes heed best wyse hys lady grette lorde wore sodaynlyche reed ne thoughe men shulde smyten heed colde worde aright brynge sodaynly hys sodayne comyng pandarus wele coulde fele euery thyng play anon began said nece se lorde knele nowe trouth se thys gentyll man word quyshen ran said kneleth whyle leste god hertes brynge sone reste naught sayn bad nat rise sorowe put remembraunce el toke wyse duetie obseruaunce wel fynde hym plesauce hym kyst al though syked sore bade sytte adowne withoute quod pandarus wol ye well begyn nowe doth sytte good nece dere vpon beddes syde al therwythin eche bet may wt worde drew fyere toke light fonde countenaunce loke vpon olde romaunce creseyde troylus ladye ryght clere stode grounde sykernesse al thought seruaunt knyght ne shulde non vntrouth gesse nathlesse consydred hys distresse loue cause foly thus spake hym ialousy lo hert myne wolde excellence loue ayenst man may ne ought eke goodly maken resistence eke bycause felte wel say great trouth seruyce euery day yt hert al myn soth sayne droue rew vpon payne goodnes haue foude alway yet dere hert knyght thanke ferre haue wyt al moche ryght emforth conyng myght haue aye shal howe sore smert ben trewe hole wythall myne hert dredelesse shal founden preue herte myne al thys sayne shal wel told yt ye nought greue though right self coplain wyth meane finally payne halte hert mine heuynesse fully slayne euery wronge redresse good myne ne howe ielousy ala wycked wyuere thus causelesse cropen harme wold faine deliuere ala al hole slyuere shulde haue hys refute digne place ioue sone hert race thou auctour nature thys honour thy dignyte folke vngylty suffre iniure gylty al quyte goth leful playne vndeserued suffrest ialousy wolde vpon playne crye eke al wo folke nowe vsen sayne ryght thus yee ialousy loue wolde bushel venym al excusen wha graine loue shoue wote hygh ioue sytte aboue lyker loue hate grame ought beare hys name certayne maner ialousye excusable ywys whan cause fantasye wyth pyte wel expressed vnneth doth sayth amys goodly drynketh vp al hys distresse excuse gentyllesse full furye dispyte surmounteth hys repression hert myne ye nat plyte thonke god passion wyl cal illusion habundaunce loue besy cure doth herte disese endure sory wroth deuoure hertes re lyst ordal othe sorte wyse leste loue god let preue best yf gylty dey ala myght done sey wyth fewe bryght teeres newe eyen fel thus seyde god yu wost thouyht ne dede vntrew troylus neuer yet creseyde yt heed downe bed leyde shete wrigh syghed sore held peace nat word spake help god quench sorow hope shal best may haue sene ful misty morowe folowen ful ofte mery sommers day wynter foloweth grene may men sene alday reden eke story sharpe shoures bene victory thys troylus whan wordes herde haue ye care lyste slepe thought hym stroke yerde se creseyde hys lady wepe wel felte aboute hys herte crepe euery teare whych creseyde stert crape dethe strayne ye hert hys mynde gan tyme acurse came borne nowe wycke turned worse al labour hath done beforne wend lost thought na lorne pandarus thought ala thy wyle serueth naught welaway whyle withal hynge adown heed fel knee sorowfully syght might saine felt na deed wroth yt shuld sorowes liyt nathelesse whan speken myght tha saide thus god wot yt game whan al wyst blame therwyth sorowe hert shette hys eyen fyl nat teere euery spyrit vygour knette astonyed oppressed felyng sorowe hys feere aught el fledde towne adowne fyl al sodaynly swoune thys lytle sorowe se al hushte pandarus vp faste nece peace lost bethe agaste certayne laste thys bedde hym caste sayd thefe mannes herte rent al bare sherte sayd nece ye helpe v nowe ala owne troylus lorne iwys wolde wyste howe ful fayne ala borne yee nece wol ye pullen thorne stycketh herte pandare say al foryeue stynt al thys fare yea quod ful leuer al good sunne aboute goth wythal swore hys eere iwys dere herte wrothe haue trouth many othe nowe speke creseyde naught yet might nat abreyde therwt ponce paumes handes gan frote wete teples twayn deliuer hym fro bytter bandes ofte hym kyste shortly sayne rewaken dyd al payne last gan breth drawe swoune sone adawe gan bet mynde reason hym take wonder sore abashed ywys sygh whan gan bet awake said mercy god thing ye wyth seluen thus amys quod tho creseyde man game troylus woll ye thus shame therwtal arme ouer hym sayde al foryaue oft tyme keste thonked spake sayde fyl purpose hertes reste answerde hym leste goodly wordes hym disporte gan ofte hys sorowes comfort quod pandarus aught espyen light ne seruen naught lyght good sycke folkes eyen loue god sen ye ben brought wt thus good plyte let non heuy thouyt ben hangyng herts twey bare candel chymeney soone though nede whan suche othes lyste deuyse take thought tho feere ne cause eke none byd hym thence ryse yet lesse thyng othes may suffyse many case euery wyght gesse loueth wel meaneth gentyllesse effecte wolde wete anon man eke ialous sen cause non eke signe toke bade tel besyly el certayne bare hym honde thys done malyce fonde wythouten shortly sayne must obey vnto thys ladyes heest lasse harme must fayne sayd whan feest myght haue loked leest nat al dere ynough ryshe nedes must cause fyshe answerde swete al harme yt sen non yuell meane god bought v two al thynge myne entent cleene argumentes ne worth beene wol ye chyldyshe ialous counterfete nowe worthy ye ybete tho troylus gan soroufully syke lest wroth hym thouyt hys hert deyde sayde ala vpon sorowes syke haue mercy swete herte myne creseyde yf tho wordes seyde wronge wol trespace doth lyst al grace answerde gylte mysericorde sayne foryeue al thys euermore thys nyght recorde bethe wel ware ye nomore amys nay dere herte myne ywys haue smerte yeue myne owne swete herte troylus blisse supprised put al goddes hande mente nothyng wel sodaynly auysed armes faste hym hente pandarus ful good entente layde slepe sayde yf ye wyse sweueneth lest mo folke aryse might may sely larke say whan sperhauke hath fote ylke tway thys tale sugre sote though tarye yere somtyme mote myne auctour tellen gladnesse wel haue tolde heuynesse creseyde felte thus ytake writen clerkes bokes olde ryght aspen leefe gan quake whan hym felte hys armes folde troylus al hole care colde gan thanken tho blysful goddes seuen sodry paine bring folke heue troylus armes gan straine sayd swete euer mote gone ye caught twayne nowe yeldeth boote none creseyde answerde thus anone ne er nowe swete herte dere ben yolde ywys nowe nat soth sayd healed feuer great sicknesse men must drynken ofte se ful bytter drynke haue gladnesse men drynken oft payne great distresse meane thys auenture paine hath foude al cure nowe swetnesse semeth swete bytternesse assayed byforne wo blysse nowe flete none felten sen borne nowe thys bet two lorne loue god take euery woman hede werken thus yf come nede creseyde al quite euery drede tene iust cause tryste made feest ioye sene whan trouth cleue entent wyst tre wyth many twyste bytrent writhe swete wodbynde eche hem armes wynde newe abashed nyghtyngale stynteth fyrst wha beginnneth sing whan hereth heerdes tale hedge wyght steryng syker doth voice ryng ryght creseyde whan drede stent opened hert tolde entent right yt seeth hys deth yshapen dyen mote aught may gesse sodaynly rescous doth escapen deth brought sykernesse al worlde present gladnesse troylus hath lady swete wyth worse happe god let v neuer mete armes smal streyght backe soft sydes longe fleshly smoth whyte gan stroke good thrifte bade full oft snowysse throte brestes round lite thus thys heuen gan delyte therwithal thousande tymes kyst done ioye vnneth wyst sayd thus loue charite thy mother eke citheria swete thy selfe next heryed venus meane wel wylly planete next meneus grete neuer man goddes holde ye haue brought fro care cold benigne loue thou holy bonde thynges wol grace lyste nat honouren lo thys desyre wol flye wythouten wynge noldest thou bountie hem socouren seruen best alway labouren yet al loste yt dare well sayne certes yf thy grace passed desertes thou ye leste thoke coulde deserue hem nombred ben vnto thy grace hast holpen ther lykely sterue bestowed hygh place thylke boundes may blysse pace laude reuerence thy bounte thyne excellence therwithal creseyde anone kyst certayne felte disease thus sayd nowe wolde god wyst myne hert swete howe might please man euer thus ease fayrest best euer sey deyneth rest may men sene mercy passeth right experience felte vnworthy swete wyght herte myne benignite thynke though vnworthy yet mote nede amenden wyse ryght ye vertue hye seruice loue god lady dere syth hath wrouyt shall serue thus meane woll ye seere lyue yf lyst sterue teacheth howe may deserue thoke yt thrugh myne ignorauce ne nothyng displeasaunce certes fresh womanlyche wyfe dar saye trouth diligence shall ye fynden lyfe ne woll nat certayn breken defence yf present absence loue god let slee dede yf lyke vnto womanhede wy myne owne hertes lust grounde ease myne hert dere graunt mercy trust let v fal awaye fro matere suffyseth sayd worde withouten repentaunce welcome knyght peace suffysaunce delyte ioyes one leest impossyble wyt saye iudgeth ye haue ben feest gladnesse yf hem lyst playe nomore thus ylke tway nigh betwixen drede sykernesse fe ten loue great worthynesse blysful nyght hem longe ysought blyth vnto hem two thou wer ne feest wt soul yboght yea leest ioye away thou foule dauger thou feere let hem heuen blysse dwell hygh ne tell soth though tellen myne auctour excellence yet haue sayd god forne shall euery thyng holly sentence yf loues reuerence haue worde eched best doth therwithal ryght seluen lest wordes euery parte speke hem vnder correction felyng haue loues arte put discrettion entreate make diminition langage beseche purpose rather speche ylke two beth armes last loth hem sonder gon eche wenden ben byraft el lo moost feere thing nyce dreames wer ful oft eche hem sayd swete clyppe thus el mete lorde gan goodly se neuer loke ne bleynt fro face sayde dere hert maye soth ye ben place yea hert myne god thanke grace tho creseyde therwithal hym kyst spyrite ioye nyst troylus full oft eyen two gan kysse sayd eyen clere ye wrought suche wo ye humble nettes lady dere though ther mercy writte chere god wot text full harde fynde coude ye withouten bonde bynde therwith gan fast armes take well hundred tymes gan syke nat sorowfull syghes men make wo el whan folke syke easy syghes suche ben lyke shewed affection within suche syghes coulde nat blyu sone spake sondry thinges fyll purpose auenture playing enterchaungeden rynges tellen scripture well wot broche golde asure ruby set lyke herte creseyde yaue stacke sherte lorde trowe ye couetous wretche blam th loue halte despyte tho pen yt muckre ketche euer yet yeue suche delyte loue poynt plyte nay doutlesse also god saue parfyte ioye may nygarde haue woll say yes lorde lye tho busy wretch ful wo drede callen loue woodnesse follye shall fall hem shall rede shall forgon whyte eke rede lyue wo ther god yeue hem myschauce euery louer trouth auauce wolde god tho wretch dispyse seruyce loue eares also longe mida full couetyse therto dronken hote stronge cresus dyd affectes wronge teachen hem ben vyce louers nat although holde hem nyse ylke two yt say whan hertes wel assured tho gonnen speake playe eke rehersen whan knewe fyrst euery wo fere passed suche heuynesse thonke god turned gladnesse euer whan hem fyll speke thyng suche tyme agon kyssyng tale shulde breke fallen newe ioye anon dydde al myght syns wer one recoueren blysse ben ease paysed wo ioye countrepeyse reason woll speake slepe accordeth matere god wot toke full lytle kepe lest night hem dere ne shulde vayne escape manere beset ioye besynesse sowneth gentylnesse whan cocke comune astrologer gan breest beate crowe lucifer dayes messaunger gan ryse beames throw estward rose coulde knowe fortuna maior tha anon creseyde hert sore troylus thus seyde myne hertes lyfe trust plesauce borne ala wo day v mote make disceueraunce tyme ryse hence go el lost euer mo nyght ala wilt thou ouer v houe longe whan alemena laye ioue blacke nyght folke bookes rede shapen art god world hyde certayne tymes thy darke wede vnder men myght rest abyde wel oughte beestes playn folk chyde ther day wt labour wold v brest thou thus flyest deynest v nat rest thou doest ala shortly thyne offyce tho rakle night ther god maker kynde thyne haste thyne vnkynde vyce fast aye himispery bynde neuermore vnder yu groud thou wind thou hyest troye haue forgone thus hastly ioye troylus tho wordes felte thought hym tho pitous distresse blody teares hert melt yet neuer suche heuynesse assayed great gladnesse gan therwithall creseyde lady dere armes strayne holde louely manere cruell daye accuser ioye night loue haue stole fast ywryen accursed thy comyng troye euery bore hath one thy bryght eyen enuyous day lyst spyen hast thou lost sekest thou place god thy light queche grace ala haue louers agylt dispytous day thyne payne hell many louer hast thou slayne wylt thy poring wol nowhere let hem dwell profrest thou thy lyght herefor sel go sell hem smal seales graue woll v nedeth daye haue eke sunne tytan gan chyde sayd foole well may despise hast al night dawning thy side suffrest soone vp fro ryse disease v louers wyse hold bed ther thou thy morow byd god yeue sorowe therwith ful sore syghed thus seyd lady ryght wele wo well roote goodly myne creseyde shall ryse ala shall fele hert mote two shulde lyfe houre saue syns lyfe haue shall done certes ne whan ala shall tyme se plyte may ben eft wt lyfe god wote shall syns desyre ryght nowe byteth deed anon retourne shuld long ala fro soiourne nathelesse myne owne lady bryght wyst vtterly humble seruaunt knight hert yset fermely ye myne truly leuer worldes twayne yet shulde bet enduren payne creseyde answered ryght anon sygh sayd hert dere game ywys ferforth gone fyrst shall phebus fallen fro spere eueryche egle ben doues fere euery rocke place sterte er troylus go creseydes hert ye ben depe within hert graue tho wold turne thouyt wysely god soule saue dyen payne coulde nought ye loue god yt v hath wrought let brayne none fantasy crepe cause dye ye wolde haue fast mind haue wolde beseche yf wyst sothly fynde god myght apoynt ioyes eche hert myne withouten speche beth true el routh thyne god trouth beth glad thy lyue sykernesse thus sayd neuer er ne shall mo yf great gladnesse turne ayen sone ye go fayne wolde ye wysely god myne hert bryng rest hym armes toke oft kest ayenst wyll syth must nedes troylus vp rose fast hym cledde armes toke lady free hundred tymes waye sped suche wordes hert bledde sayd farewell dere hert swete god v graut sounde sone mete worde sorow answerd sore gan partyng distrayne troylus vnto palleys ferde wo begon soth sayne hard wrog sharpe desire ye payn ben efte pleasaunce may neuer remebraunce returned royal palleys sone soft vnto bed gan slynke slepe longe wont done al nouyt may wel lyg wynke slepe may ther non hert synke thinking desire bred folde worth wend thouyt gan vp winde wordes al euery countenaunce fermely impressen mynde lest poynt plesaunce verely thylke remembraunce desyre al newe brende lust brede gan erst yet toke non hede creseyde also ryght wyse troylus gan hert shette worthynesse lust dedes wyse gentlenesse met thonkyng loue well beset desyryng oft haue hert dere place durst make chere pandare morow comen vnto nece gan fayre grete sayd nyght rayned ala al drede ye nece swete haue lytle leyser slepe mete al night hath rainso wake v trowe heedes ake nere came sayd stant mery morowe nece ye fare creseyde answered neuer bet foxe ye ben god yeue hart care god helpe ye caused fare trow al wordes whyte seeth knoweth ful lyte gan face wry shete woxe shame al reed pandarus gan vnder prye sayd yf shall ben deed haue sworde smyt heed arme sodaynly thryst vnder necke last kyst passe al ye chargeth nought saye god foryaue deth also foryaue vncle gan play cause none thyng ryght theffect go wha tyme home house went pandare hath fully entent turne ayen troylus restlesse full longe bedde laye pryuily sent pandarus hym come haste may came anon one sayd nay troylus full sobrely gret downe vpon beddes syde hym set troylus thaffectioun frendly loue hert maye deuyse pandarus knee fyll adowne er wolde place aryse gan hym thanken best wyse hundred tyme gan tyme blesse borne bring distresse sayd frende frendes alderbest euer soth tell thou hast heue wrought soule rest fro phlegeton fyrye floud hell though might thousad tymes sel vpon daye lyfe thy seruyse myght mote suffyse sun worlde may se sawe neuer yet lyfe dare leye ioly fayre goodly whose shall tyll dye thus dare seye thanked hygh worthynesse loue eke thy kynde besynesse thus hast thou lytle thyng iyeue obleged aye lyfe thrugh thyn help liue el deed ben ago many day wt worde downe bed lay pandarus full soberly hym herde tyll sayd hym answerd dere frende haue done case god wot lefe glad man maye god helpe take nowe nat agrefe shall sayn beware mischefe ther brought art thy blysse thou thy selfe ne cause nat mysse fortune sharpe aduersitie worst kynde infortune man haue ben prosperitie remembre whan passed thou art wyse ynouy thy nat amys nat rakel though thou syt warme yf thou certayne woll harme thou art ese holde well therin also sure red euery fyre great craft kepe well wynne brydle alway well thy speche thy desyre wordly ioye holdeth nat wyre preueth well brest alday oft thy nede werken soft quod troylus hope god toforne dere frende shall bere gilt shal nothing ben lorn ne nyll nat rakle greuen nedeth nat mater oft tere wistest thou myne hert wel pandare god wot thou woldest lyte care tho gan tell hym glad nyght wherof fyrst hert drad sayd frende true knyght fayth owe god neuer halfe hote aye desyre byteth loue best delyteth nat selfe nat wysely fele newe qualitie yea dyd pandare answered sayd thus one may heuen blysse feleth wayes dare laye thilke tyme first herde saye worde troylus neuer full speke matere praysen vnto pandarus bountie ryght lady dere pandarus thank maken chere tale aye span newe begyn tyll nyght departed hem atwyn sone fortune wolde comen blysfull tyme swete troylus warned yt sholde ther erst creseyde lady mete felte hert ioye flete faythfully gan al goddes hery let se yf mery holden forme gyse comyng also erst nedeth nought deuise playnly theffect ryght go ioye suretie pandarus hem two abed brought whan hem lest thus ben quyet rest naught nedeth syth ben met aske yf blythe erst well tho bet thousand folde nedeth enquere ago euery sorowe euery fere ywys wend moche ioye hert maye comprehende ny lytle thynge sey passeth euery wyt deuyse eche hem gan lustes obey felicitie clerkes wyse comenden ne may nat suffyse ioye may wrytten ynke passeth hert may bethynke cruel day welaway stounde gan aproch signes knewe hem thought felen dethes woud wo hem yt chaungen gan hew day gonnen despyse newe calling traytour enuyous worse bytterly dayes lyght curse quod troylus ala ware pyrous tho swyft stedes thre drawen forth sonnes chare han gon bypath despyte maketh soone daye sunne hym hasteth thus ryse ne shall neuer hym sacrifyce nedes day depart hem must sone whan speche chere twyn anon wer wont setten tyme metyng eft yfere many night wrouyt manere thus fortune tyme lad ioye creseyde eke kynges son troye suffysaunce blysse syngynges troylus gan al lyfe lede spendeth iusteth maketh feestynges yeueth frely oft chaungeth wede helde hym alway drede world folke com well kynde freshest best coulde fynde suche voyce steuen throughout yu worlde honour largesse vp ronge vnto yate heuen loue suche gladnesse hert demed gesse ni louer worlde ease wel thus gan loue plese goodlyhed beautie yt kynde lady ysette nat ye moutenaunce gnat vnbynde hert creseydes nette narowe ymasked yknette vndon maner syde nyll nat ben ought yt maye betyde honde full oft wolde take pandarus garden lede suche feaste processe make hym creseyde womanheed beautie withouten drede heuen wordes wolde synge manere loue erth see hath gouernauce loue heestes hath heuen hye loue holesome alyaunce halt people ioyned hym lyst hem gye loue knytteth lawe company couple doth vertue dwell bynde accorde yt haue tolde tell yt world wt faith yt stable dyuerseth stoundes accordyng elementes beth discordable holden abonde perpetually duryng phebus mote rosy day forth brig yt mone hath lordship ouer ye niytes al doth loueaye heried mightes yt see gredy flowen constrayneth certayne ende floudes fersly ne growen drenchen erth euermo yf loue ought let brydle go loueth asondre shulde lepe lost wer al yt loue halt nowe hepe wolde god authour kynde bonde loue vertu lyst serchen hertes al fast bynde fro bod wight ye wey wyst hertes colde hem wold yt hem twyst make hem loue hem lyst aye rew hertes sore kepe hem ben trewe nedes townes werre aye fyrst armes dyght certaynly yf bokes erre haue hector moost ydradde wyght encrease hardynesse myght com hym loue ladyes thank wyn altered spyrite within tyme truce hauking wolde ryde el hunt bore beare lyoun small beestes let gon besyde whan yt come rydyng ye towne full oft lady window downe fresh faucon comen mue full redy hym goodly salue moost loue vertue speche despyte al wretchednesse doutlesse nede hym beseche honouren hem worthynesse easen hem distresse glad yf wight wel ferde louer whan wyst herde soth sayne loste held euery wiyt yf loues hygh seruyce meane folke ought ben ryght ouer wel coulde deuyse sentement vncouth wyse aray euery louer thought well sayde wrought though come bloud royal hym lyst pryde wyght chace benigne eche generall gat thake euery place thus wolde loue yhered grace pryde yre enuy auaryce gan flye euery vyce thou lady bright doughter diane thy blynde winged son eke dan cupide ye sustren nyne eke helic ne hyl pernaso lysten fyr abyde ye thus ferre han deyned gyde nomore syns ye woll wende ye heryed ben aye withouten ende haue sayd fully soge theffect ioye troylus seruyce disease amonge myne auctour lysteth deuyse thyrde boke nowe ende wyse troylus lust quyete
