agayne whan departed gone sawe folkes comynge wythout wall gret people nombre coude none ladyes gentylwomen clothed blewe echone worde wythall knowe worde deuyse came thycke yt ne might wyse wyth anone came perseueraunce stode came streyght ye ben myne olde acquayntaunce enquere bolder wolde worde bere eche degre pray tell secrete wyse shall kepe close warantyse ben fyue ladyes fere gentylwomen foure company whan begyne open matere shall ye knowe wordes ut haue none verely tolde countenaunce myne aray blewe nedeth nowe woll go agayne ye may haue knowleg ye shulde soth yf ye wolde take payne ye dyd ryght moche v yf ye dyd rather sped soner may go great cost alway taryenge longe sewe wery thynge parted came agayne anone ye muste come chamberlayne nowe redy euerychone folowe whan euer ye lyst certayne haue none eloquence tell playne besechynge may excused trewe meanynge refused wente forth perseueraunce se prees wonder cace passe great combraunce people stode thycke euery place nowe stande ye styll lytell space ease somwhat shall assay make better way forth goth amonge hem euerychone makyng way yt myght passe ease whan done beckende v come folowed la brouyt v streyght vnto ye chabrelayne lefte v tha went agayne salued reason wolde full humbly besechyng great goodnesse mater wolde good lady maystresse ye welcome sothfastnesse se please redy may ease folowed vnto chambre dore systers come ye wete ye well paued store goodlyest wight myght se furthermore aboute loked eche corner vpon euery wall whyche made burell crystal wherin grauen storyes many one fyrst howe phyllis womanly pyte dyed pyteously loue demophone nexte story tysbe howe slewe selfe vnder tree yet sawe riyt pytous caas antony slayne cleopatra syde hawes e full vntrewly disceyued vayne also annelida quene vpon arcyte howe sore dyd complayne storyes graued certayne many mo reherce longe tell fere bycause walles shone bright wyth fyne vmple ouer sprad entet folke shuld nat hurt syght storyes myght rad furthermore went lad sawe wythout fayle chayre set wyth full ryche aparayle fyue stage set fro grounde cassydony full curyously wrought foure pomelles golde rounde set wt saphirs good coude thouyt wote ye souyt suppose fro countrey inde another suche right farre fynde wete ye well ryght nere durst beholdyng aboue ryche cloth estate wrought wyth nedle full straungely worde theron thus sayd trewly endure tell wordes fewe wyth great letter better hem knewe thus stode dore opened anone gentylwoman semely stature berynge mace came selfe alone sothely thought goodly creature spake nothyng lowde ensure hastely wyth goodly warnynge make rome lady comynge wyth anone sawe perseueraunce howe helde vp tapet hande sawe also ryght goodly ordenaunce great lady within tapet stande comynge outwarde woll ye vnderstande noble company coude nat tell nombre sykerly theyr name wolde nothyng enquere suche wolde sewe vnto saue lady whyche chauncellere attemperaunce sothely name v nedeth wyth haue moche mater alwaye forthe tell furthermore thys lady beaute discryue connynge symple verely neuer yet dayes lyue inly fayre haue sene none trewly estate assured vtterly wanted naught dare well assure longed goodly creature furthermore speke aray shall tell maner gowne clothe golde full ryche nay coloure blewe ryght goodly facyou taberde wyse sleues hangyng adown purfyl wyse shall deuyse sorte coller vente lyke armyne made purfelynge wyth great perles full fyne orient couched one worchynge wyth diamondes stede powderynge sleues purfell assyse made lyke euery wyse aboute necke sorte fayre rubyes whyte floures ryght fyne enamayle vpon heed set fayrest wyse cercle great balays entayle ernest speke wythout fayle yonge olde euery maner age worlde loken vysage thus comynge forthe syt estate presence kneled euerychone presentynge bylles wote ye full humbly toke hem one one whan done came al anone dyd eche manere knelyng one rysynge fere wha set place chamberlayne dyd vnto call goodly comyng vnto pace entent knowyng nothyng voyde backe preace vp wal make large roume loke ye tary take bylles secretarye chamberlayne dyde comaundement came agayne byd secretarye beyng present bylles delyuered also onely many mo lady wyth good aduyce agayne anone wythall called chamberlayne woll fyrst thyng ye secretarye ye make come anone wyth bylles thus wyll also presence rede hem euerychon maye take good aduyce theron ladyes ben oure counsayle loke thys done wythouten fayle whan chamberlayne wyste entet anon dyd secretarye call let bylles present lady wyll madame shall presence wyll ye hem call wyth good wyll redy pleasure whan comaundeth vpon made ordynaunce yt came fyrst bylles shulde redde full gentelly sayd perseueraunce rayson wyll sonest spedde anone wythall vpon tapet spredde secretarye layde hem downe echone bylles fyrst redde one one fyrst lady bearyng deuyse sans que iamays thus wrote byl complaynyng sore full pytous wyse promesse made faythful hert wyl broken ayenst maner skyll wythout deserte alwayes partye thys mater desyryng remedy next folowing word wise vng sanz chauger thus dyd coplayne though guerdoned seruice yet nothynge lyke toke payne wherfore coude wyse restrayne thys case sewe vntyll presence reason wolde haue recompence furthermore speke twayne one hem wrote fantasy vncques puis leuer tel playne complaynt full pytous verely sayd great reason remembre thys matere shall tell processe fere byl made complaynyng gyse ioy comforte gladnesse surete maner wyse sayd therin poynt stablenesse nowe yll nowe wele sykernesse full humbly desyrynge hygh grace soone shewe remedy thys cace felawe made byll thus sayd playnynge wyse loued best whether wrothe wele apayde might nat se whan wolde faynest wrothe verye ernest tell worde ferforth wote entierment vostre ryght thus wrote vpon made great request wyth herte wyl might done vntyll might redresse best mynd might fynd sone remedy whych boone rehersynge sayd besechynge myght nomore lyke wyse done gentylwomen company put bylles tell one hem wrote cest sanz dire verely matere hole specify wyth byll put writynge sayd ye shall haue knowynge sayd god wote ful pytously lyke disposed herte mysfortvne toke greuously al one ioy smerte somtyme thanke al good deserte comforte wanted non comynge vsed greued nothynge desyrynge lowly besechynge wolde seke better way ben dayes lyuynge stedfast trewe wylbe alway felawe somwhat shal saye whose byl red nexte forthe withal ment rehersen shal en diu est wrote deuyse thus sayd withouten fayle trouthe myght take wyse like thouyt wherfore meruaile trouth sotyme wont take auayle euery matere al ago pyte suffred moche wherof shuld co playn thouyt gret encobrauce moche wryte therfore certayn god put al affiaunce worde made remembraunce beseching wolde cace shewe vnto fauour grace thirde wrote rehersing greuauce yea wote ye pitous thing thouyt felte great dysplesauce one miyt right wel perceyue chere wonder sate passynge nere yet lothe put wrytynge nede wol haue course euery thinge soyes ensure word certayne thus wrote lytell space loued labour vayne set another place full humbly desyrynge cace good comforte sorowe appese myght lyue hertes ease fourth surely thought liked wele porte behauynge bien moneste farre coude fele word tyll welbelongynge wherfore prayed aboue thynge full hertely say substaunce wolde sende good continuaunce ye haue rehersed bylles nowe let se somwhat entent may hap parauenture ye shall nowe pray whyle present ye shall haue knowlege parde ment thus say trouthe make fable case selfe inly lamentable well wote ye woll thynke lyke say whan ye haue herde byll good tell hate saint iame abyde whyle nat yet wyll yet muste ye wete reason skyll sith ye haue knowlege yt thus sayd without wordes nothynge lefe dethe come fynall ende sorowes payne shulde desyre seme ye ye knewe al aforne certayne wote ye wolde tell playne without helpe hath thyng cure nat thynke may longe endure trouthe hath beproued wele say sothe say full longe tyme suffred euery dele pacience kepe store goodnesse besechynge therfore myght haue thanke wyse deserte serueth iustyse whan bylles rad euerychone ladyes toke good aduysement hem answere one one thought moche entent wherfore yaue hem commaundement presence come bothe one yeue hem answere generall dyd suppose ye verely spake selfe sayd manere haue well sene bylles hem pytous wol therfore ye knowe thys infere wythin shorte tyme courte parlyment shall holde palays present thys wherin ye fynde greued shall ye fynde open remedy suche wyse ye shall releued ye reherce throughly date ye shall knowe verely ye may haue space comyng dyligence shall tell wrytyng thanked moste humble wyse felaushyp eche one one assente submyttyng v lowly tyll seruyse thouyt trauayle spet suche wyse helde v contente eche v toke sleue forth withal shulde take leue sodaynly water sprange anone visage therwythall woke nowe thought al gone mased vp gan loke anone went made boke thus symply rehersyng substaunce bycause shulde remembrauce nowe verily dreame passyng good worthy remembraunce though stande long stode shulde none encombraunce toke therin inly great pleasaunce tell nowe ye boke call must wete wt right good wyll ye shall thys boke say ryght name tell certaynte lassemble de dame thus hyght howe thynke ye name good parde nowe go farewell call felawes muste sone rede wel dreme tale done finis conclusion astrolabie litell lowys sunne perceyue well certayne euydeces thyne abilite lerne science touchyng nombres proporcions also wel co sydre thy besye prayer especyall lerne tretyse astrolabe moche philosopher sayth wrappeth hym hys frede co descendeth ryghtfull prayer hys frende therfore haue gyuen suffycient astrolaby orizonte compowned latytude oxenford vpon ye whiche medyacyon thys lytell treatyse purpose teache certayne nombre conclusyons pertayning instrument saye certayne conclusyons thre cause fyrst cause truste wel conclusyons haue founde el possyblye myght founde noble instrument astrolabye ben vnknowen perfytely mortall man regyon suppose another cause thys sothlye carte astrolabye haue ysene ben conclusyos woll thynges perfourme byhestes hem ben harde thy tender age ten yere conceyue treatyse deuyded fyue partes wyll shewe wonder lyght rule naked wordes englishe latyn ne canste thou yet smale lytell sonne neuer lesse suffyseth trewe conclusyons englysshe well suffyseth thys noble clerkes grekes conclusyons greke arabyens arabyke iewes hebrewe latyn folke latyn latyne folke hem fyrste dyuers langages wryte hem owne tonge hys sayne latyne god wote language manye mo haue conclusyons ben suffycyently lerned taught yet dyuers rule ryght dyuers pathes leade dyuers folke ryght waye rome nowe woll praye mekely euery person discrete redeth hereth thys lytell treatyse haue rude entendyng excused superfluyte wordes two cause fyrst cause curyous endytyng harde sentence full heuy one suche chylde lerne seconde cause thys sothly semeth better wryten vnto chylde twyse good sentence forgette one lowis shewe lyth englysshe trewe conclusyons touchynge thys mater onely trewe many subtyll conclusyons ben yshewed latyne anye commune tretyse astrolabye conne thanke pray god saue kyng lorde thys language hym faythe beareth obeyeth eueryche hys degre lasse consydreth well ne vsurpe haue founden thys werke labour myne engyne nam leude compylatour labour olde astrologiens haue translated myne englysshe onelye thy doctryne wyth thys swerde shal sleue enuye pthe fyrste partye fyrste partye treatyse shall reherce fygures membres thyne astrolabye bycause thou shalte haue greater knowynge thyne owne instrument pthe seconde partye pthe seconde partye shall teche werken practyke foresayde conclusyons ferforthe narowe may shewed smale instrument portatyfe aboute wel wote euery astrologien smallest fraction ne wol shewed smal instrument subtyll table calcused cause pthe thyrde partye pthe thirde party shal zodiac moone aryseth anye latytude arysynge anye planete hys latytude fro eclyptyke lyne pthe fyfte partye pthe fyfthe partye shall ben introductorye statute oure doctours whyche thou mayste lerne great parte generall rule theoryke astrologye whyche fyfthe partye thou shalt fynde table equacyons house latitude oxenforde table dignytees planettes notefull thynges yf god vouchsafe hys mother mayden mo behete pthe rynge pthy astrolabye hath rynge putten thy thombe thy ryght honde takyng heyght thynges take kepe frome hence forwarde woll cleape heyght heuy thynge take rule altytude wythouten mo wordes pthe turet pthys rynge renneth maner turet fastned moder thyne astrolabye roume space dystroubeleth instrument hangen hys ryght centure moder thyne astrolabye thickest brinkes vtmoste ryng degree al myddle wythin rynge shall thynner receyue plate dyuers clymates also rethe shape maner nette el webbe loppe pthe moder pthe moder thyne astrolaby thickest plate perced wyth large hole receyueth wombe thynne plate compowned dyuers clymates thy reete shapen maner nette webbe loppe pof foure lynes pthys moder deuyded backhalfe wyth lyne cometh discendynge fro rynge downe netherest bordure whyche lyne fro foresayd rynge vnto centre large hole amydde cleped south lyne el lyne merydionall remenaunt lyne downe bordure cleped northe lyne lyne mydnight pof foure lynes eest west northe southe overthwarte thys forsayd longe lyne crosseth another lyne length fro eest west whyche lyne frome lytell crosse bordure vnto centure large hole cleped eest lyne el lyne oriental remenaunt lyne fro forsayd orientall vnto bordure ycleped west lyne lyne occidentall pnowe hast thou foure quarter thyn astrolabye deuyded foure principal plage quarter fyrmament pwhyche ryght syde whyche lyfte eest syde astrolaby cleaped ryght syde weste syde cleaped lyft syde foryet lytel lowys put ye rynge thyne astrolabye vpon thombe thy ryght hande wyl hys ryght syde towarde thy lyfte syde hys lyfte syde woll towarde thy ryght syde take thys rule generall well backe wombe syde vpon ende thys eest lyne fyrste sayde ymarked lytell crosse euermore generallye consydred entrynge eest degre whyche sunne aryseth pthe degree fro eest lyne south fro lytell crosse vp ende meridionall lyne vnder rynge shalte thou fynde bordure deuyded xc degree proporcio euery quarter thyn astrolaby deuyded ouer ye degree ben nombres augrym deuyden thylke degree fro v v sheweth loge strykes bytwen ye longe strykes space bytwene conteyneth myle waye euery degree thylke bordure coteyneth foure minute say foure mynutes houre pof twelue sygnes aries taurus gemini cancer vnder copas thilke degree ben wrytten name twelue signes aries taurus gemini cacer leo virgo libra scorpio sagitarius capricornus aquaries piss ye nombres degree sygnes ben wrytte augrymatioue wyth longe diuysious fyue fyue deuydeth tyme ye signe entreth vnto laste ende vnderstande wel degree signes ben euerych hem consydred lx mynutes euerye mynute lx secondes forth smale fraction infynite sayth alcabucius therfore knowe well degre bordure conteyneth iiii mynutes degre sygne contayneth lx mynutes haue thys mynde pthe cercle october xxxi nouember xxx december xxxi nathelesse though iulius cesar toke two dayes feueryre put hem hys month iuly augustus cesar cleped moneth auguste hys name ordeyned xxxi dayes yet truste well sunne dwelleth therfore neuer ne lasse one sygne another pthe name holy dayes foloweth name holy dayes kalender next hem ye letter abc whych fallen pthe scale astrolabye next forsayd cercle abc vnder extensa nether party vmbra versa pthe rule hast thou brode rule hath euery ende square plate parted wyth certayne hole lesse receyuen streames sunne day eke mediacion thyne eye knowe altytude sterres nyght pthe pyn whych ymagined pole artyke horse large pyn maner exyltre goth thorowe hole halt table clymathes ye reeth wombe mother thorow whych pynne goeth lytel wedge whyche cleped horse strayneth partes together thys forsayd great pynne maner exyltre ymagende pole artyke thyne astrolabye pfor lynes wombe syde wombe syde thyne astrolabye also deuyded wt longe crosse foure quarter eest west fro south north ryght syde left syde ye backsyde pthe degree wombe syde border whych wombe syde deuyded fro poynte eest lyne vnto poynte south lyne vnder ye rynge xc degree proporcion euery quarter deuyded backsyde amouteth ccclx degree vnder stande well degree thys border bene answerynge consentynge degree equinoctiall deuyded nombre euerye cercle hye heauen thys border deuided also wyth xxiij letter smale crosse aboue south lyne sheweth xxiiij houres equales clocke haue sayde v degree maken myle waye thre myle waye maken houre euery degre thys border conteyneth iiij mynutes euery mynute lx secodes nowe haue told twyse declaracion pof thre princypall cercles plate vnder reete dyscryued wt thre cercles leest cleped cercle cancer bycause heed cancer turneth euermore co centryke vpon cercle thys halfe cancer greatest declinacion northewarde sonne therfore yclypped solsticium sommer whych declinacion ptholome xxiij degree l minute well cancer capricorne thys sygne cancer cleped tropyke sommer tropos sayne ayenwarde mydle cercle wydnesse iij cleped ye cercle equinoctial vpon turneth euer ye heedes aries libra vnderstande well euermore thys cercle equinoctiall turneth iustly fro verye eest verye west haue shewed sphere solide thys cercle cleped also wayer daye ye sunne hedde aries libra bene dayes nyghtes lyke lengthe worlde therfore bene two sygnes called equinoctis moueth wyth heedes aries libra ycalled northwarde meueth wythoute heedes hys meuynge cleped southwarde ye equinoctiall take kepe latytudes north south forget thys cercle equinoctial ben consydred xxiiij houres clocke euermore arysynge xv degree equinoctial maketh houre equal clocke thys equinoctiall cleped mydwaye fyrste meuynge el sunne note fyrst meuynge cleped meuynge fyrst mouable eyght sphere whych meuynge fro eest weste agayne eest also cleped gyrdell fyrst meuyng departeth fyrst mouable sayne sphere two like party eue dystante fro pole thys worlde wydest thre cercles princypall cleped ye cercle capricorne turneth euermore concentryke vpon cercle heed thys forsayd capricorne ye greatest declinacyon southwarde sunne therfore deped solsticium wynter thys sygne capricorne also cleped tropyke wynter begynneth ye sunne come agayne v warde pof almicanteras sygnet thyne orizonte vpon thys forsayde plate ben compased certayne cercles hyghten almicanteras whyche hem semen parfyte cercles semen imparfyte centure standeth amyddest narowest cercle cleped sygnet netherest cercle deuydeth two emysperies partye heauen aboue erth partie byneth almicateras ben compowned two two dyuers astrolabies almycanteras ben deuyded one two thre ye quantyte astrolabye thys foresayd signet ymagined verye poynte ouer crowne thy heed also thys sygnet pole orizonte euery region pwhat ben thyne azimutes thys sygnet semeth comen croked stryke lyke clawes loppe el lyke ye werk womas calle keruynge ouerthwarte almycanteras strykes dyuysions ben cleped azimutes deuyden orizontes thyne astrolabye xxiiij dyuysions azimutes serue know costes fyrmament conclusyons knowe sygnet sunne euery sterre pof xij houres planetes nexte azimutes vnder cercle cacer ben xij dyuysions embolyfe moche lyke shap azimutes shewen space houres planetes pthy reete el thy zodiake thy reete thyn astrolaby thy zodiake shapen maner nette loppe webbe ye olde dyscripcyon whych yu mayste turne vp downe thy selfe lyketh conteyneth certayne nobre sterres fyxe wyth longitude latitude determinate yf maker haue erred name sterres ben written margin thy reete syt whych sterres smale poynte cleped centure vnderstande sterres syttyng wythin zodiake thyne astrolabye bene cleped sterres north arysen north eest lyne ye remnaunt fyxes zodiake ben ycleped sterres southe saye arysen south eest lyne wytnesse aldebera also algomysa generally vnderstande thys rule thylke sterres bene cleped sterres ye north arysen rather degre longitude sterres south arysen degree longitude sayne sterres thyne astrolabye measure longitude sterres ytaken lyne ecliptyke heauen vnder ye whych lyne sunne moone ben line ryght el superfycie thys lyne eclyps sunne moone shall declare eke cause sothlye eclyptike lyne thy zodyake vtterest bordure ye zodiake thy degree bene marked zodiake thy astrolaby shapen compace whych conteyneth large brede quantyte thy astrolabye ensemple zodyake heuen ymagyned superfycyes conteynynge latitude sygnes al remnaunt cercles heauen ben ymagyned lynes wythouten latytude myddes celestyall zodiake ymagyned lyne whych cleped ye eclyptyke lyne vnder whych lyne euermore waye sunne thus ben degree zodiake one syde lyne degree zodiake deuyded princypall deuysyons departen sygnes ye straytnesse thyne astrolabye euery smale dyuisyon sygne yparted two degree two meane degree conteynynge mynutes thys forsayd heuenysh zodiake cleped cercle sygnes cercle beestes zodiake language greke sowneth beestes laten tonge zodiake ben sygnes haue name beestes bycause sunne entreth sygnes taketh propertie suche beestes el sterres ben ben fired ben disposed sygne beestes shape lyke beestes el whan planettes ben vnder signes trasmue v influence operacions effectes lyke operacions beestes vnderstande also whan hote planet cometh hote signe tha entreth hete planet colde amenuseth coldenesse bycause hotte sygne conclusyon mayst thou taken ensample al sygnes moiste drie mouable fyxe reckenynge qualyte planettes fyrst sayd euerych sygnes hath respecte certayne parcel body man hath gouernaunce aries hath thyne heed taurus thy necke thy throte gemini thyne arme hole thyne armes forth shalbe shewed playnly fyfth partye thys treatyse zodiake whyche partie eyght sphere ouerkerueth equinoctiall ouerkerueth hym agayne euen partes one halfe declyneth southwarde northwarde playnly declareth treatyse sphere pthe labell haste thou labell shapen lyke rule saue streyght hathe plate eyther ende wyth smale poynte forsayde labell shalte thou calcule equacions ye bordure thyne astrolabye thyne almury pthe almury deutycle capricorne el calculere thyne almury cleped detycle capricorne el calculere thys almury set fyxe heed capricorne serueth many necessary coclusion equacion thynges shalbe shewed phere begynne conclusyons thyne astrolabye fynde degre whych sunne day day hys course aboute recken knowe day moneth lay thy rule vpo daye woll poynte thy rule verely sytten bordure vpon degre sonne ensample thus yere lord ye day marche myddaye wolde knowe degre sunne soughte backhalf myne astrolabye founde cercle dayes whych knewe name monthes writte vnder cerkle tho layde rule ouer foresayd daye founde poynte rule border vpo fyrst degre aries lytel within degree thus knewe conclusyon another daye wolde knowe ye degre sunne thys mydday daye decembre foude day moneth maner sayd tho layde rule vpon forsayd daye foude poynte rule vpo fyrst degree capricorne lytell wythin degre conclusion experience pto knowe altytude sunne eyther celestiall bodyes pvt rynge thyne astrolabye vp thy ryght thombe tourne thy lyfte syde againe light ye sunne remeue thy rule vp downe tyll streame sunne shyne thorowe hole rule loke howe many degree thys rule areysed fro lytel crosse vpo rest lyne take altytude thy sunne thys wyse mayste thou knowe nyght ye altytude ye moone bryght sterres thys chapiter generall euer one yt nedeth declaracion forget pto knowe degree sunne thy zodiake daye backsyde thyne astrolabye yf thou wylte wete rekenynge knowe whyche daye thy calender moneth thou arte laye thyne astrolabye saye allydatha vppon daye calender thyne astrolabye shall shewe thy degree sunne pto know euery tyme daye lyght sunne euery tyme nyght sterres fyxe eke knowe nyght daye gree sygne ascendeth eest orizont whych cleped comenly ascendent take altytude sun lyste haue sayde set degre sunne case myddle daye amonge thyne almicanteras eest syde thyne astrolabye yf mydle day set degre sunne vpon west syde take thys maner settynge generall rule one euer thou hast ysette ye degre sunne vpon many almycateras heyght sunne taken thy rule lay ouer thy label vpon degre sunne woll poynte labell sytten bordure vpon tyde daye ensample thys yere lorde day marche wolde knowe tyde daye toke altitude sunne founde degree mynutes heyght ye bordure backsyde tho turned myne astrolabye bycause myddaye turned reete set degre sunne saye fyrst degre aries right syde myne astrolabye vpon degree mynutes heyght amonge almycanteras tho layde labell vpo degree sunne founde poynte labell bordure capitale letter cleped x tho reckened capitall letter fro ye lyne mydnyght vnto forsayd letter x founde clocke daye tho loked ouer eest orizont founde degre geminius asce dynge whych toke myne ascendet thys wyse experience euermore whych maner shulde knowe ye tyde daye eke myne ascendet tho wolde wete nyght folowynge houre nyght wrought thys wyse amoge heape sterres lyked take altytude fayre whyte sterre cleaped alhabor foude syttynge weste syde lyne mydde day degree heyght taken rule backsyde tho set ceture thys alhabor vpon degree amonge almycanteras vpon westsyde bycause founde vpon weste syde tho layde label ouer degree sunne dyscended vnder weste orizont reckened al letter capitalles fro lyne myddaye vnto ye poynte labell bordure founde noone passed clocke space degree tho loked downe vpon eest orizonte foude degree libra ascendyng whome toke myne ascendent thus lerned one euer knowe whych maner shulde come houre nyghte myne ascendent verely maye taken smale instrument nathelesse thys rule generall wyll warne euer ne make thou neuer none ascendet noone daye take iuste ascendent thyne astrolabye haue sette iustlye clocke celestial body thou wenest gouerne thilke thinges ben nye southe lyne trust well ye sunne nere meridional lyne degree sunne remeueth longe concentryke vppon thyne almycanteras sothely thou shalte erre fro iuste ascendent conclusyon say centure sterre fyxe nyght moreouer experience wote well fro orizonte fro eleuen clocke vnto one takynge iuste ascendent portatyfe astrolabye harde knowe meane eleuen ye clocke noone tyll one clocke nexte folowynge declaracion lo thy fygure next thys rule foloweth pto knowe degree sunne thy zodiake dayes backsyde thyne astrolabye thou wolte weten recken knowe whych daye moneth thou arte laye rule thy astrolabye saye allidatha vpo daye calender thyne astrolaby shal shewe thy degre sunne pspeciall declaracion ascendent ascendent sothly well natiuites question election ofte tymes thynge whych astrologiens greatly obseruen wherfore semeth conuenient sen speke ascendent make speciall declaracion ascendent sothly take largest thylke degree ascendeth forsayd tymes ye eest orizont therfore yf planet ascende thilke tyme forsaid gre logitude say yt ylkeplanet horoscopo sothly ye house ye ascendent say ye fyrst house theest angle thynge brode large statute astrologiens celestiall body degree aboue thylke degree ascendeth orizont nombre sayne nere degree ascendeth yet recke thylke planette ascendent planet vnder thylke degree ascendeth space degree yet sayne planette lyke hym houre ascendet sothly yf passe boundes sayd space aboue byneth sayne thylke planette fallynge fro ascendent yet saine astrologiens ascendet eke lorde ascendent may shape fortunate infortunate thus fortunate ascendent clepen wycked planette saturne mar el tayle dragon house ascendent ne wycked planette haue aspecte enemyte vpon ascendet woll cast yt haue fortunate planette ascendent yet hys felicite saye well furthermore sayne fortune ascendent contrary forsayd thinges lorde ascendent sayne fortunate good place ascendent eke lorde ascendent angle succedet dygnite conforted wyth frendely aspectes receyued eke maye se asce dent retrograde ne combuste ne ioyned wyth shrewe sygne ne dyscencion ne reigned wt planette hys dyscencions ne haue vpon hym none aspecte infortunate sayne well nathelesse bene obseruaunces iudiciall mater rytes paynyms whych spirite hath faythe ne knowynge horuscopum sayne euerye sygne departed euen partes degree thylke porcyon clepen face althoughe planette haue latytude fro ye eclyptyke yet sayne somfolke planette aryse sygne wyth degre forsayd face whych hys longitude rekened yet ye planet horoscopo natiuitees election pto knowe equacion degree sunne yf fall betwyxe almicanteras moche almicanteras thyne astrolaby ben compouned two two almycanteras sondrye astrolabyes ben co powned one el two necessary thy lernyng teche ye fyrst knowe wyrch wt thyne instrumet wherfore whe yt degre ye sun falleth betwene two almycateras el yf thyn almycateras ben graue wt ouer great poynt copace thinges maye cause errour wel knowynge ye tyde ye day ascendent thou muste werken thys wyse set degree sunne vppon hygher almycanteras wayte well thy almurye toucheth bordure sette prycke ynke sette adowne agayne degree sonne vpon nether almycanteras bothe set another prycke remeue thy almurye bordure euen amyddes pryckes thys woll leaden iustlye degre ye sunne sytte bytwene ye almycanteras hys ryght place laye label degre sunne fynde bordure tyde daye nyght also verely shalte thou fynde vpo thy cest orizont thy ascendent pto knowe sprynge dawnynge ende euenyng whych ben cleped two crepusculis sette nadyre thy sune vpon degree heyght amonge thyne almycanteras weste syde laye thy labell degre sunne shall poynte labell shewe sprynge daye also sette nadyre sunne vpon degree heyght amonge thyne almycanteras eest syde lay ouer thy labell vpon ye degree sunne wyth poynt thy labell fynde bordure ende thyne euenynge night nadyre sunne thilk degree opposyte degree sunne sygne thus euerye degree aries ordre nadyre euery degre libra ordre taurus scorpion gemini sagittarius cacer capricorne leo aquary virgo pisces yf degree thy zodyake darke nadyre shall declare hym pto know arche day folke callen daye artifyciall fro sunne arysynge tyll go downe set degree sunne vpon thyne eest orizonte lay thy labell degree sunne poynt thy labell bordure set prycke tourne thy reet tyll degre sun syt vpon west orizont lay labell vpon degree sunne ye poynt labell set prycke recken quantitie tyme bordur betwixt pryckes take thyne arche thy daye remnaunte bordure vnder orizonte arche nyght thus mayst thou reken arch euery porcion thou lykest maner weckynge mayest thou se longe starre fyxe dwelleth erth fro tyme ryseth till go rest daye naturell sayne houres reuolution equinoctiall moche partie zodyake sunne propre mouing passeth meane whyle pto turne houres inequalles houres equalles know nombre degree houres inequalles departe hem take thyne houres equalles pto knowe quantitie day vulgare saye fro sprynge daye vnto nyght know thy quatitie thy coepusclys haue taughte chapiter adde hem arche daye artificial take thy space hole daye vulgare vnto nyght maner mayest thou werke knowe vulgare nyght pto knowe houres inequalles daye vnderstande well houres inequalles ben cleped houres planetes vnderstande wel somtyme ben longer daye nyght somtyme contrary vnderstonde thou well euermore generally houres inequall daye houres inequall nyght conteyneth degree bordure whiche bordure euermore answeryng degree ye equinoctiall wherfore departe arche daye artificyall take quantitie houre inequall daye yf thou abate quantitie houre inequall daye degree shall remnaunt leaueth perfourme houre inequall nyght pto knowe quantitie houres equalles quantity houres equalles sayne houres clocke ben departed degree readye bordure thy astrolabye well nyght day generally euermore nedeth anymore declaracyon wherfore whan lyst knowe manye houres clocke bene passed anye parte houres ben come fro suche tyme suche tyme daye night knowe degree thy sunne laye thy labell tourne thy reete aboute ioyntly thy labell poynt reken bordre fro sunne arysyng place thou desyrest daye nyght conclusion wol declare fourth partye last chapter treatyse openly shall lacke worde nedeth declaracyon pspecyal declaracion houres planetes vnderstande well euermore arysynge sunne tyll goo rest nadyre sunne shall shewe houre planete fro tyme forwarde nyght tyll sunne aryse shall degree sunne shewe houre planet ensample thus daye marche fell vpon saturday peraduenture rysynge sunne founde seconde degree aries syttyng vpon myne eest orizont albeit lytle founde second degree libra nadyre sunne discendyng west orizont vpon west orizont euery day generally sonne arysyng entreth houre planet vnder forsayde west orizonte whiche planet daye beareth hys name endeth next stryke planete vnder forsayde weste orizonte euer sunne clymbeth vpper vpper goeth hys nadyre downer downer echynge fro suche strykes houres planetes ordre sytten heauen fyrste hourre inequall euerye saturdaye saturne seconde iupyter thyrd mar fourth sunne fyfth venus syxt mercurius seueth moone ayen eyght saturne nynth iupiter mar enleuenth sunne twelfth venus sunne gone rest saturday sheweth degre sun hour mercury entryng vnder west orizonte euen nexte hym succedeth moone forth ordre planet planet houre houre nyght longe tyll sun aryse ryseth sunne sundaye morowe nadyre sun vpo west orizont sheweth entryng ye houre foresayde sunne maner succedeth planet vnder planet fro saturne vnto moone moone vp agayne saturne houre houre generally thus knowe conclusyon pto knowe whych degre zodiake starre fyxe thyne astrolaby aryseth vpon eest orizont although orizont sygne set centure starre vpon eest orizonte loke degree anye sygne sytteth vpon orizont tyme vnderstande well wyth degree aryseth starre thys maruelous arysyng stronge degree sygne bycause latitude starre fyxe eyther northe south fro equinoctiall sothly latitude planetes ben comenly reckened fro eclyptyke bycause none hem declineth fewe degree fro brede zodyake take good kepe thys chapiter arysyng celestiall bodyes trusteth wel neyther moone neyther starre ambolyfe orizont aryseth degree hys longitude saue one case whan haue longitude fro eclyptyke lyne neuerthelesse somtyme eueryche planettes vnder lyne pto knowe declinacyon euery degre zodiake fro equinoctial cer e set degre sygne vpon lyne meridional recken altitude almycanteras fro eest orizont vp ye degree set foresayde lyne set prycke turne vp thy reet sette heed aries libra meridionall lyne set prycke whan done consydre altytudes hem sothly difference thylke altitude declynacyon thylke degree fro equinoctiall yf thylke degree northwarde fro equinoctiall declinacyon north yf southward south pto knowe latitude regyon almycanteras table ben compowned reken many degree almicanteras meridionall lyne cercle equinoctiall vnto sygnet el pole artike vnto north orizonte greate latitude smal latitude table compowned pto knowe latitude sunne myddes daye cleped altitude meridian set degree thy sunne vpon lyne meridionall reken many degree almicantras ben betwyxt thyne eest orizont degre thy sunne take thyne altitude meridian sayne ye hyghest degre sunne day mayest thou knowe lyne hyghest lyne anye starre fyxe clymbeth night sayn whan starre fyxe passed lyne meridional begynneth discende doth sunne pto knowe degre sunne reet maner coriouste seke busily thy rule ye highest sunne myddes day turne thyne astrolaby wt pryck ynke marke nombre altitude lyne meridionall turne thy reet tyll thou fynde degre thy zodiake according prycke sayne syttyng prycke soth thou shalt fynde degree zodiake condicio yet thylke degree ben dyuers sygnes mayest thou lyghtly seasen yere knowe sygne whiche sunne pto knowe day lyke length throughout yere loke whiche degree ben ylyke heedes cancer capricorne loke whan sunne thilk degree ben dayes like legth sayne longe day moneth suche daye suche moneth varyeth lytle also thou take two dayes naturelles yere ylyke farre either poyntes equinoctial opposyte partyes long daye artificiall one daye eke contrary pthis chapiter maner declaracion conclusyons foloweth vnderstande well thy zodiake departed halfe cercles heed capricorne vnto ye heed cancer ayenwarde heed cancer vnto heed caprycorne heed caprycorne loweste poynte sunne goth wynter heed cancer ye hyghest poynt sunne goeth sommer therefore vnderstande wel two degree bene ylyke farre two heedes trust well thylke two degree ben lyke declynacyon southwarde northwarde dayes hem lyke length nyghtes also shadowes ylyke altitude ylyke myddaye euer pto knowe degree anye maner starre straunge latitude though indetermynate thyne astrolaby sothly trouth thus shalbe knowen take altytude thy starre whan eest syde lyne meridional nygh thou mayest gesse take ascendent anon ryght maner starre fyxe thou knowest forget altitude fyrst starre ne thyne ascendent whan thys doone aspye dylygentlye whan thys fyrste starre passeth thinge southwestwarde catche hym anon ryght nombre altitude west syde lyne meridionall caught eeste syde take newe ascendent anon ryght maner fyxe whiche thou knowest forget seconde ascendent whan done reken tha many degree ben betwixt first ascendet seconde ascendent reken well ye mydle degre betwixt ascendentes set thylke mydle degree vpon thyne eest oryzont loke degre syt vpon lyne meridional take ye degre ecliptyke whiche starre standeth tyme eclyptyke longitude celestial body rekened euen fro ye halfe heed aries vnto end pisces latitude reckened quantitie declination north south towarde pole werke thus yf sunne fyxe starre recken latitude declinacyon fro equinoctial cercle yf planete reken quantitie latitude ecliptike lyne albeit equinoctiall maye declinacion latitude body celestial rekened syght north south quantitie declinacion yet manye latytude declinacion body celestial saue sunne syght north south quantitie declinacion rekened ecliptike lyne fro lyne al planetes somtyme declyne north south saue onelye forsayde sunne pto knowe degree longitude fyre sterres ben determinat thyne astrolabye ben truly set set ye centre ster vpon lyne meridionall take kepe thy zodyake loke degree sygne syt vpon lyne meridional tyme degre starre standeth degre commeth starre vnto line orizonte pto knowe specyall latitude oure centre mene altitude oxenforde heyght pole vnderstande well far heed aries librain equinoctial orizonte synet poole artyke hye pole artyke orizont equinoctial farre synet preue thus latitude oxenforde vnderstande well heyght pole artyk north orizont degres minute synet pole artyke degree minute equinoctial synet degree mynutes south orizonte oure equinoctiall degree mynutes vnderstande well rekening also forget synet degree heyghte orizont equinoctial degree pole artyk short rule soth latitude planete regyon distaunce synete vnto equinoctiall pto proue latitude place regyon presse heyght pole artyke place wynters nyght whan firmament clere thycke starred wayte tyme tyll euery sterre fyxe syt lyne ryght perpendiculer ouer pole artyke clepe ster wayte sterre syt lyne ryght vnder vnder pole clepe sterre f vnderstande well f consydred onely declare syt euer pole take anone ryght altitude orizont forget let f goo farewell tyll agaynst dawnynge great whyle come agayne abyde tyll euen vnder poole vnder f sothly wyl f syt ouer ye pole take eftsones altitude orizont note wel seconde altitude ye fyrst altitude wha done reken many degree yt first altitude exceded altitude take halfe ilke porcio exceded adde seconde altitude take eleuacion poole eke altitude thy regyon two ben one nobre sayne manye degree thy pole eleuate moche latitude thy regyon ensample thus parauenture altitude euenyng degree heyght wyl seconde altitude dawnyng sayn lesse fyrste altitude euen take halfe adde seconde altitude hast thou heyght thy pole latitude thy regyon vnderstande well preue conclusyon many fayre coclusyon thou mayest haue plomet bangyng lyne hygher thyne heed perche lyne mote hange euen perpendiculer betwyxt poole thyne eye shalt thou se yf sit euen ouer pole ouer f euen also yf f syt euen ouer pole ouer daye pan conclusyon preue heyght pole artyke orizont take ster fyre euer descedeth vnder orizont thylke region cosydre hyghest altitude lowen altitude orizont make nombre altitude take abate halfe ye nombre take eleuacyon pole artyke regyon declaracyon c pan conclusion preue latitude region ye ben vnderstande wel latitude place regyon verelye space betwixt sygne hem dwellen equinoctiall cercie north south takynge measure meridionall lyne sheweth almica tras thyne astrolabye thylke space moche pole artyke hye ye place orizont ye depressyon pole artentyke beneth orizot quantitie space neyther ne lesse yf thou desyre knowe latitude regyon take altitude sunne mydle day whan sun heed aries libra moueth sunne lyne equinoctiall abate nombre sunnes altitude degree remnaunt nombre leueth altitude region thus suppose ye sun thilke day noone degree heyght abate degree leaueth degree latitude saye ensample well wote latitude oxenforde certayne mynutes lesse yf thinketh longe tarying abyde tyl sunne ye heed aries libra wayte whan ye sunne anye degre zodiake consydre degre declinacion northwarde equinoctiall abate sunnes altitude noone nombre hys declinacion haste thou hyghest heedes aries libra thus sunne parauenture degre leo almoost heyght noone declinacion almoost degree northwarde equinoctiall abate thylke degree declinacion altitude noone leaueth degree heed aries libra thine equinoctiall regyon also yf sunnes declynacyon southwarde equinoctiall adde thylke declynacyon altitude sunne none take heedes aries libra thyne equinoctiall abate heyght equinoctiall degree leaueth degree distaunce regyon equinoctiall anye sterre fyxe thou knowest take nether elongacion lengthen equinoctial lyne werke maner aforesayde pdeclaracyon ascencion sygnes well cercle direct oblyque excellece ye sphere solyde amoges noble coclusios sheweth manifest ye diuers asce cio signes diuers place wel right cercles embolyfe cercle auctours wryten thilke signe cleped ryght ascencyon whiche parte cercle equinoctial lesse parte zodyake ascendeth thilke signe ascendeth embolyfe whiche lesse zodiake equinoctial parte zodiake ascendeth euer mo arche day arch ye nyght ylyke longe sunne twyse euery yere passynge signet heed somers wynters yere haue foresayde people almycantras astrolabye ben streyght lyne hath shewed fygure vtilities knowe ascencyons sygnes ryght cercle trust well mediation thylke ascencyons astrologiens table instrume te knowen verely ascencion euery degre mynute zodiake embolyfe cercle shall shewed note forsayd ryght oryzont ycleped orizote rectum deuideth equinoctial ryght angle embolyfe orizont poole enhaunced vpon orizont ouercommeth equinoctial embolyfe angle pthis conclusyon knowe asce cyon sygnes ryght cercle circulus directus set heed sygne lyst knowe ascending ryght cercle vpon lyne meridionall wayte thyne almury toucheth bordure set prycke tourne thy rete westwarde tyll ende forsayde sygne set vpon meridionall lyne eft sone wayt thine almury toucheth ye bordure set prycke recken nombres degree bordure betwyxt pryckes take ascencyon sygne ryght cercle thus mayest thou werke euery porcyo zodyake pto knowe astencions signes embolyfe cercle euery regyon meane circulo obliquo set heed sygnes whiche lyst knowe ascencio vpon eest orizonte wayte thyne almurye toucheth ye bordure set prycke tourne thy reete vpwarde tyll ende sygne set vpon eest orizonte wayte eftsones thyne almury toucheth ye bordure set prycke reken nombre degree bordure betwyxt bothe pryckes take ascencyon sygne embolyfe cercle vnderstande well sygnes zodyake heed aries vnto ende virgo ben cleaped sygnes north equinoctial sygnes arysen betwyxt eest north orizonte generally euer sygnes heed libra vnto ende pisces ben cleped signes south fro equinoctiall sygnes arysen euermore betwyxte verye eest south orizont also euery sygne betwyxte heed caprycorne vnto ende gemini ariseth orizont lesse two houres equalles signes heed caprycorne vnto ende gemini ben called tortuous signes croked sygnes rysen embolife orizont croked sygnes bene obedient signes ben ryght ascencion sygnes right ascencion ben heed cancer vnto heed sagitarye signes arysen vpryght doeth therfore ben called soueraygne sygnes euery hem ariseth space two houres signes gemini obeyeth cancer taurus leo aries virgo pisces libra aquarius scorpio capricorne sagittarye thus euermore two sygnes ben farre heed capricorne obeyeth eueryche hem pto know iustly foure quarter worlde eest west south north take altitude thy sunne whan thou lyst note well quarter worlde sunne tyme asimutes tourne thyne astrolaby set degree sun ye almycantras hys altytude thylke syde sunne standethe maner takynge houres ley thy labell degree sunne reken howe many degree sunne ben betwene lyne meridional poynte thy labell note well nombres tourne agayne thyne astrolabye set poynt thy greate rule thou takest thyne altytudes vpo many degree hys bordure meridionall poynte thy labell lyne merydyonall wombe syde take thyne astrolabye wyth bothe handes sadly slylye let sunne shyne throughe bothe hole thy rule slylye thylke shynynge ley thyne astrolabye couche adoun euen vpon plaine grounde wyll meridional lyne thyne astrolabye euen southe eest lyne wyl lye euen eest weste lyne west north lyne northe thou werke softely auysely couchynge thou hast thus foure quarter firmament c pto knowe altitude planetes waye sunne whether bene north south fro waye aforesayd loke wha planete ye lyne meridionall yf altitude height degree sunne day planet verey waye sunne hath latitude yf altitude planet hyer tha degree sunne planette north waye sygne southe quantyte latitude sheweth thyne almicantras yf altitude lesse tha degree sunne planette southe waye sunne suche quantyte latitude sheweth thine almicantras fayne waye sunne euery place zodiake morowe sunne wyll another degree pfor knowe sygnet arysyng sunne thys sayne partye orizonte sune ariseth thou must fyrst consyder sune aryseth verey eest sygnet sometyme north eest somtyme south eest sothly sunne aryseth euermore verey eest orizonte yf heed aryes libra nowe thyne orizonte departed partes thy mynutes sygnyfycacyon partes worlde thoughe shypmen reken party tha wayte whych mynute sunne entreth hys arysynge take signet rysinge sunne pthe maner deuision thine astrolaby thus enioyned case fyrst deuyded four place principally lyne cometh fro eest weste another lyne goth fro south northe deuided smale party mynutes eest eest southe fyrste mynute aboue ye eest line forth fro partye partie tyl thou come agayne eest lyne thus thou myght vnderstande signet euery sterre whych partye aryseth pto knowe partie firmament coniunction consyder tyme coniunction kalender thus many houres coiunction fro mydday day sheweth canon kalender reken nombre bordure thyn astrolaby thou wonte knowinge houres day ye nyght lay thy label ouer degre sunne wyll poynte labell sytte vpon houre coniunction loke whyche mynute degree sunne sytteth partye fyrmament coniunction pto knowe sygnet altitude sunne saye time daye take ye altitude ye sune mynutes whych ascendeth thou myghte se whyche partie firmamente wyse might thou se night sterre wheder syt eest west south part bytwixe ye name minute sterre standeth pto knowe sothly longitude mone planette hath latitude fro tyme ecliptyke lyne take altitude mone reken thyne altitude vp amonge thyne almycantras whyche syde mone standeth sette pricke take anone ryght vpon mones syde altitude euerye sterre fixe thou knowest set circle vpon altitude amonge thyne almyca tras sterre founden wayte whiche degree zodiake whyche prycke altitude moone take degree whyche moone standeth thys conclusion verey sothe sterres thyne astrolabye standen trouthe treatyse astrolabye maketh none exception whether ye mone haue latitude none whether syde mone ye altitude sterre founde note yf moone shewe selfe day maist thou wortch ye coclusion sune wel sterre fixe pthys werchynge conclusyon knowe whether anye planet directe retrograde take altitude sterre cleped planette note well anone ryght take ye altitude sterre fixe thou knowest note well also come agayne thyrde fourth nyght nexte folowyng tha thou shalt perceyue well meuynge planette whether meue forwarde bacwarde wayte well whan sterre fyxe altitude whan thou toke firste altitude forsayd planette note wel truste well yf planette right side meridionall lyne seconde altitude lesse fyrst altitude planette directe west side condition tha retrograde yf thys planette eest syde whan hys altitude take seconde altytude fyrst altitude tha retrograde yf west side lyne medidionall derecte contrary mouynge partyes course mone sothly moone moueth contrarye fro eyther planettes eclyptyke lyne none maner pthe conclusyon equacyons house astrolabye sette begynnynge degree yt ascendeth vpon ende houre inequall tha wyl lyne seconde house sit vpon line mydnyght remeue degre ascendeth set hym vpon ende houre inequall tha wyl begynning house syt vpo midnight line bringe vp agayn degre ascendeth fyrst set hym vpon eest orizont tha wyl begynning house syt vpon mydnyght lyne take nadere degree yt ascendeth fyrst set hym vpon ende houre inequall wyl begynning house syt vpon mydnyght lyne take nadere ascendente set hym vpon ende houre inequal wyll begynnyng house syt vpon mydnyghte lyne begynnynge house nadere ascendent begynnyng house nadere seconde begynning house nadere begynnyng house nadere begynnynge house nadere begynnynge house nadere house panother maner equacyons house astrolabye take thyne ascendent thou hast angle wel thou wotest apposyte thyne ascendente saye begynning house syt vpon west orizonte begynnyng house vpon lyne meridionall hys opposite vpon lyne mydnight lay thy label vpon degre ascendeth reken fro poynte thy labell degree bordure tyl thou come meridionall lyne departe al thylke degree euen partes take euen porcyons house laye thy labell ouer euerye party tha thou might se label zodiake begynninge house fro ascendente saye nexte aboue thyne ascendent house house vpon meridional lyne fyrste sayd wyse wyrtch fro ascendent downe lyne mydnyght thus thou hast thre house saye begynnyng seconde thyrde fourth house nadyre thre house begynnynge house foloweth pto fynde lyne meridionall dwell fyxe certayne place take rounde plate metall warpinge border better make thervpon iuste compace lytle wythin bordure lay rounde plate vpon euen grounde euen stone euen stocke fixe grounde lay euen rule centre compace stycke euen pynne wyre vpryghte smaller better sette thy pinne thy wyre plome rule ende vpryght euen let thys pynne lenger quarter thy diameter compace fro pynne wayte besyly aboute clocke whan sunne sheweth whan shadowe pynne entreth thynge wyth cercle compace one heer brede make pricke wyth ynke abyde styll wayting sunne one clocke tyl shadowe pynne wyre passe anye thynge cercle compace neuer litle sette pricke take tha compace measure euen middle bytwyxe pryckes set prycke take rule drawe stryke euen fro pynne vnto myddle pricke take line meridional euermore place yf thou drawe crosse ouerthwart compace iustly ouer line meridionall haste thou eest west per cosequens oppositife south north pdiscription meridionall lyne longitude latitude cityes townes wel clymates thys lyne meridional maner discription lyne ymagined passeth vpon ye pole worlde sygnet oure heed cleped sygnette place tyme yere whan sune meuyng firmament cometh hys meridionall place verey myddaye clepe noone therfore cleaped lyne myddaye take hede euermore two city townes whyche one approcheth nerer eest dothe towne truste well thylke two twones haue diuers meridian take kepe also yt arche equinoctial conteyned bounded bytwene two meridian cleped ye logitude towne two townes haue meridian lyke one meridian distaunce hem bothe lyke farre thys maner chaunge meridian sothly chaunge almicanteras haunsynge poole distaunce sunne longitude clymate may cleaped space erth fro begynnynge fyrst clymate vnto last ende clymate euen directe ayenst pole artike thus say auctours clerkes say yf men cleape latitude centre arch meridian conteined intercepte betwixt sygnette equinoctiall say distaunce fro equinoctial vnto ende clymate euen ayenste poole artyke longitude clymate south pto knowe wyth degre zodiake planette ascendeth orizont hys latitude north south knowe thine almynake degree eclyptike signe whiche planette rekened cleped degree longitude knowe also degree hys latitude fro eclyptyke north southe ensamples folowyng especiall thou mayst wirch wyth euerye signe zodiake longitude perauenture venus planet capricorne latitude hym northwarde degree fro ecliptyke lyne toke subtyl compace cleped one poynte compace f tha toke poynte set celyptyke lyne zodiake degre longitude heedes saye heede capricorne set poynte f vpwarde sygne bycause altitude northe vpon latitude venus yt saye degree fro heed capricorne thus haue degree betwyxe two prickes layde downe softly compace set degree ye longitude vpo orizont tha toke waxed labell maner payre table receiue distinctly ye pricke compace toke thys foresayd labell layd fixe ouer degree longitude tha toke vp compace pointe ye waxe label coude gesse ouer eclyptike lyne ende longitude sette pointe ouer endelonge labell vpon space latytude inwarde zodiake yt say northward fro ecliptyke tha layde downe compace loked well way vpo eclyptyke f turned reete tyl pricke f sate vpon orizont sawe well bodye venus latytude degree septetrionals ascendeth ende degree fro heed capricorne note thys maner thou myghtest werche wyth latitude septemerionall al signes sothly latitude meridional planet capricorne maye take bycause lytle space betwyxt eclyptyke bordure astrolabye sykerlye sygnes maye take also degree perauenture iupiter anye planet fyrste degree pisces longitude latitude degree meridionall toke poynte set fyrst degre pisces ecliptyke sette poynt downwarde f signe latiude south degree saye fro heed pisces thus haue degree betwyxe bothe prickes sette degree longitude vpon orizont toke labell layde hym fixe vpo degree longitude sette poynte labell eue ouer ecliptyke lyne ende degree longitude sette poynte f endelonge label space degree latitude warde fro zodiake say southwarde fro ecliptyke toward bordure tourned reete tyll poynte f sate vpon orizont saw well bodye iupiter hys latytude degree meridionall ascendeth degre pisces horescopo maner thou mayst wyrch wyth latitude sayd fyrste saue capricorne thou wylte plye thys crafte wyth arysinge mone loke thou recken well course houre houre dwelleth degree longitude lytle whyle thou woste well neuerthelesse yf thou legen wel menyng table course houre houre thou shalt well ynough pvmbra rectum thou wylt wyrche vmbra rectum yf thou myghte come base towre thys maner shalt thou wyrch take altitude towre wyth hooles rule lye eue point ensample thus se point mete ye space betwyxe toure fynde foote beholde howe fynde thyrde parte ryghte space betwixe toure thyrde parte altitude toure tha thryse foote highest toure wt addicion thyne owne bodye fro thyne eye rule fall tymes hyghest toure pvmbra versa thou maist come base toure thou fixe hym thorowe nombre sette pricke thy fote tha go nere toure se hym poynte set another prycke beholde howe hath hym thou shalt fynde hathe hym sythes beholde haue hym thou shalt fynd sythes therfore space betwixe pryckes tymes thyne altitude note fyrste altitude thou settest prycke afterwarde whan thou seest hym yu settest prycke tha thou fyndest bytwene fote thou shalte fynde parte foote altytude toure yf fall vpon another pointe thus falleth seconde taking whan falleth shalte thou fynde seconde parte thyrde part thyrde parte yt saye space betwyxe pryckes twyse heyght toure difference tha wolde thre time height et sic de singulis another maner wyrchyng vmbra rectum thou mayste come base toure wyrche thys wyse set thy rule vpon tyll thou se altitude set thy fote pricke set thy rule vpo maner loke difference betwyxe thou shalte fynde one mesure space betwyxe two pryckes parte altitude toure al pvmbra rectum thy rule fall vpon pointe ryght shadow tha make fygure loke howe muche space fete betwyxe toure multiply whan thou hast multyplyed nombre deuyde nombre kepe residewe adde therto thy heyght vnto thyne eye residue shall heyght toure thus mayste thou worche syde one c vmbra rectum another maner working vpo side loke vpon poynt thy rule falleth wha thou seest toppe tour thorow two hole tha mete space thy foote base toure ryghte nombre poynte hathe hym selfe ryghte mesure betwyxe toure hath selfe heyght tour ensample thus sette case thy rule fal vpon two thyrde partes space two thyrde partes toure pvmbra versa knowe heyghte pointes vmbra versa thy rule fall vpon wha thou seest toppe tour set pricke thy fote stodeth go nere tyll thou mayste se toppe poynt sette another prycke mete howe many foote betwyxe two pryckes heyght vp thyne eye shall heyght tour note thre parte part passrth nobre distaunce therfore space thy heyght thine eye height toure yf two thre distaunces nombres shulde mesure betwixte pryckes betwyse thrysethe heyght toure pvmbra rectum knowe heyght yf thou mayst come base thinge sette thy rule vpon poynte thou wylte thou mayste se toppe thing two hole make marke thy foote stodeth go nere farther tyl thou mayst se another point make ther another marke loke differece betwixt two poyntes scale ryghte difference hath hym ryghte space betwyxt two markes hath hym heyght thynge ensample set ease yt thou seest thorowe poynte poynt passeth nombre nombre distaunce ryght thys difference one hath selfe ryght mesure betwixt bothe markes hathe hym heyght thynge puttynge therto height thy selfe thyne eye thus mayst thou werke pvmbra versa fvrthermore yf thou wylte knowe vmbra versa crafte vmbra rectum suppose take thine altitude poynte makeste marke thou goest nere tyll thou haste poynte makest another marke muste thou deuide nombre cometh therof shall deuyde nobre yt cometh therof tha loke difference betwixt shalt thou fynde ryght hath hym space betwixt two pryckes hath altitude thynge phere endeth conclusion astrolabie complaynt blacke knyght may whan flora freshe lusty quene soyle hath cladde grene reed whyghte phebus gan shed stremes shene amydde bulle wyth beames bryghte lucifer chace awaye nyght ayen morowe oure orizont hath take byd al louers slepe awake hertes heuy comforte dreryheed heuy nyghtes sorowe nature bade hem ryse hem disporte ayen goodly glad grey morowe hope also saynt iohan borow bade dispire daunger dispayre take holsome lusty ayre wyth syghe gan abreyde slomber sodaynly vp sterte ala nyghe sorowe deyde syckenesse sate aye nye herte fynde socour smerte leste release peyne sore halte euery veyne rose anone thought wolde gone wodde byrdes synge whan mysty vapoure agone clere fayre moronyng dewe also lyke syluer shynyng vpon leaues baume swete tyl fyry tytan wyth persaunt hete dryed vp lusty lycour newe vpon herbes grene mede floures manye diuers hewe vpon stalkes gonne sprede splaye leaues brede agayne sunne golde burned spere hem cast beames clere ryuer forth gan costey water clere byrell crystall tyll laste founde lytell wey towarde parke enclosed wyth wall compace rounde gate small wolde frely myght gone thys parke walled wyth grene stone went byrdes songe whych brauches plaine vale loude sange woode ronge lyke shulde shyuer peces smale thought nyghtyngale great might voyce gan wrest ryght herte loue wolde brest soyle plaine smothe woder softe ouersprad wyth tappettes nature made selfe couered eke alofte wyth bowes grene floures cure beautye may longe endure assaute phebus feruent fere whych hys sphere hote shone clere eyre attempre smoth wynde zepherus amonge blosomes whyte holsome norishing kynde smale buddes rounde blosomes lyte maner gan brethe delyte yeue v hope frute shall take ayenst autumpne redy shake sawe daphene closed vnder rynde grene laurer holsome pyne myrre also wepeth euer kynde cedres hye vpryght lyne fylberte eke lowe doth enclyne bowes grene erthe adoun vnto knyght called demophoun sawe eke freshe hauthorne whyte motley swote doth smel ashe fyrre oke wyth many yonge acorne many tree mo tell beforne sawe lytell well hys course gan beholde vnder hyll wyth quycke streames colde grauell golde water pure glasse bankes rounde well enuyronynge softe veluet yonge grasse therupon lustely came spryngynge sute tree compasynge shado caste closyng wel r al herbes growyng g water holsome vert thorowe might herbes growyng be lyke welle narcisu yslayne thorowe vengeance couertly dyd hyde grayne dethe vpon eche brinke deth mote folowe ye euer ne lyke pytte pegace vnder pernaso poetes slepte lyke welle pure chastyte whiche diane nymphes kept whan naked water lepte slowe acteon hondes fel onely came nyghe wel welle reherce holsome wolde aswag bollen hertes venym peerce pensyfeheed al cruel rage ouermore refesshe vysage hem werynesse great labour fallen distresse thorowe daunger dis drie thrust thought wolde assa taste draught welle bytter langour might alaye banke anon downe laye myn heed vnto welle ra water dranke good drau wherof thought refresshed brennyng sate nye verily anon gan fele huge parte released smerte therwithal anon vp sterte thought wolde walke sem forthe parke holtes h launde yed pace gan aboute faste beholde founde anon delectable place beset tree yonge whose name shal tol amydde whiche stoode herber gre beched colour new clene thys herber full floures gende whych beholde gan betwyxe hulfere wodbende ware sawe lay man blacke whyte coloure pale wan wonder deedly also hys hewe hurtes grene freshe woundes newe ouermore dystrayned wyth sycknesse besyde thys full greuouslye vpon hym hote accesse daye daye hym shoke full pytously constraynynge hys malady hetly wo thus lyenge alone dethe hym grone wherof astonyed fote gan wythdrawe greatly wondrynge myght laye felawe ne coude wyght wyth hym se wherof routh eke pyte gan anone softely coude amonge bush priuely shroude yf myght wyse aspye cause hys deedly wo pytously gan crye hys fortune vre also wyth myght layde eere euery worde marke sayd hys swough amonge abrayde fyrst yf shulde make mencion hys person playnly hym dyscryue sothe wythout excepcion speake manhode one best lyue maye man ayen trouth stryue hys tyme hys age also proued men shulde haue ado one best therto brede length well ymade good proporcion yf hys delyuer strength thought sycknesse occasyon thus laye lamentacion gruffe grounde place desolate sole hym selfe awhaped amate semeth syttyng hys wordes al put remembraunce herde hys complaynyng grounde hys wofull chaunce yf wythall may pleasaunce woll anone lyke sayd reherce euerychone shall helpe nowe complayne shall nowe style gye lede niobe let nowe thy teeres rayne penne helpe eke nede thou wofull mirre yt felest myn hert blede pytous wo myne hande eke quake wryte thys mannes sake vnto wo accordeth complaynynge dolefull chere vnto heuynesse sorowe also syghynge wepyng pytous mournynge vnto drerynesse shall wryte dystresse party nedeth knowe felyngly cause roote malady ala wytte dull haue knowynge suche matere dyscryue wryte full wofull coplaynte whych yt ye shal euen lyke doth skryuenere nomore shall wryte hys mayster besyde dothe endyte ryght fare sentement saye ryght nought conclusyon herde present thys man complayne wyth pytous soun euen lyke wythout addicioun dysencrease eyther lesse reherce anone woll dresse yf nowe thys place fele loue brennynge feruence hyndred hys ladyes grace wyth false tonges wyth pestilence slee trewe men neuer dyd offence worde dede ne entent yf suche nowe present let hym routh laye audience wyth dolefull chere sobre countenaunce thys man full hye sentence hys mortall wo hys perturbaunce complaynynge nowe lyenge traunce wyth lokes vpcaste rufull chere theffecte whych ye shall thouyt oppressed wt inward syghes sore paynful lyfe body languyshynge wofull goste herte rent tore pytous chere pale complaynynge deedly face lyke ash shynynge salte teares myne eyen fall parcell declare grounde paynes whose herte grounde blede heuynesse thought resceyte wo complaynt brest chest dole drerynesse body eke feble faynte wyth hote colde myne ax maynte nowe chyuer defaute heate hote glede nowe sodaynly sweate hote fyre nowe colde ash deed hote cold nowe colde hete agayne nowe colde yse nowe cole reed hete brenne thus betwyxe twayne possed al forcast payne hete playnly fele greuous colde cause euery dele thys cold inward hye dysdayne colde dyspyte colde cruell hate thys cold yt euer doth hys besy payne ayenst trouth fyght debate thys colde fyre abate trewe meanynge ala harde whyle thys colde woll begyle euer better trouth mente wyth myght faythfully serue wyth herte diligente lesse thanke ala deserue thus trouth daunger doth sterue one shulde deth mercy let hath made despyte new hys swerde whet agaynst hys arowes fyle take vengeaunce wylfull cruelte tonges false sleightly wyle han gonne awarre wyll stynted false enuy wrath enuyte haue conspyred agaynst ryght lawe malyce trouth shalbe slawe male bouche gan fyrst tale tell sclaundre trouth indignacion false reporte loude range bell mysbyleue false suspection haue trouth brought dampnacion ala wrongfully dyeth falsnesse nowe hys place occupyeth entred trouthes londe hath therof full possessyon ryghtful god fyrst trouth fonde howe may thou suffre oppressyon falshode shulde haue iurisdiction trouthes ryght slee hym gyltlesse hys fraunchyse maye lyue pee falsly accused hys fone foringed wythout answere whyle absent dampned may excused cruelte sate iugement hastynesse wythout auysement badde dysdayne execute anone hys ingement presence hys fone attourney maye none admytted bene excuse trouth ne worde speke fayth othe iuge lyst sene gayne wyll wreke lorde trouth call clepe howe may thou se thus thy presence wythout mercy murdred innocence nowe god arte trouth souerayne seest howe lye trouth bounde sore knytte loues fyrye chayne eue ye deth thrugh gyrte wt many woud lykely neuer sounde trouth dampned dethe abyde drawe alonge brethe consyder se thyne eternall ryght howe yt myne herte professed whylom trewe wyth ful myght onely one whych nowe ala volunte wythout trespas myne accusours hath taken vnto grace cherysheth hem deth purchace meaneth thys woder bre purueyaunce yf shall call god loue false hem assure trew ala downe whele ben fall yet soth thys worst falshed wrogfully troth hath ye name troth eward falshed bereth ye blame thys blynde chauce thys stormy aueture loue hath moste hys experience yt doth wyth trouth moste cure shall hys mede fynde moste offence serueth loue wyth hys diligence fayne vnder lowlyhede ne fayleth fynde grace spede fol loued one full longe syth agone wyth myne herte body full myght deed herte gone hys heste holde hath hyght though banyshed syght mouth dampned shal dey vnto behest yet wyll euer obey euer syth worlde began lyst loke story rede shall aye fynde trewe man put abacke falshede yfurthered loue taketh none hede slee trew hath hem charge false goeth frely large take recorde palamydes trewe man noble worthy knyght euer loued hys payne relees notwithstadyng mahode hys myght loue vnto hym dyd full great vnryght aye bet dyd chylualrye hyndred enuye aye better dyd euery place hys knyghthode busy payne ferther hys ladyes grace mercy myght neuer attayne hys deth coude refrayne daungere aye obey serue beste coude playnly tyll sterue fyne also hercules hys conquest hys worthynesse strength alone peerles lyke bokes hym lyst expresse sette pyllers hys hye prowesse awaye gaddes sygnifye myght hym passe chyualrye whych pyllers ferre beyonde inde set golde remembraunce set behynde wyth hem loue lyst febly auaunce hym set last vpon daunce agaynst whome helpe may stryfe hys trouth loste hys lyfe phebus also hys persaunt lyght wente erthe lowe vnto herte wyth venus syght ywounded cupides bowe yet hys lady lyst hym knowe though loue hys herte dyd blede let hym go toke hym hede shall saye yonge piramus trewe tristram al hys hye renowne achylles antonius arcite hym palamowne ende passyoune sorowe deth graue lo guerdon louers haue false iason wyth hys doublenesse vntrewe calkos medee theseus rote vnkyndnesse wyth two eke false en e lo thus false aye one degre loue lust wyll saue fashode none skyll thebe eke false arcyte demephoon eke slouthe lust al myght delyte al falshode great vntrouthe thus euer loue ala routhe false liege forthereth may sleeth trewe vngoodly day day trewe adon slayne bore amydde forest grene shade venus loue felte al sore vulcanus wiht mercy made foule chorle many nyghtes glade mar knyght man fynde mercy comforte none also yonge fresshe vpomedes lusty fre courage serue al herte ches athalans fayre vysage loue ala quitte hym wage cruell daungere playnly last wyth deth guerdonlesse past lo fyne loues seruyse lo loue hys seruauntes quyte lo howe hys faythfull men dyspyse slee trewe men false respyte lo howe doth swerde sorowe byte hertes moost hys lust obey saue false trewe dey fayth othe worde ne assuraunce trewe meanynge awayte busynesse styll porte ne faythfull attendaunce manhode ne myght armes worthynesse pursute worshyp hye prowesse straunge lande rydynge ne trauayle ful lytell nought loue doth auayle peryll deth see ne lande hunger ne thurste sorowe ne syckenesse ne great empryses take hande shedynge bloode ne manfull hardynesse ne ofte woundynge saute dystresse partynge lyfe deth also al nought loue taketh hede therto lesynges wyth flaterye falshed doublenesse wyth tale newe many fayned lye false semblaunt coutrefete hublesse vnder colour depaynte wyth stedfastnesse wyth fraude couered vnder pytous face accepte nowe rathest vnto grace hym selfe nowe best magnifye wyth fayned porte presumpcion haunte cause wyth false surquidre vnder meanynge double entencion thynke one opinion saye another set hym selfe alofte hynder trouth sene full ofte thynge bye nowe al dere thanked venus god cupide sene myne oppressed chere hys arowes stycken syde saue deth nothynge abyde fro daye daye ala harde whyle euer darte hym lyst fyle wofull herte ryue two taute mercy lacke pyte causeth payne wo lyst one grace se vnto trouth cruelte moste al complayne hath ioye laugh payne wylfully hath deth sworne gyltlesse wote cause saue trouth aforne alone serue faythfully god loue vnto cry thy blende double deyte thys great wronge complayne vnto thy stormy wylfull variaunce yment wyth chauge great vnstablenesse vp renyng thy chauce trust may sekernesse wyte nothynge thy doublenesse archer blynde marketh nothynge shoteth wynde hath dyscrecion wythout aduyse let hys arowe go lacke syght also reason hys shotynge happeth ofte hurte hys frende rather hys fo doth thys god wyth hys sharpe flone trewe sleeth letteth false gone hys woundyng thys yu worst al hurteth doth cruell wreche maketh sycke crye call vnto hys foe hys leche harde man seche vpon poynte dethe ieopardye vnto hys foe fynde remedye thus fareth nowe euen foe yt gaue myne herte woude mote aske grace mercy pyte namely none may foude nowe sore leche wyll confounde god kynde hath set myne vre lyues foe haue wounde cure ala whyle borne euer sawe bryght sonne nowe se full longe aforne borne desteny sponne parcas systerne slee yf conne dethe shopen sherte onely trouth may asterte myghty goddesse also nature vnder god hath gouernaunce worldly thynges comytted cure dysposed haue throgh wyse purueiauce gyue lady moche suffysaunce vertues therwythall puruyde murdre trouth hath take dauger gyde bounte beaute shappe semelyhed prudence wyt passyngly fayrnesse benygne porte glad chere wyth lowlyhed womanhede ryght plenteous largenesse nature dyd fully impresse wrought alther last disdayne hinder trouth made chaberlayne mystrust also false suspection wyth mysbyleue made chefe counsayle thys conclusyon exyle trouth eke pyte court make mercy flee yt dyspyte nowe holdeth forth reyne hasty byleue tale yt men feyne thus trouth ala murdred slayne wt wordes sharpe kene gyltlesse god wote trespas lye blede vpon colde grene nowe mercy swete mercy lyues quene grace mercy yet preye seruyce man maye deye yf shall dye algate shall none mercy haue yet deth let thys ben date wyl brouyt graue hastely yf lyst saue sharpe woundes ake blede mercy charme also womanhede charme playnly none onely mercy helpe thys case though woundes blede euer one lyfe deth standeth grace though gylte nothynge ala aske mercy best entente redy dye yf ye assente agaynst shall neuer stryue worde ne werke playnly ne may leuer haue alyue dye sothly paye yea though thys daye euer lyst deuyse suffyseth dye seruyse god yt knowest ye thoght euery wyght ryght euery thynge thou mayst se yet er dye wyth full myght lowly praye graunt vnto ye goodly fayre freshe fre whych onely slee defaute rothe dye ye maye knowe trouth soth suffiseth knowe euery circumstaunce wel payde lyst deth vengeaunce vnto vnder ligraunce sytte dome dysobeye luste wylfully deye wythout grutchynge rebellyon wyll worde holy assent maner contradiction fully commaundement yf dye testament herte sende spirite also euer lyste wyth hem alder laste womanhede mercy recomaunde lye nowe betwyxte hope drede abydynge playnly lyst comaunde vtterly thys ny demaunde welcome whyle lasteth brethe ryght choyse lyfe dethe er might fayne syth hande wyll bothe lyfe deth ioye al payne fynally heste holde shall tyl spirite desteny fatall lyst fro body wende haue trouth thus make ende worde gan sygh sore lyke hys herte ryue wolde wayne helde hys peace spake worde se hys wo mortall payne teres gonne fro myne eyen rayne full pytously inwarde r saw long wishing trouth thys whyle selfe kepte close amonge bowes self gonne hyde tyll last wofull man arose lodge wente besyde may hys custome tabyde sole complayne hys paynes kene yere yere vnder bowes grene bycause drewe nyght sonne arke diurnall ypassed persaunt light hys bright bemes hys stremes waues water fall vnder bordure occyan hys chare golde hys course swyftly ran whyle twylyght rowes rede phebus lyght deaurat alyte penne toke gan fast spede wofull playnte thys man wryte worde worde dyd endyte lyke herde coude hem reporte haue set hertes disporte ought mysse laye wyte worthy beare blame thynge mysse reported make dytte seme lame myne vnconing sayn lyke complaynt dyd expresse aske mercy forgyuenesse wrote thought sawe ferre ferre west lustely appere esperus goodly bryght sterre glad fayre persaunt eke chere meane venus wyth bemes clere heuy hertes onely releue wonte custome shewe eue fast fell adowne kne euen thus gan prey lady venus fayre vpon se let man hys trouthe deye ioy thou haddest whan thou leye wt mar thy knight whan vulcanus fonde chayne vnuysyble bonde togyder bothe twaye whyle courte aboue celestyall shame gan laughe smyle ah fayre lady wylly fonde comforte carefull goddes immortall helpynge nowe thy dilygence let stremes thyne influence descende fortheryng trouth namely hem lye sorowe bounde shewe thy miyt wo haue routh er false daunger sle hem confounde specially let thy myght founde socoure thou maye trewe man herber lay trewe forther hys sake glad sterre lady venus myne cause hys lady hym grace take herte stele mercy enclyne er thy bemes go vp declyne er thou nowe go fro v adowne loue thou haddest adowne whan gone rest rose anone home bed wente wery thought best prayenge thus best entente trewe wyth daunger shente wyth mercy may release payne recured er maye come efte agayne ne may lenger wake farewell ye louers trewe prayenge god thus leue take er sonne morowe rissen newe er haue ayen rosen hewe eche may haue suche grace hys owne lady armes embrace meane thus honeste wythout ye may togyder speke ye lyst good lyberte eche may herte breke ialousyes onely wreke hath longe malyce enuye werred trouthe hys tyranny plenuoye pryncesse pleaseth benygnyte thys lytell dyte haue mynde womanhode also se man may mercy fynde pyte eke long hath behynde let hym agayne prouoked grace trouthe agaynst kynde false daunger occupye hys place go lytell quayre vnto lyues quene hertes souerayne ryght glad shall sene suche thy grace ala payne lefte behynde playne mercy ruthe grace eke pyte exiled may attayne recure fynde myne aduersyte pexplicit pa preyse woman tho lyste woman euyll speke fayn hem worse deserue pray god neckes breke euyll dethe mote tho ianglers sterne euery man holden hem serue hem worshyp honour seruyce euery maner best coude deuyse ouyt fyrst thynke manere brig v forth payn endure fyrst byrth syth fro yere yere howe busely done theyr busy cure kepe v fro euery mysauenture youth whan haue myght selfe kepe neyther daye nyght ala howe may say hem wele fostred ybore ben al succoure euer trew stele sake full ofte suffre sore wythout woman ioye lore wherfore ought woman obey goodnesse say well knowen hath ben thys woman ben cause al lyghtnesse knighthode norture eschewyng al mali encrease worshyp al worthynesse therto curteys meke grounde goodnesse glad mery trewe euery wyse gentyl herte thynke deuyse though wold trust vntruth fayre wordes wold aught assent good fayth thinketh gret ruth woman shold gylt shet neuer knew ne wist nouyt entet ne lyste ye fayre wordes ye write whyche ye payne fro day day tendyte may ware tale vntrew ye busyly paynt endyte ye wyll swere ye neuer knewe ne sawe woman neyther moche ne lyte saue onely ye delyte serue euer ye sey loue muste ye nedes dey tha wyl ye swere ye knew neuer loue ne dredfull obseruaunce nowe ye fele wounde sore wherfore ye put gouernaunce loue hath ordeyned serue plesauce wt miyt lytel lyues space whyche endeth sone yf grace bedde wyll ye soone drawe sone sicke ye wyll fayne swere fast lady hath slawe brouyt sodeynly hygh payn fro deth may restrayn wyth daungerous loke eyen two dethe must ye nedes go thus wyl ye morne thus wyll ye syghe sore though herte anon two wold brest swere fast ye may lyue myne owne lady myght yf ye lest brynge myne herte somdele rest yf lyst mercy haue thus vntrouth wyll euer mercy craue thus wol ye playne tho ye nothyng smerte innocent creature begyle swere hem wounded herte loue ye may lyue whyle scarsly longe one might go myle hyeth dethe brynge ende yf souerayn lady lyst amede yf routh coforte wyse pyte false othes sere ye innocent weneth yt deuyse weneth herte may thus cofort somwhat chere woll ianglers deme ful yl sayne ye haue fully wyl lo howe redy tonges ben prest speke harme woman causelesse ala might ye wel say best deme hem thus gyltlesse herte ywis gentylnesse gylte lyst thus wome fame trouth thynk ye blame woman cometh worldly wele wherfore ought worship euermore though mishap one ouyt hele false lore day night payne v euermore wyth many othe woman begyle wyth false tale many wycked wyle yf falshede shulde reckened tolde woman iwys full trouthe men thousande folde fro vyces twys stande clere thyng euer coude yf entysyng men make hem flatteren connen neuer slake wold fayne wher euer ye coude without men tising wome dyd amys ther ye may get ye lye fro yere yere many gabbynge ye make hem iwys coude neuer ne knowen er thys euer ye coude fynde place euer woman besought grace ye payne al ful might wyth herte besynesse pleasen hem bothe day nyght prayeng hem grace gentylnesse haue pyte vpon great distresse ye wolde payne haue routh slee sen ye meane trouh thus may ye se ben fautelesse innocent werkes slye craftes touche falsnesse know hem ne may hem espye sweare ye ye must nedes dye yf wolde womanheed vpon rewe er ye deed lady hertes quene ye call hem therwyth ye sygh sore say lady trowe sene plyte haue lyued full yore nowe hope ye woll paynes suffre dwell goodnesse iwys ye well lo whiche paynted processe ye make harmlesse creature begyle whan slepe ye payne wake bethink many wycked wyle ye shal se day yt ye shal curse ye whyle ye besily dyd entent hem begyle falshede neuer ment ye knowe wel though wolde lye woman trouthe stedfastnesse good faythe neuer hem sye moche worshyp bounte gentilnesse right commyng fayre ful mekenesse good glad lowly ensure thys goodly angelyke creature yf happe man disease dothe busynesse full payne wyth might comforte please fro hys disease might hym restrayne worde ne dede iwys wol fayne al might doth besinesse brynge hym hys heuynesse lo gentyllesse woman haue coude knowe rudenesse howe besy v kepe saue bothe heale also sycknesse alway ryght sory distresse euery maner thus shewe routhe
